This would describe it if it was a true story..
Tales of your misdeeds are told from Ireland to Cathay.
Your low character is the subject of Greek plays.
May your humors rot in your living body.
May your years be short and miserable.
May you be sewn up alive in the belly of a dead camel.
You child of a mangy dog.
Blessings upon you and your House.
Your wisdom and mercy are legendary.
May you live in harmony and contentment.
Consumption is an older name for the terrible scourge of Tuberculosis.
Typhoid Fever, or Slow Fever, is loose in this county.
Epidemic Typhus or Camp Fever, is rampant.
The Pale Rider has brought the Black Death to this county.
There is an epidemic of Measles in this county.
Smallpox has struck this county, killing almost half of those infected.
Does not have an outbreak of $DISEASE$
Does not have any disease outbreak

In the Melee phase the armies are locked in close combat\n§YHeavy Infantry§W, §YPikemen§W and §YKnights§W excel in the §YMelee Phase§W

Average morale in this flank: $MORALE$ (§Y+$DELTA$§W / week)
After a lineage of $NUMCHARS$ characters your line has ended with the death of the heirless $ENDCHAR$.
Bla bla bla, end of game.

With a score of $SCORE$ you$FAILED$ beat House Capet, descended from Robert the Strong who was a powerful figure during the reign of Charles the Bald. His descendants would be Kings of France in 1066. Although by 1322 the main line would die out, cadet branches still ruled in 1337 as Kings of France, Portugal, Naples, Hungary and Navarre. Cadet branches would also hold the Duchies of Brittany, Burgundy, Bourbon, Provence and Achaea. One further cadet branch would hold the dignity of Emperor as Latin Emperors of Constantinople. Truly the greatest dynasty of medieval Europe.

With a score of $SCORE$ you$FAILED$ beat House von Habsburg. On the face of it, things were not looking very good for the Habsburg family in 1066. As minor Swiss counts, their status inside the Empire was fairly negligible compared to great territorial magnates of 11th century Germany. A policy of tactical marriages saw the family lands expand steadily, and it was during the chaos that gripped the Empire in the late 13h and early 14th century that the family were elected to the office of Holy Roman Empire. Although unable to hold the office they were able to use this a springboard to secure the Duchy of Austria for the dynasty. With this power base, the family would go on to dominate the politics of Central Europe until 1918.

With a score of $SCORE$ you$FAILED$ beat House Rurikovich, descendants of the Swedish Viking Rurik who established a state in Rus (now in modern Russia and Ukraine) in the 9th century. The policy of dividing lands between heirs led to the state fragmenting and the various family groups would feud with each other. This left them too divided to cope with the 13th century Mongol invasion. The great principalities fell one by one to Batu, the grandson of Genghis Khan, and were forced to pay tribute to the victorious Mongols. The family itself survived and would rise again...

With a score of $SCORE$ you$FAILED$ beat House d'Ivrea, a dynasty with illustrious ancestors, but by 1066 very much down on its luck - from Kings of Italy to minor counts in Burgundy. It looked like a dynasty whose day had passed. Then came a lucky marriage and the Kingdoms of Castile and Leon passed into the family holdings, turning House d'Ivrea again into one of the key players on the European stage.

With a score of $SCORE$ you$FAILED$ beat House Piast. The eponymous founder of this dynasty was by legend a wheelwright before becoming King of Poland. The family held Poland throughout the period, and despite the Kingdom being split were able to unite the country and make Poland strong again. Other members of the Dynasty were part of the Holy Roman Empire as Dukes of Silesia. In 1337 Poland was ruled by its greatest Piast King and preparing to advance against the Mongols.

With a score of $SCORE$ you$FAILED$ beat House Komnenos. If we exclude Isaac, who had launched a successful coup to become Emperor in 1057, the Komnenos family were loyal servants of the Byzantine Empire. In the chaos following the Seljuk victory at Manzikert, the Komnenos family followed that proud family tradition and launched another coup. For the next 100 years the dynasty would halt the decline of the Byzantine Empire under what we know as the Komnenian restoration. Ironically, the family would be toppled in a palace coup, but they would continue to rule as Emperors in Trebizond

With a score of $SCORE$ you$FAILED$ beat House Plantagenet, who started off as a cadet branch of the elder house of Anjou. Geoffrey, the founder of the dynasty, was left with the family lands in France when his father went off to Jerusalem to become King. The Plantagenet family had a power base in France, and through marriages inherited the Kingdom of England and large parts of France. The French inheritance would lead to an ongoing conflict with France and the Hundred Years War.

With a score of $SCORE$ you$FAILED$ beat House Ylving. Coming to the throne in Denmark in 1047, the house of Ylving was one of only two royal families to still hold kingdoms in 1337. Although there were several attempts at expansion, Denmark only gained small amount of land in Estonia, as most would be gained and then lost. The dynasty itself managed to survive and prosper in an era of chaos and turmoil, which is no mean feat.

With a score of $SCORE$ you$FAILED$ beat House af Bjälbo, who arguably created the modern state of Sweden. Prior to their accession the Swedish state was highly decentralised, where the writ of royal authority barely ran. The Bjälbo Kings regulated things more clearly, conquered Finland and by 1337 had entered a personal union with Norway, leading Sweden to height of its medieval power.

With a score of $SCORE$ you$FAILED$ beat House Welf, a dynasty very much down on its luck in 1066. By 1100 that had all changed. Control of two of the most powerful duchies in Germany and substantial lands in Italy made them the second most powerful family in Germany after the Hohenstaufen. One member of the Welf family would even gain the title of Emperor, but in the struggles would also weaken the family and much of the lands would be lost. The family would consolidate its holdings in Northern Germany as Dukes of Brunswick and remain a player in Imperial politics.

With a score of $SCORE$ you$FAILED$ beat House de Genève, who were counts of Geneva in 1066. The house held this territory throughout the period and were still counts of Geneva in 1337. They never managed to climb any higher, but at the same time were able to cling onto their holdings.

With a score of $SCORE$ you$FAILED$ beat House von Zähringen, who were powerful landholders in Southern Germany and holders of the Duchies of Verona and Carinthia, which made the Zähringen family a key power holder in Germany. A failed rebellion against the Emperor saw these titles stripped from the family and other parts of the family lands would be inherited by other dynasties, leaving the family lands shrunk to a few holdings in Swabia.

With a score of $SCORE$ you$FAILED$ beat House de Montfort, who were small scale land holders in France. Through marriage and service the family gained estates in both Normandy and England. It was under the zealous but cruel Simon de Montfort the Elder that the family ascended. Through his participation in the Albigensian Crusade the family would add substantial estates in the South of France. The family reached the height of its power through his son Simon de Montfort the Younger, who became de facto ruler of England. However, all this would prove fleeting and by 1337 the family would have lost it all and gone extinct in the male line.

With a score of $SCORE$ you$FAILED$ beat House of Godwin, who On the 5th January 1066 Harold Godwinson became King of England. His father had spent much of the reign of King Canute building up the family power base and with the death of Edward the Confessor he was able to assume the throne. However he wasnt the only claimant, Harald of Norway and William of Normandy both also claimed the title and invaded. Harald was defeated and killed at the battle of Stamford Bridge, but Harold would be defeated and killed (along with two of his brothers) With his death the power of the House of Godwin collapsed and its lands divided amongst the victorious Norman Lords who followed William.

With a score of $SCORE$ you$FAILED$ beat House Babenberger, which is not to be confused with the slightly more famous von Babenbergs of Austria. This cadet branch of house Capet held minor titles in Franconia. History probably wouldnt remember them if it wasnt for the more famous family with a similar name.
With a score of $SCORE$ you should clearly not be playing this game.
I feel a sudden urge to ravish all the young ladies in the court.
A man should be able to resist a seductive woman.
My waist is growing bigger... so is my appetite!
My intense study of the Bible has led me to believe certain things, and self-control is one of those.
The respect I get and the money that fills my treasure chamber makes my heart burn with a desire for more.
Something has happened recently, I feel like I am bursting with love for my fellow man.
I ignore my duties and am trying to do as little as possible
I keep myself busy, trying to put as much work as I can into the hours of the day.
I feel envious of my neighbor: his castle, church and even his wife is much more beautiful than mine.
I treat others with kindness and they respond by treating me well too.
I have never been able to 'turn the other cheek', I am more 'an eye for an eye' kind of person.
If someone hurts me, I turn the other cheek. There is never need for 'an eye for an eye'.
Pride goeth before destruction, and a haughty spirit before a fall'... Pah!
I can't help but feel proud
I know my strengths, but most of all I know my weaknesses and limitations.
No matter how I try, the lies keep coming, but a small white lie has never hurt anyone, so why would a bigger lie?
I never feel that I need to lie, the truth is always better than a lie.
My legs begin to shake, then I lose control over myself and might even cry.
I fear I have turned into a coward
The adrenaline makes my blood rush through my body and fills me with courage.
My stammering voice makes me blush and I am always unwilling to talk to people.
I'm the centre of attention, I love to make new acquaintances and you will always find me in the biggest group at feasts.
Am I a bit too gregarious?
I am going to be the greatest [Root.GetManWoman] ever!
I have come as far as I want to, I feel no need to keep pushing myself.
Someone once told me: 'Be just and if you can't be just, be arbitrary'.
Justice has long arms, but mine are longer.
I believe no good deed goes unpunished.
I won't change my mind and I won't change the subject, I have the zeal of a crusader!
The young men at court have caught my eye these days.
A woman should suppress her worldly urges.
It seems the young women no longer have the power to seduce me.
I just don't feel lustful anymore
Something I thought I had suppressed and finally subdued has risen inside me and I fear I might break my celibacy any day now.
A diet of bread and water does not satisfy me any more. I need something else, something delicious and filling.
I have broken my fast with wine and quail
I no longer find joy in stuffing myself with fine wines, red meat and rich sauces. I think I need a diet.
Money didn't make me happy, nor did respect.
I think I need something else in my life
Work has become boring and the hours of the day drag on.
Diligence may be a virtue, but it's exhausting!
I feel spirited and restless. Maybe some work might calm me down?
I am sick of always being kind to everyone!
I should be happy with what I've got, not everyone is as privileged as I am.
I have started to feel that 'turn the other cheek' is just stupid.
The constant surges of adrenaline and increased heart rate makes me weary. It's not as fun being angry as it used to be.
I am pretty great, after all.
I think I should be proud of myself
'Tis hard to feel proud when one has nothing to be proud of.
Why should I be proud of myself?
I have grown tired of the young men who try to seduce me.
Sometimes, it's easier to lie than to hurt people with a truth.
Lies do hurt people. The truth... I think I can handle the truth.
I did not understand fear before, but once you have felt your leg shake and teeth chatter with fear, then it is hard to remain brave.
This does not make me a coward, does it?
Fear has loosened its grip on me, and I stand tall against the things I used to fear.
No one can call me craven anymore
I crave solitude, I no longer seek the company of others.
My confidence has grown and I don't feel so awkward anymore.
There must be more to life than this!
I have trumped everyone and am the best [From.GetTitle] ever!
Justice is a harsh mistress and I can't love her anymore.
Someone told me I'm arbitrary and I wish to change that.
My favorite subject does not interest me anymore and I can't speak about it with the same zeal as before.
Perhaps the glass is fuller than I believed it to be.
...as long as it does not overflow
The creepy feeling of always being watched, whatever I do, is slowly getting on my nerves.
A stranger appeared today and despite a warning from my friend, I walked towards him to greet him and welcome him. Now I owe the smith my life.
The feeling of being watched and followed seem to have disappeared overnight!
Several assassinations and 'loans' later, I don't know if I'm still able to trust anyone.
Why are they trying to hurt me?
Every day, the cook chases me out of the kitchen, but not before I've stuffed myself and my pockets full of biscuits.
My [GetFromRelation], [From.GetTitledFirstName] thinks I eat far too much and has declared the kitchens off limits!
I had better eat with moderation, or I'll end up looking like my fat nanny...
My [GetFromRelation] is worried about my health and wants me to eat more.
I don't want to get fat though.
No, you can't have them, they are mine!
My [GetFromRelation] [From.GetTitledFirstName] won't have me turn into a 'mean and selfish little moneygrubber'.
If you play with me I'll let you play with my toys.
My [GetFromRelation] told me I should never let my lessers have what is mine... but my friend was just going to borrow some toys!
I hate Latin, I hate History and I won't do my homework!
I'll just take a nap instead
My [GetFromRelation] is furious at my 'lazy nature' and will keep a closer eye on my studies from now on.
I always do my homework and my chores before I go and play.
My [GetFromRelation] explained to me that I am taking life far too seriously and need to relax.
It's not fair, even peasant children have nicer things than I do!
My [GetFromRelation] gave me a stern talking to about the deadly sin of envy.
I still NEED that wooden sword!
Most people have good hearts. A stranger is just a friend I have yet to meet.
My [GetFromRelation] [From.GetFirstName] took me over the knee and beat me with a stick for my trusting and weak nature.
I take it back, some people are evil.
That kid mocked me! I cannot be blamed for punching him in the face and giving him a nosebleed...
My [GetFromRelation] [From.GetFirstName] is not pleased with my temper. [From.GetSubjectPronounCap] gave me the switch!
Let the little fools whisper and snigger behind my back. I can wait... revenge is a dish best served cold.
[From.GetFirstName], my [GetFromRelation], chastised me for my cold patient nature. 'Show some spirit, damn you!' [From.GetSubjectPronoun] shouted.
I stand head and shoulders above the other children, and why should I pretend otherwise?
Today, my [GetFromRelation] [From.GetFirstName] called me an arrogant braggart and told me the story of Icarus and Daedalus.
Why show off, when everything I have, I have been given?
My [GetFromRelation] [From.GetFirstName] is not impressed with my humility. 'Stand tall when you deserve it', [From.GetSubjectPronoun] explained.
People are so easy to manipulate! A smile, a tear, the right inflection, and they will rush to do my bidding.
My evil [GetFromRelation] [From.GetFirstName] promised that for every lie I tell, I'll get a rap from the rod.
I will never lie again! Ouch...!
I find religion fascinating, especially when the priests talk of heathens and infidels, and how they shall be struck down!
I was reading the [Root.Religion.GetScriptureName] when my [GetFromRelation] took it away, telling me to ease off and go outside and play.
Sometimes, people get upset by my honest opinions. 'Yes, you look fat.' 'You have a big nose.' It's just the truth!
I tell it as I see it
At length, my [GetFromRelation] [From.GetFirstName] lectured me on the necessity of white lies and the virtues of omission.
So my tongue won't turn black?
I don't like climbing trees, I'm afraid of spiders and I won't go near the graveyard. Does that make me a craven?
My [GetFromRelation] [From.GetFirstName] talked me into touching a spider today, it was icky and I squealed but didn't run away.
I climb the highest trees, visit the graveyard at midnight and collect spiders and snakes.
One of the snakes bit me this morning. My poor [GetFromRelation] [From.GetFirstName] cursed my recklessness and made me promise to stop messing around with vermin.
I can't look a stranger in the eye without blushing or looking down.
When I refused to greet the guests, my [GetFromRelation] [From.GetFirstName] spanked me and locked me in my room without dinner.
Inquisitive, curious and friendly, I always am the first to greet strangers.
I rushed to meet the guests and got to the hall before my [GetFromRelation] [From.GetFirstName]. For that, I earned a spanking.
I'm going to be the bestest [Root.Father.GetTitle] ever when I grow up!
My [GetFromRelation] [From.GetFirstName] must be jealous, why else would [From.GetSheHe] punish me for being ambitious?
My friends dream of riches, power and fancy things, but I don't even wanna grow up!
I am happy with what I have
My ears are still ringing with my [GetFromRelation] [From.GetFirstName]'s harsh words. I need to grow a spine and get some ambition.
I do whatever strikes my fancy. Such as smashing this fine glass goblet!
My [GetFromRelation] [From.GetFirstName] took the strap to me for smashing the goblet.
I see that it was wrong now
I always make sure the children get equal parts when the cook gives us sweetmeats, full-cream milk or anything else.
My [GetFromRelation] [From.GetFirstName] chided me for my obsession with fairness, explaining that justice is simply word invented by human with too much time on their hands.
People are naive fools, laughing, dancing and nodding like puppets to the false tune played by priests and noblemen. Charlatans all!
The priest bored me to tears with a sermon, then told my [GetFromRelation] about my cynicism. [From.GetSubjectPronounCap] tried beating it out of me...
Haha, look at that rat trying to walk with broken legs! Roly poly little rat!
My ears are still ringing from the slap [From.GetTitledFirstName] gave me over that rat.
Maybe the stablemaster knows more about horses than I do, I'm not that interested anymore anyway.
I need a new hobby. Oh, a bible!
Girls do not interest me, instead I feel drawn to other boys or even men.
I know I should not be drawn to other men but I can't seem to help it. Should I deny my feelings and be as the church and world wants me to be?
Boys do not interest me, instead I feel drawn to other girls or even women.
I know I should not be drawn to other women but I can't seem to help it. Should I deny my feelings and be as the church and world wants me to be?
I can run around wild and do whatever I want. Without any guardian, I set my own moral standards!
We have children at the court that has no guardian handling their education. They run a risk of becoming spoiled brats.
I guess I have to take care of it myself then.
My [GetFromRelation] [From.GetFirstName] practically lives in the kitchens, the little glutton!
Heh, eat and be merry child!
My [GetFromRelation] [From.GetFirstName] hardly eats anything for fear of turning fat.
Hold up [From.GetFirstName] as an example for the court!
I watched my [GetFromRelation] [From.GetFirstName] at play with another child yesterday and noticed that [From.GetSheHe] didn't want to share [From.GetHerHim] toys.
This is how children learn thrift!
My [GetFromRelation] [From.GetFirstName] is a charitable little rascal, [From.GetSheHe] just gave [From.GetHerHis] newest toy to the smith's son.
My [GetFromRelation] [From.GetFirstName] is not exerting [From.GetReflexivePronoun] in [From.GetPossPronoun] studies. I am starting to despair.
[From.GetSubjectPronounCap] is just dense. What can I do?
My [GetFromRelation] [From.GetFirstName] does [From.GetHerHis] homework and is always on time for [From.GetHerHis] lessons.
Praise [From.GetObjectPronoun] in front of the court.
The child needs to lighten up!
I had to break up a fight between my [GetFromRelation] [From.GetFirstName] and another child today. [From.GetFirstName]'s heart is filled with envy...
The other children are just selfish
Envy is the deadliest of sins!
My [GetFromRelation] [From.GetFirstName] has a tender and loving soul, trusting everyone in the castle. I fear [From.GetSheHe] will get hurt someday.
Those who love get love in return!
Tender soul? I'll give [From.GetObjectPronoun] a tender back!
The cook complained to me about my [GetFromRelation] [From.GetFirstName]'s temper tantrums. Apparently [From.GetSubjectPronoun] punched her son in the face. Again.
Patience is a virtue, but sometimes it gets on my nerves. My [GetFromRelation] [From.GetFirstName] never loses [From.GetPossPronoun] temper, always waiting patiently for a chance to retaliate.
Hold up [From.GetFirstName] as an example for the court!
I'll bring out the fire in [From.GetObjectPronoun]!
My [GetFromRelation] [From.GetTitledFirstName] is turning into an arrogant little braggart. I might have to rein [From.GetObjectPronoun] in a bit.
No, [From.GetSubjectPronoun] has reason to be proud
That will be cured by the birch.
My [GetFromRelation] [From.GetFirstName] is modest and humble, never showing off or bragging.
That's no way to get ahead!
I caught my [GetFromRelation], [From.GetFirstName] lying to me again, straight to my face without batting an eye. I almost had an innocent scullery maid sent to the stocks!
With the birch, [From.GetSheHe] will speak the truth!
Pray that [Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName] will show [From.GetHerHim] the light
My little [GetFromRelation] [From.GetTitledFirstName] always has [From.GetPossPronoun] nose in the scriptures, and spends all [From.GetPossPronoun] time among the priests.
I will not raise a zealot!
The lady almost ran me down as I entered the hall. Tearfully she told me that my [GetFromRelation] [From.GetFirstName] had insulted her again.
But, my dear lady, you ARE fat!
Tell [From.GetFirstName] that honesty has its bounds...
The smallest spider makes my [GetFromRelation] [From.GetFirstName] squeal and run for cover. This has started to worry me.
Spiders? I can't abide them either!
Some fears are good, but there are limits
My [GetFromRelation] [From.GetFirstName] was bitten by a snake this morning! The brave little fool keeps seeking out danger.
Every time my [GetFromRelation] [From.GetFirstName] meets a stranger, [From.GetSheHe] looks like [From.GetSheHe] might faint.
The [From.GetLadLass] is just a bit shy
Shyness can be cured by the birch!
Shyness is a terrible curse, I'll talk with [From.GetHerHim].
When guests arrive, my [GetFromRelation] [From.GetFirstName] is the first to greet them and shower them with questions.
My [GetFromRelation] [From.GetFirstName] is aiming for the stars, the ambitious little brat.
My [GetFromRelation] [From.GetFirstName] lacks all passion and ambition, perfectly content with [From.GetHerHis] lot in life.
[From.GetTitledFirstName] is impulsive and seems unable to tell right from wrong. What should I do with my wayward [GetFromRelation]?
How about a pat on the head?
My [GetFromRelation] [From.GetFirstName] makes sure everyone gets exactly the same amount of whatever sweets the cook gives the children.
Time to explain how the world works
I fear my [GetFromRelation] [From.GetFirstName] is too cynical for [From.GetHerHis] age.
I caught my young ward [From.GetTitledFirstName] torturing a rat behind the stables today...
With the birch, [From.GetSheHe] will learn better!
I managed to blame the monks at a nearby monastery for one of my more sensuous songs of courtly love.
After a pleasant evening with a... very special friend of mine, I found my purse empty. Luckily, I didn't carry that much gold with me.
I will not visit that brothel again
I have arranged a small tournament for my own enjoyment. I chose the most beautiful lady at the tournament and she accepted me as her champion.
I will fight, and I will win, for your honor must be protected
I do not dare fight though.
I was shamefully caught in action with a beautiful servant today by my own priest. He scolded me and lectured me in the virtues of chastity.
I wish I could ignore him
Oh, how much joy I've had from Ovidius. Clearly there must be something divine in his great writing. But why do I feel so guilty?

One of my knights is embroiled in a deep argument with one of his rivals about who is the legal heir to a small plot of land. This has a risk to turn into a feud in my demesne, so I have to make a judgement.
Spend time and money investigating the truth.
The money belongs to the crown.
One of our vassals, a notoriously glutton, has invited us to a banquet. Naturally we attended, in a vain hope to improve feudal relations, but the banquet could have fed several villages.
Scold our host for his sins.
Keep quiet, and pray God will forgive our sin.
Words of my pledged chastity has reached the Pope who sent a courier with a letter of approval and his blessing.
This is a sign that I should be celibate!
Does the Pope think I will grant him my lands?
Thank God quietly in the chapel...
Words of my pledged chastity has reached the Pope who have a sent a devout priest to guide me even closer to God.
With the presence of an old and experienced scholar in the court, there is much to learn about the aspect of chastity and how this virtue leads us close to God.
Every time I reject one of the desirable women who throws themself in my way, the others increases their efforts. Do they wish for me to burn in hell?
I will not give in to temptation.
One of the lovely ladies that have been throwing herself at me has finally cornered me in private, and there is no honorable way to get out of this.
God, have mercy on my soul.
My chastity has lead my rivals to question my masculinity.
The rumors regarding me and my 'alleged' chastity has grown into ridicule. Something have to be done, or my reputation as a strong [Root.GetManWoman] and [Root.GetTitle] will suffer.
Pay someone to spread stories about my manliness
Declare my love for my Wife

I love a good feast at my castle and I spared no expenses when I arranged the feast, the table was filled with geese, pork, cheese and plenty of wine. I doubt my guests left my halls with empty bellies.
But my guests had to pay to come.
I made sure the wine flowed and the plates were never empty. Some of us might had a bit more fun than the others and woke with a terrible headache, but it was surely worth it.
Everyone told me it had been a fantastic night!
Some wanted to congratulate me in person
Truth be told, I never thought I would ever really like [From.GetTitledFirstName], but when [From.GetSheHe] held a great banquet we got drunk together and I had a good time.
One of my courtiers have always acted a bit odd around me, but [From.GetTitledFirstName] seems to have relaxed a bit after the banquet. [From.GetSheHeCap] almost seems friendly now.
When I was younger, no one could defeat me at the tournaments nor in battle. Nowadays, I can barely mount my stallion. This is clearly not a healthy lifestyle...
My obesity and my hunger for food has left me with no desire left in my body. All that is left to me is to eat, eat and eat!
Watching [From.GetTitledFirstName] eat is revolting! And [From.GetSheHe] eats all the time!
I better let [This.GetHerHim] know that gluttony is not attractive
It was devastating to hear [From.GetTitledFirstName]'s harsh critique: how my constant eating and bad table manners is revolting to everyone and that I severely need a diet!
That is hurtful! Why would you tell me this?
In front of a tatty beggar's bowl a coin glittered. I snatched it from the mud before he could react and ignored his furious curses.
And some fool had just given him the money
I sacrificed one of my oldest friends today because of my greediness. One of my friend's enemies offered me a bribe I couldn't resist.
I won more than I lost
The priest had to prod me with the collection bag several times before I gruffly put a coin in it.
Attempt to steal some from it.
Being charitable is about loving other human beings and forgiving them the trespasses they do to us.
Caring for the sick and infirm is one of the duties of charity. There are people in our court that needs our help.
One part of being charitable is to harbor the homeless. Several villages have been destroyed in a storm, and the peasants need somewhere to live.
I can let them stay in one of my castles.
There is just no place for them...
Being charitable means that you have to love the sinner and admonish them for their sins.
It is a duty to their eternal life.
I don't want to upset them.
Thomas of Aquinas teaches us that upholding the virtue of Charity means to bear wrongs patiently. There are some people who dislike me personally and wish me bad luck, but I forgive them.
I bow my head in prayer.
I can not follow those teachings...

While walking together with [Root.job_spiritual.GetTitledFirstName] and discussing my finances, we met a couple of beggars. I knew [Root.job_spiritual.GetSheHe] did not approve of alms, but the young mother with no shoes and a wailing baby could not be ignored.
It was just enough for something to eat
I squirm and almost feel sick every time I see [From.GetTitledFirstName] hand out another shiny gold coin to yet another filthy and lice infested beggar.
[From.GetSheHeCap] is a good example to me
I should tell [This.GetHerHim] how I feel about [This.GetHerHis] generosity!
[From.GetTitledFirstName] has a problem with my generosity towards the poor.
Maybe I should be less charitable
I have minimized the amount of work I need to do each day by delegating most of my workload onto my courtiers.
The less I work, the more time I can spend with the people I really care about.
My slothfulness has caused part of my castle to deteriorate. I delegated the care of my castle to someone unworthy.
My relations with [Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName] is strained. To uphold the virtue of diligence it is vital to show loyalty and steadfastness.
Bend my knee to my liege.

Being a feudal lord means working hard at keeping your personal relations with your vassals at an acceptable level. Sometimes though, they seem to have grudges against me, and I must work at eliminating those and instill proper loyalty.
Be an example to my vassals!
Talk about feudal obligations to them.
[From.GetTitledFirstName] is such an inspiring person. [From.GetSheHeCap] is such a diligent ruler, that I wish I could be the same.
I will do whatever it takes.
Sounds like too much work for me.

Following the teachings of divinely inspired thinkers, a diligent human should strive for peaceful resolutions. I have members of my court who do not see eye to eye, and my duty as their liege is to arbitrate their disputes.
It was a lot of talk, but well worth it.
There are always things that need to be done when it comes to expanding and improving a castle.  With the proper planning, and diligent work, I can make sure the work becomes more efficient.
Since I am such a diligent person, I make sure that everything is as good as it can be.  When it comes to my fighting men, I can focus on one of two things.
The morale of my retinue is the most important.
I have fallen to the temptation of slothfulness. There are things I have neglected in my castle, things that should have been done, but I postponed them.
May God have mercy on my soul.

There is always a place at my table and a warm spot in front of the hearth for all the old men and women who have served me before and now have nowhere else to go. Their stories delight everyone and I see no need for them to be forgotten after long lives of hard work for me.
Some courtiers think it's good, too
The kindness of [From.GetTitledFirstName] is an example to us all. [From.GetSheHeCap] takes care of [From.GetHerHis] servants as they grow old and incapable of anything but the simplest of chores.
I should tell [This.GetHerHim] [This.GetSheHe]'s almost too kind
I almost blushed when [From.GetTitledFirstName] expressed [From.GetHerHis] admiration over my generosity and kindness!
Thank you for those kind words!
My courtiers fear me, they fear my outbursts of anger whenever they disobey and disappoint me.

I was a little bit surprised when a courtier asked if he could be the one to haggle with the merchants for once. I agreed, glad that someone else took the responsibility to discuss, haggle and threaten the merchants to a fair deal.
I just hope this works out fine

I was talking to the merchant about his latest shipment of goods and tried to be diplomatic. For some reason he felt confident enough to try and cheat me on what was rightly mine, even if I hadn't paid him yet...
A merchant tried to trick [From.GetTitledFirstName]! I had to interfere and I made sure he would never try that one on me or [From.GetFirstName] ever again...

I gave the priest such a scolding today when he dared ask me, his rightful liege and lord, for a donation! Isn't he living on my sufferance? Haven't I allowed him to collect money himself from his parish?
I overheard [From.GetTitledFirstName] when [From.GetSheHe] told the priest to sod off. The man only asked for a small donation for the orphanage!

As I exited the church I heard [From.GetTitledFirstName] mention my scolding of the priest to a couple of [From.GetHerHis] friends, sounding distressed and angry. I walked closer and as I approached them, [From.GetTitledFirstName] started showering me with insults before I even had a chance to explain.

After my scolding of the priest I left fuming with anger and was ready to slap whoever it was that touched my arm to stop me. In front of me stood [From.GetTitledFirstName], who told me that the priest certainly deserved the scolding, given all I had done for him and the church.
Yes, that was what I thought
My mood swings, mostly from good-tempered to wroth, have made my courtiers fear me a little bit too much. It has caused me to lose prestige.

The holy book tells us that 'The patient man shows much good sense, but the quick-tempered man displays folly at its height'. There are people in my court who are quick to anger, and who may need a patient voice to calm them down.
[From.GetTitledFirstName] is reasoning with us about our anger.
The virtue of patience teaches us about endurance through moderation. By moderation in our life, health will improve.
As St. Paul teaches us, 'Be patient with all. See that no one returns evil for evil, rather, always seek what is good for each other and for all'.

[From.GetTitledFirstName] has sent an emissary to me, saying [From.GetSheHe] has forgiven us some imagined slights.  I do not know what [From.GetHerHis] reasons are, but I will accept [From.GetHerHis] message.
By upholding the virtue of Patience, God teaches us to show mercy to sinners. What greater way to show mercy, than to forgive the greatest sinner, and pray with him or her for their salvation.
Pray with the sinner in the chapel tonight.
Our sins have not gone unnoticed. My liege, [From.GetTitledFirstName] is inviting me to join [From.GetHerHim] in the chapel in an attempt to save my soul tonight.
[From.GetTitledFirstName] came to the chapel, with tears in [From.GetHerHis] eyes. We spent the night in prayer, until the sun went up. Praying desperately for the mercy of God..
I spent the night alone in the chapel, praying hard for the salvation of [From.GetTitledFirstName]. [From.GetSheHe] never showed up.
My God have mercy on [From.GetHerHis] soul.
I believe I can do great things so therefore I have put my mind to actually implement my ideas.

I have a great idea but no money to make my dream real. One of the travelling merchants who regularly visits [Root.Location.GetName] has shown interest in my idea but always changed his mind whenever I ask him to invest in it.

[From.GetTitledFirstName] had been trying to convince the merchant to invest in one of [From.GetHerHis] ideas for several weeks but he had always refused, until today. The idea was actually quite good but I dared not give [From.GetTitledFirstName] the coins myself, instead I had given the merchant the coins needed and told him to pretend to be convinced and then invest in the idea.
I hope this will keep [From.GetHerHim] happy and occupied.
[This.GetTitledFirstName] got someone to invest in one of [This.GetHerHis] ideas

The merchant had apparently changed his mind and promised to finance my idea so I could begin working on it. I have a feeling [From.GetTitledFirstName] had something to do with the merchant's change of mind but I can care less.
I will start working on it immediately!
I have taken such pride in myself lately that the Lord Spiritual [Root.job_spiritual.GetTitledFirstName] noticed this and chided me about it.
Someone laughed at me! I will find the culprit and make him or her choke on their laughter!
Who dares laughing at me? Who!?

I knew [From.GetTitledFirstName] was too proud for [From.GetHerHis] own good, but I accidentally managed to hurt [From.GetHerHis] pride and [From.GetSheHe] lashed out at me and called me many bad things. I don't know if I can forgive [From.GetHerHim] for those harsh words...
I won't ever talk to [This.GetTitledFirstName] again!
When I found out who it was who had laughed at me, I tried to swallow my pride but I choked on it and it managed to escape. Now [From.GetTitledFirstName] won't talk to me...
I stayed behind when a couple of my friends went hunting as I have never been able to see blood without fainting. Their hunting luck was good and we feasted on wild boar meat that evening.
I fainted when I saw the boar's face covered with bloody froth

Everyone else ran off to chase the alleged thieves who had stolen a very valuable object from our church. Instead of following them, I went to the church and discovered the chalice hidden behind one of the benches.

I have had times when the cowardice of [From.GetTitledFirstName] made me doubt [From.GetHerHim]. But the way [From.GetSheHe] handled the situation when everybody else ran in different directions to try and catch a chalice thief made me reevaluate [From.GetTitledFirstName].
The priest had just misplaced the chalice
If no one else tells [This.GetTitledFirstName] [This.GetSheHe] did good, I will

I had not really expected anyone to truly care about the missing chalice, at the time it seemed more like an excuse to make as much noise and tumult as possible. I was proven wrong when [From.GetTitledFirstName] shook my hand and thanked me for finding the chalice.
Well... ehum... it was nothing, really
The sound of blade against blade makes me shiver and the fierce roars from the fighting men makes me want to run and hide.
Enough with your nagging! You can come along
There is no way you'll join us!
[From.GetTitledFirstName] saved me from a huge bear!
The beast was huge, bigger than any bear I had ever seen. I fought him bravely but only managed to slay him after he wounded several of my men.

I was one of the first to saddle my horse and chase after the bandits who had stolen one of the valuable chalices from our church. When I returned, exhausted and with filthy clothes, I was told the old priest had simply misplaced the chalice.
He appreciated my effort, at least
While searching for a lost chalice, I came upon a band of rogues who robbed me!

For the past two years, [Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName] has risked [Root.Liege.GetHerHis] life countless of times. A broken leg, a nearly fatal wound and an accident that might have left [Root.Liege.GetHerHim] blind has not slowed [Root.Liege.GetHerHim] down.
I was especially invited to my friend's sermon and it was a catastrophe! The poor man stumbled, lost his words and it was all an incomprehensible mess.
I didn't dare tell him that
[This.GetTitledFirstName] wants an opinion on his sermon

[From.GetTitledFirstName] seemed to appreciate my first sermon, even if [From.GetSheHe] did not put it in so many words. [From.GetTitledFirstName] just nodded and smiled when I asked if [From.GetSheHe] liked it.
I did not dare tell [From.GetTitledFirstName] what I thought about [From.GetHerHis] sermon, so I just smiled and nodded nervously when [From.GetTitledFirstName] talked to me.
An important guest arrived today and was most insulted when I, struck with tongue-tiedness, was unable to greet him.
I have avoided my courtiers for so long, one of them has started to mistrust me.
It is impossible to try and get a hold of [From.GetTitledFirstName]! [From.GetSheHeCap] always has some sort of excuse to get away from me, ignores me or even hides from me!
I am not that scary, right?

After ducking out of [From.GetTitledFirstName]'s sight, I realized that [From.GetSheHe] must have seen me and felt ridiculous. Oddly, the [From.GetManWoman] ignored me and seemed to have stopped taking notice of me.
I always knew my ambition would help me reach great places and to acquire some wealth during the way is always a nice bonus.
I have risen so fast to the top that other people regard me with envy.
Could they be any more envious!
[From.GetTitledFirstName]'s ambition has helped [From.GetHerHim] get where [From.GetSheHe] wanted to go.
[From.GetTitledFirstName] begged me to help [From.GetHerHim] become as successful as me. It was almost disgusting how [From.GetSheHe] admired my ambition and success.
I'll teach you but I gotta charge you
I told the priest about my ambitions and asked if there were anything he could do to help me.
I know that one of my slothful courtiers is capable of more than he realizes. I want to push the courtier into being more ambitious, I believe there's great potential in that one.
It is for both our best
[This.GetTitledFirstName] is driven to be more ambitious
I don't need to do this
It's hard being friends with someone more ambitious than yourself, and lately [From.GetTitledFirstName] has been pushing me to exert my talents beyond my limits.
It is for my own good
It is apparently annoying to be friends with someone more ambitious than yourself, why else would [From.GetTitledFirstName] ignore me?
[From.GetSheHeCap] got a green-eyed monster on [From.GetHerHis] shoulder
My subtle ways of pushing [From.GetTitledFirstName] into showing [From.GetHerHis] true potential has worked wonders! It is as [From.GetSheHe] has realized how fun it can be to be ambitious.
I give myself a pat on the back
I am happy with my place in life, I can't think of anything I would rather do than just take care of myself and my friends.
Being around [From.GetTitledFirstName] makes me feel calm and satisfied. The contentedness of [From.GetHerHim] is contagious and all the world's trouble seem less frightening.

I have feared for [From.GetTitledFirstName] sanity, [From.GetSheHe] has not been [From.GetHerselfHimself] lately. To help ease [From.GetHerHis] problems, I made [From.GetHerHis] join me in the garden to relax and just talk about whatever [From.GetSheHe] needed to talk about.
I would be content with visiting the church every other Sunday, but if I don't show up the priest scolds me and tells me I should set a better example for my subjects.
My content lifestyle costs a bit, but I don't mind paying for it.
It's not that expensive after all

Yesterday I found a book and read it for a while, then I put it somewhere and went for a walk in the garden, vaguely thinking I should get back to it later. Today, I found the book again but couldn't remember what it was about so I started reading it again.
Someone in your court think you should be more ambitious
[From.GetTitledFirstName] just drifts around, doing nothing productive and nothing interesting. If only [From.GetSheHe] could get off [From.GetHerHis] butt and be more ambitious!
I shall talk to [This.GetTitledFirstName] about [This.GetHerHis] lack of ambition
There are people who think I should be more ambitious and find something to strive towards.
My subjective opinions have always given me more praise than criticism.
Who knew being arbitrary could be good?

I stood by the stained glass windows and tried to look through them when the priest approached me and asked me what I thought about them. A courtier by my side spoke before I managed to say some very unfair opinions about the multitude of colors used.
It saved me, but only for a minute.
[From.GetSheHeCap] is too arbitrary to voice [From.GetHerHis] own opinion!
It was a bit flattering, really
The priest thought it to be unfair

When [From.GetTitledFirstName] had told the priest what [From.GetSheHe] thought about the stained glass windows, both looked inquiring at me until I managed to croak something appraising about the windows, using some of [From.GetTitledFirstName]'s opinions. The priest seemed satisfied and [From.GetTitledFirstName] beamed at me.
It seems like I've got an admirer
My arbitrariness just cost me several gold coins!
I tend to let female thieves and bandits get away with lighter sentences than men. I might condemn a woman to a few months in prison whilst a man might get one of his hands chopped off.

I have noticed that [From.GetTitledFirstName] favors female thieves over male ones, giving the women lighter sentences. Men often loses one hand while women get condemned to a couple of months in jail.
I have no problem with that
[From.GetTitledFirstName] seems upset with my arbitrary nature.
I didn't think anyone had noticed that I give lighter sentences to women than men, but [From.GetTitledFirstName] was all in favor of giving men more severe punishments than women.

I could not help but overhearing the stablemaster and a courtier's animated discussion. Something about a horse and a payment due today, but the courtier insisted to pay the stablemaster later that week.
The argument is resolved between [This.GetTitledFirstName] and the stablemaster

A rather heated discussion between myself and the stablemaster caught [From.GetTitledFirstName]'s attention and after listening to us both [From.GetSheHe] settled the matter between me and the stablemaster in a fair way. I got the horse, the stablemaster got the coin.
I settled the matter between [From.GetTitledFirstName] and my stablemaster, I tried to be as just as I could.
They still won't speak with each other...
A murmur was heard through the room when I judged the felon to death. It was a just sentence, if perhaps a bit harsh.
I was about to lose a bet and although I felt inclined to cheat, I had to be just even though it cost me some gold.
Word stood against word, the farmer's against a courtier's about damage caused to the farmer's house by a cow owned by the courtier.

It was a rather trivial matter that I wanted [Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName] to solve, an argument between a lowly farmer and myself. The farmer claimed I should pay for the damage caused to his house by my cow.
Fine, I'll pay for the reparations!
[From.GetTitledFirstName] made me pay for the damages!
I was prepared to pay for the damages...
[From.GetSheHeCap] was happy to pay for the reparations
[From.GetTitledFirstName] was not happy with my decision.
Did [From.GetSheHe] really wish to pay for the reparations?
[From.GetSheHeCap] should just pay for the reparations

I was in a rather cynical mood when I stumbled into one of the courtiers eating cookies outside the kitchen. The courtier apologised several times and then offered me a cookie as an apology for being in my path. Then the cynic in me got the best of me and I lost myself in cynical comments about how the courtier were trying to poison me with baked goods, probably spoken out loud.
I'm sorry but that cookie looked suspicious!
One cynical comment after another... I could not take it anymore, I even tried to bribe [From.GetTitledFirstName] so [From.GetSheHe] would shut up and stop firing cynical remarks at me!
[From.GetTitledFirstName] wants me to stop being cynical. That is a promise I will not be able to hold but I won't disturb [From.GetHerHim] anymore.
I hope that is enough, but probably not
My cynical comments have made people look at things my way. I have created more cynics.
No way they will keep up with me
Everybody lies and the courtiers in [Root.Location.GetName] are no exception. One of them dared to speak up and tell me I'm too cynical and not everybody lies.
Then I knew they all lied!
I have grown tired of the cynic ways of [From.GetTitledFirstName] and [From.GetHerHis] conviction that everybody lies.
For example, I never lie... ehum...
After [From.GetTitledFirstName] told me not everybody lies I almost started laughing. I told [From.GetHerHim] that if [From.GetSheHe] could prove that, I would start believing in mankind again.
I expressed my views on the whole religion and 'God' thing a bit too loud and got into a lot of trouble with a priest because of it.
Being a zealous defender of the church at all times, I believe I did the right thing when I gave the order to imprison a blasphemous pagan who dared criticise my faith and my church.
I watched, partly horrified, partly filled with admiration, as the blasphemer was dragged out of the dining hall and into [From.GetTitledFirstName]'s prison.
It was the right thing to do
I was still shaking with rage at the pagan's blasphemous words when [From.GetTitledFirstName] took the opportunity to whisper: 'Good work' in my ear.
Thank you, I really needed that!
My zeal and religious beliefs has led me to become more respected and given me more prestige for every day.
If I had known this sooner...
There's always something to do in the [Root.Religion.GetName] church. The more time I spend there, the more I appreciate the calm and I feel more connected to my God.
Is there anything else I can do?

Ever since [From.GetFirstName] became engaged in the church's different activities, or, rather, started following every order from the priest and wasting time, [From.GetSheHe] has stopped spending time with me.
[This.GetTitledFirstName] is obsessed and I will tell [This.GetHerHim] that!
I have had little time for [From.GetTitledFirstName] since I became engaged in the church's different activities.
The church is a greedy thing who always need more alms but I have deep pockets and it's for a good cause.

Something is rotten in [Root.Location.GetName]! I have had suspicions about a plot, maybe an assassination or something... horrifying unraveling in front of my unseeing eyes and I will find out what is going on!
I think I have found the culprits!

I and the cook did not really plan to humiliate [From.GetTitledFirstName], just try to get [From.GetHerHim] off [From.GetHerHis] high horses and maybe the fall could've lessen [From.GetHerHis] paranoia.
At least [From.GetSheHe] calmed down a bit
You got us! Please don't hurt us...

I caught the cook and [From.GetTitledFirstName] plotting against me! When I confronted them they denied it at first but broke down eventually and confessed that they were planning to humiliate me, how they planned to do that they refused to say.
I forgave them, even though it was hard

Everytime I ride out to hunt, I hear an arrow whiz past me and it is only because I anticipate it I can avoid it. No one else seem to notice it and I have stopped trying to convince my friends that it is real.
I have never found the arrow...

My supper was brought to me by a courtier I almost trust, but the smell and the color of the soup was highly suspicious. After tasting it, I threw the bowl at the courtier, narrowly missing with just an inch or two.
Are you trying to poison me?!
I have put up with the accusations, the distrust and especially [From.GetTitledFirstName]'s paranoia, but everyone has a breaking point and I will soon reach mine.
I better tell [This.GetHerHim] I won't put up with [This.GetHerHis] paranoia any longer!
The thrown bowl and my accusations about [From.GetHerHim] trying to poison me greatly upset [From.GetTitledFirstName] and I fear I might have lost my friend's respect.
I tried talking to people about the harrasment and stalking but they ignored me or started laughing.
My friend became aghast when I told him that I had sent the miller's boy to a nearby city with my finest stallion. 'You will never see that horse again', he said, utterly convinced.
But he was wrong, of course
I was fed up with a courtier's constant nagging about a decrepit bridge in need of fixing and decided to inspect it myself.

The bridge I wanted [From.GetTitledFirstName] to inspect burst under [From.GetHerHis] unwary feet and [From.GetSheHe] only just managed to grab hold of my hand and the edge of the broken bridge. I saw how [From.GetHerHis] fingers began to slip and, grasping [From.GetHerHis] wrists, ordered [From.GetHerHim] to let go of the bridge and as [From.GetSheHe] did exactly that, I pulled as hard as I can and dragged [From.GetHerHim] back to safety.

If I had not trusted [From.GetTitledFirstName], I wouldn't be alive. I was hanging from the broken edge of the bridge with my one hand and the other was firmly held by [From.GetFirstName]. The bridge was about to break when [From.GetSheHe] told me to let go of the bridge and as I did that [From.GetSheHe] pulled me up onto the bridge and saved me.
It was a bad idea to lend money to a person I had never met before, but I trusted the man and his idea so I gave him some money to help him make his dream come true.

I was a bit distracted when I handed my buzzard to a courtier, I was watching another of my birds who were about to catch another rabbit and did not realize that the eager courtier had no clue of what to do with the buzzard.
I offered [From.GetTitledFirstName] to hand the buzzard over to the falconer but was careless enough to forgot to put on its hood and then lost my grip on the jesses as the bird flew to freedom.
I must tell [This.GetTitledFirstName] that I lost [This.GetHerHis] buzzard
This is the last time I trust someone with my birds! [From.GetTitledFirstName] was supposed to give my buzzard to the falconer but slipped and lost [From.GetHerHis] grip of the bird and it escaped.
I will never see her again!
My celibacy is starting to get on my [Root.Spouse.GetHusbandWife] [Root.Spouse.GetFirstName]'s nerves and [Root.Spouse.GetHerHis] advances are getting a bit desperate and annoying.
I won't give in to [Root.Spouse.GetHerHis] temptations!
Okay, but just for one night...
Who am I kidding? I can't resist [Root.Spouse.GetHerHim]!
It feels like weeks since someone touched me! [From.GetTitledFirstName]'s celibacy and dismissal of my advancements makes me feel unwanted.
Maybe I should try it [From.GetHerHis] way?

I tried to not show how flattering it was to be asked about celibacy and if I had some sort of advice. I did not have time at the moment to go into depths on the subject so I asked if we could meet someplace tomorrow to philosophize about celibacy.
I hope they will show up!
The idea of celibacy has always appealed to me but I would really like to talk about it with someone before I make up my mind and decide if I would venture down the road of abstinence.
[This.GetTitledFirstName] is asked about [This.GetHerHis] vow of celibacy
Maybe I should live a little before making this decision

A young [From.GetManWoman] asked me many questions about celibacy, why I had decided to take this vow and if I had any advice on what [From.GetSheHe] should do. I told [From.GetTitledFirstName] that the decision was [From.GetHerHis] own and that celibacy was not for everyone.

I can't help it but every time I see one of my vassals a somewhat smug smile creeps up on me and I can't get rid of it! I know too much about them, all their little secrets and shames are mine to share or keep to myself.
I should strive to keep that smile from my face

That smug 'holier than thou' smile [From.GetTitledFirstName] always have when [From.GetSheHe] sees me is devastating for my self-confidence. It is as if [From.GetSheHe] knows a dirty secret about me no one else knows about, and all I want to do is scream that nobody is perfect and everyone can fall, but some have a higher horse to fall from and I hope [From.GetTitledFirstName] will learn that!
[This.GetTitledFirstName]'s smile will be wiped from [This.GetHerHis] face!

[From.GetTitledFirstName] managed to wipe the smug smile off my face when [From.GetSheHe] confronted me about it. I accidently spilled some of the secrets I know and [From.GetSheHe] scoffed at them, telling me that 'everyone has sired or conceived a bastard' which is not exactly true but still made me feel...

We walked through the village, lashing our skins with whips for every step we took. As a [Root.GetTitle] this felt slightly humiliating but I stood tall and continued my pilgrimage together with my fellow flagellants.

[From.GetTitledFirstName] walked together with the others throught the streets of [From.Location.GetName], praying and flagellating [From.GetHerselfHimself] with a a cattail whip made of knotted cords.
Even before [From.GetTitledFirstName] opened [From.GetHerHis] mouth, I knew [From.GetSheHe] would comment on the pilgrimage I took while flagellating myself.
It has come to my knowledge that one of my courtiers could teach me more about history and other subjects I feel I have neglected.
Ask nicely if he could teach me
Bribe the courtier into teaching me
[From.GetTitledFirstName] is going to ask me any minute now if I can teach [From.GetHerHim] more about the subjects [From.GetSheHe] lacks knowledge of.
[From.GetSheHeCap] asked nicely if I could teach [From.GetHerHim]
After numerous lessons I grew a bit bored but endured several more before [From.GetTitledFirstName] declared that [From.GetSheHe] could not teach me any more.
Our shared love for books should help me win the friendship of a stubborn courtier. I should be able to find the booklover in the library...
Seek the stubborn courtier in the library
I should leave the courtier alone

While reading one of my favorite books in the library, a book of hours from [Root.Location.GetName], [From.GetTitledFirstName] entered with much ado. Irritated, I put the book back in its proper place and tried to leave without [From.GetTitledFirstName] taking notice, but [From.GetSheHe] managed to intercept me and started talking about the book of hours I had read.
I didn't know [From.GetSheHe] liked books! That's great!

When I got to the library I intercepted [From.GetTitledFirstName] just when [From.GetSheHe] was about to leave. Desperate, I saw that the book [From.GetSheHe] had been reading was one of my own favorites, the book of hours from [From.Location.GetName] and asked what [From.GetTitledFirstName] thought about it.
I think I got through to [From.GetTitledFirstName]!
[From.GetSheHeCap] was as polite but aloof as always

Did that child of mine like myths and legends or is it more interested in history? I choose between a book filled with fascinating legends and one, somewhat dryer tome filled with history about battles and politics.
It is always interesting when my [GetFromRelation] [From.GetTitledFirstName] is trying to interest [From.GetHerselfHimself] in me. Wonder what it'll be this time...
Myths and legends? What am I, five?!
I was not entirely sure if my [GetFromRelation] [From.GetFirstName] enjoyed the stories I told [From.GetHerHim], but I kept reading until we both were nearly asleep.
My [GetFromRelation] was apparently embarrassed by my choice of bedtime story
A new load of books arrived and I can barely fit the new books in the overcrowded library. Maybe it is time to build a new one?
Maybe I should relocate some of the books to our bedchamber?
I do feel I have enough books now
If I remove this wall I could get plenty more space for my books
[This.GetTitledFirstName], whose room you are planning to redo, would not like that
I had patience with [Root.Spouse.GetFirstName]'s obsession with books until they started to invade our bedchamber.

I had noticed that [From.GetTitledFirstName]'s obsession with books had increased during these last weeks, but I hadn't realized to what degree until I overheard [From.GetHerHim] talking to a master building about demolishing the wall between my rooms and the library in order to get more space for [From.GetHerHis] books!
Time to pack my bags, I guess
[From.GetTitledFirstName] believes I am obsessed with books! I am not a book addict! I just love reading them, smelling them, caressing them...
Oh God help me! I do have a problem!
My favorite rose bush was about to burst into bloom with the largest, reddest and most beautiful rosebud opening its petal last. I decided to give it to someone, but who?
[Root.Spouse.GetFirstName] is given the most beautiful rose from [Root.GetFirstName]'s garden
That pretty little thing might like the rose...
[This.GetTitledFirstName] is given the most beautiful rose from [Root.GetFirstName]'s garden
I will keep it for myself
[From.GetTitledFirstName] gave me a pretty rose from [From.GetHerHis] garden. It smelled as beautiful as it looked.

[From.GetTitledFirstName] loved the rose and thanked me profusely. I think I was this close to get a peck on the cheek but [From.GetSheHe] must have realized that that wouldn't be proper, making [From.GetHerHim] blush almost as red as the rose and then [From.GetSheHe] almost ran away.

[From.GetTitledFirstName] did not seem happy at all when I presented [From.GetHerHim] with the rose. Despite its fragrance and beauty [From.GetTitledFirstName] thanked me stiffly and left as soon as possible.
I don't think [From.GetSheHe] liked the rose
No matter what I tried my vegetables and flowers never sprouted and grew as large and beautiful as one of my courtiers'.
I shall have the secrets of the garden!
[This.GetTitledFirstName] and the secret of the cow's manure
My garden is wilting before my eyes! Please help!
I will buy the secret from the courtier!
No! I will save my garden myself!

[From.GetTitledFirstName]'s garden looks miserable, the vegetables are wilting and the flowers are unable to spread their petals due to lack of water and nutrients. My garden, however, prospered and was bound to give me a rich harvest
And now [From.GetTitledFirstName] demands I tell my secret!
The stinking secret will be revealed!
[From.GetTitledFirstName] asked me what my secret was
[From.GetSheHeCap] was so desperate [From.GetSheHe] paid me to reveal my secret

[From.GetTitledFirstName] revealed a stinking secret to [From.GetHerHis] green fingers, [From.GetSheHe] uses manure from cows and sheep to give [From.GetHerHis] plants nutrients that they supposedly need.
Will my vegetables and flowers stink as much as this muck?

A new sort of roses has arrived to [Root.Location.GetName] by the means of a travelling merchant. The price he demanded for it was outrageous but I was still tempted to buy it as his description of the damask rose were that of a rose most fragrant and roseate in color.
I hope my [Root.Spouse.GetFirstName] will love the rose, too
It will look divine among the other roses
Although, I must admit the new Damask rose is adorable and complements our garden, the price [Root.Spouse.GetFirstName] paid for it was intimidating.
I must make sure [Root.Spouse.GetSheHe] doesn't spend all our money on such frivolous things
If it makes [Root.Spouse.GetHerHim] happy, I should encourage it
The new Damask rose is adorable and complements the garden, but the price [From.GetTitledFirstName] paid for it was intimidating.
It's such a frivolous thing to spend money on
[From.GetTitledFirstName] chided me about the Damask rose I had bought. Even if [Root.Spouse.GetSheHe] loved it and thought it complemented the garden, the price had been too costly.
It's my garden and I'll do what I want with it!
Fine! I won't buy any more expensive plants

[From.GetTitledFirstName] praised the new rose but was astounded when I let slip how much it had cost. [From.GetSheHeCap] told me I should be more careful with money, even if the rose complemented the garden it had cost a little bit too much to justify it.
It's my money and I'll do what I want with it!
Yes, I know and I won't do it again

A beehive in one of the hollow trees in the garden should be filled with honey by now. As the bees had started to behave aggressively and had stung several people from my court, I decided to remove the nest and salvage the honey.
Ouch! This hurt more than I had imagined...
I need someone to help me in my next scheme! A wonderful book has been discovered by a close friend of mine but he refuses to give or sell it to me!
I will bribe someone to help me!
I don't think anyone wants to help me

I had also heard about the book [From.GetTitledFirstName]'s friend had found when he inventoried his father's library. Unfortunately, this friend refused to sell the book to [From.GetTitledFirstName] and I despaired of ever getting to read it.
[From.GetSheHeCap] demands that I help [From.GetHerHim] obtain the book!
[From.GetSheHeCap] asked nicely if I could help [From.GetHerHim] obtain the book

With our united efforts it was a cinch to procure the book from my friend. [From.GetTitledFirstName] had been a bit sceptical to my plan first but [From.GetHerHis] desire to lay hands on the book overcame [From.GetHerHis] fear of getting caught.

I knew one of the courtiers was a member in a highly secret group called 'The Esoteric [Root.Religion.GetName]' and as a mystic this sounded fascinating! I wanted in, no matter what the price might be.
I will keep nagging until I get in!
The group is not for the pious!

I have tried to keep 'The Esoteric [Root.Religion.GetName]' a secret from [From.GetTitledFirstName] but [From.GetHerHis] curiosity and an unfortunate coincidence made [From.GetHerHim] aware of the group. I felt compelled to include [From.GetTitledFirstName] or else 'The Esoteric [Root.Religion.GetName]' might not be a secret anymore.
I will scare [From.GetHerHim] away with a dangerous initiation
A skill-based initiation should scare [From.GetHerHim] away
Maybe [From.GetSheHe] will tire and stop inquiring

My inquiries led me to [From.GetTitledFirstName] and when I started bombarding [From.GetHerHim] with questions [From.GetSheHe] tried to convince me there was no such thing as 'The Esoteric [Root.Religion.GetName]' but I kept going until [From.GetSheHe] gave up. [From.GetSheHeCap] told me that I needed to go through a dangerous initiation to become a member of the group.

My inquiries led me to [From.GetTitledFirstName] and when I started bombarding [From.GetHerHim] with questions [From.GetSheHe] tried to convince me there was no such thing as 'The Esoteric [Root.Religion.GetName]' but I kept going until [From.GetSheHe] gave up. [From.GetSheHeCap] told me that I needed to go through a skill-based initiation to become a member of the group.

I did not think [From.GetTitledFirstName] would agree to the initiation and I had a hard time figuring out what [From.GetHerHis] initiation should be like. I decided that, despite what I had told [From.GetTitledFirstName], I would give [From.GetHerHim] a skill-based dangerous initiation: [From.GetSheHe] would have to handle alchemical substances and make a love potion!
[From.GetSheHeCap] made an excellent love potion! It even worked!
Still, I won't let [From.GetHerHim] become a member

It was hard and dangerous work, the alchemical compounds was both flammable and poisonous and I feared the love potion would not be good enough, might even poison or kill those who ingested it. It was tested on a swineman and a milkmaid, who immediately fell in love and into the hay stack.
I'm a proud member of 'The Esoteric [Root.Religion.GetName]'!

I don't know what went wrong with the love potion, the alchemical compounds did not react to each other as I was used to. It poisoned the swineman and milkmaid we tried it on, nobody died but they had to stay in bed for a week or two...

The liquid dripped through the labyrinth of glassbottles blown in various forms and sizes. As it reached the end of the funnel, a drop of the liquid quivered on the edge before it slowly fell towards the awaiting bowl.

As the liquid slowly but steadily dripped into the bowl I waited eagerly for the substance to cool down. When finally every last drop was in the bowl darkness enveloped the castle and I had to light a candle to properly examine the liquid, which exploded.
What will [Root.Spouse.GetFirstName] say when [Root.Spouse.GetSheHe] sees my face?
The disappointment I felt when the liquid solidified was quickly replaced by joy when I realized that, instead of a Philosopher's Stone, I had created...
This illness is slowly killing me, sucking the life out of my bones and brain. I hope the potion I am preparing will heal me of my illnes, I fear it might kill me but I am willing to take the risk!
Small blue butterflies flies around my head and their tickling wings makes me laugh.

When the last drop of the potion had ran down my throat and nothing spectacular had happened, as in it making me violently sick or blow me to pieces, I opened my eyes and took a deep breath. I felt wonderful!
I encrypted the formula for the health potion so well that even I had trouble deciphering it. The main ingredient were mercury, if I understand my scribbling notes correctly.
I want to test it on someone!
I was desperate for a cure, the sickness seemed to get worse for every day. I heard [From.GetTitledFirstName] had concocted something that [From.GetSheHe] could cure all illnesses.

I warned [From.GetTitledFirstName] that the potion wasn't perfect! When I tried to decipher my own decryptions I did not manage to get the right measurements for the ingredients and so I had to guess.
The potion worked like a charm, [From.GetTitledFirstName] told me [From.GetSheHe] had never felt so good ever before!
A metal worker named Perillos introduced a new invention of his today: a brazen bull. Intrigued by the design, I asked him to demonstrate it for me and the result was terrifying!

[From.GetTitledFirstName] bought a brazen bull today! The terrifying torture device was demonstrated and the agonising screams of its victim converted to the sound of an infuriated bull bellowing echoed throughout the courtyard.
I hope [From.GetSheHe] won't use it on me!
[From.GetTitledFirstName] did not like the brazen bull at all, [From.GetSheHe] ordered me to get rid of it!
[From.GetTitledFirstName] congratulated me on the purchase of a brazen bull, [From.GetSheHe] thought it would inspire fear in our enemies!
I decided to investigate if [From.GetTitledFirstName] had come to [From.GetHerHis] senses and gotten rid of the brazen bull.

No matter what I did to my prisoner, he refused to admit anything! Frustrated, I left him in the hands of a courtier only to return half an hour later finding a written confession with the prisoner's signature on it!
[This.GetTitledFirstName] might reveal the secret torture method
Fine! Then you can handle the torturing for now!
Look, I'll give you lots of gold if you teach me

When [From.GetTitledFirstName] had left the torture chamber and its victim in frustration over the man's stubborn silence, I decided to try my old skills on him. It did not take long before I had a written confession with the man's signature on it and [From.GetTitledFirstName]'s gratitude.
The nerve! [From.GetSheHe] demanded that I taught [From.GetHerHim]
[From.GetTitledFirstName] asked me nicely if I could teach [From.GetHerHim]
I will never reveal the secret torture methods!
The gold [From.GetSheHe] gave me will give [From.GetHerHim] the knowledge [From.GetSheHe] desires

It was horrifying but oddly satisfying to watch [From.GetTitledFirstName] demonstrate [From.GetHerHis] skills on a recently captured traitor. after demonstrating how much pain [From.GetSheHe] could cause before the man passed out, [From.GetSheHe] taught me how to cause maximum pain and damage but still keep the victim alive for several days, or even weeks.
I need a confession from one of my prisoners or else I have to release him. I would prefer not to have to use torture on him but maybe the mere threat would make him speak up!
[From.GetTitledFirstName] is notorious for [From.GetHerHis] torture methods and the mere description of what would be done to me if I did not confess was enough to make me wet my pants in horror.
I confess, please don't do that to me!

Would my prisoner [From.GetTitledFirstName], despite the colorful description of all the horrors that would be inflicted on [From.GetHerHim] if [From.GetSheHe] did not confess, refuse and force me to make reality of my threats?
I almost felt disappointed when [From.GetTitledFirstName] confessed
[From.GetTitledFirstName] refused to confess! Sharpen my tools!
It is time to pass my legacy to my child! The torture methods I have refined, the secrets only I and other master impalers know and the use of instruments of torture.
I hope the child will follow in my footsteps!
A child is asked to follow in [This.GetTitledFirstName]'s menacing footsteps

My [GetFromRelation] [From.GetFirstName] asked me if I wanted to watch a prisoner being tortured. [From.GetSheHeCap] wants me to become a master torturer, a Impaler, just as [From.GetSheHe] [From.GetHerselfHimself].
Of course! Do I get to use the brazen bull on someone then?

[From.GetTitledFirstName] is a natural! I would never have anticipated how fast [From.GetSheHe] learned the use of the instruments of torture and how [From.GetSheHe] came up with ingenious new ways of using them!
I am so proud of you, my [GetFromRelation]!

The disgust in [From.GetFirstName]'s face when I asked [From.GetHerHim] if [From.GetSheHe] wanted to watch me torture a prisoner was answer enough. My [GetFromRelation] would never follow in my footsteps!
I have been challenged to a duel! Although I am a great duelist, I still find the need for some training and the finest second in [Root.Location.GetName].
The greatest second will be mine!
I will ask the greatest second if he's willing to help me
For some gold he'll be willing to be my second!
I have no need for a second!
Through rumors I learned that [From.GetTitledFirstName] had been challenged to a duel and [From.GetSheHe] will probably ask me to be [From.GetHerHis] second.
I could not say no when [From.GetSheHe] asked so nicely!
A couple of gold coins and I agreed to be [From.GetHerHis] second
My opponent withdrew from the duel! I was able to learn something new from [From.GetTitledFirstName] though, so it did not feel too unnecessary to have troubled [From.GetHerHim].
I could not stand being insulted even one more time, so I slapped my insulter and thus, the glove was thrown.
Do you dare accept this challenge?
The minute [From.GetHerHis] hand hit my cheek I knew [From.GetTitledFirstName] challenge was serious. A duel, not to the death but to the first drop of blood spilled, is a matter of pride and honor!
There would be no honor in defeating you!
The first blood was spilled by me and as we both had agreed that was as far as we would take it I honorably refrained from plunging my sword into [From.GetTitledFirstName]'s heart.

I refused to surrender when [From.GetTitledFirstName] drew the first blood by cowardly slice my face from cheek to chin! Almost blinded by the blood I tried to keep fighting but the seconds caught hold of me and made me surrender.
That coward [From.GetTitledFirstName] refused to fight me! I won by default but it was a bitter victory.

Not a week goes by without me challenging or getting challenged by someone to a duel. It is mostly friendly duels, just something we do to have a bit of fun, to distract us from duties and responsibilities.
Of course, not everyone agrees with that!

Whenever I seek my [From.GetFirstName] I find [From.GetHerHim] either challenging someone to a duel or fighting someone in a duel. I shouldn't worry, the duels are never so serious that someone will get seriously wounded, it's mostly to first blood but still..
I should ask [From.GetHerHim] to stop duelling
I shouldn't interfere, the duelling makes [From.GetHerHim] happy

Although the duels between [From.GetTitledFirstName] and whoever [From.GetSheHe] has challenged or been challenged by never ends with one of the duelists severely wounded, only with smaller cuts and bruises, I still fear for [From.GetHerHis] life.
[From.GetSheHeCap] is happy, why should I interfere?

I had just finished a friendly duel and was on my way to my bedchamber for a change of clothes when [From.GetTitledFirstName] said [From.GetSheHe] wanted a word with me. As I had feared, [From.GetSheHe] asked me to be more careful and not accept nor challenge anyone to a duel for some time, preferably for ever.
Give up the one thing I live for? Never!
Fine, but just for a year, okay?

The city of [Root.Location.GetName] is famous for its swords and the people wielding them. I had been wanting to test my skill against a local or two, but I was minding my own business when a local noble indicated I had insulted him by throwing down his glove in front of me.
[This.GetTitledFirstName] chooses the weapon for the duel
I did not like the look of [From.GetTitledFirstName] and challenged [From.GetHerHim] to a duel. [From.GetSheHeCap] accepted and was gracious enough to allow me to choose weapon for the duel.
[Root.GetTitledFirstName] has chosen the weapon for the duel: a moorish cannon
[Root.GetTitledFirstName] has choosen the weapon for the duel: a forkful of pig dung
[Root.GetTitledFirstName] has chosen the weapon for the duel: swords
I laughed out loud when [From.GetTitledFirstName]'s second told me what kind of weapon we would use in the duel: a moorish cannon!
If that's what [From.GetSheHe] want to use...
What kind of foolishness is this?! I refuse!
I could not believe my ears when [From.GetTitledFirstName]'s second told me what kind of weapon we would use in the duel: a forkful of pig's dung!
It sounds disgusting but if that what [From.GetSheHe] choose...
I will not touch pig dung!

It came as no suprise to me when [From.GetTitledFirstName]'s second told me to bring my sword to the duel, I was just glad I didn't have to fight with a sledgehammer, or, [Root.Religion.GetName] forbide, something disgusting as pig dung!
I changed my mind, I won't fight you

As a devoted Hunter, I have filled my castle with many trophies from the wild beasts I have hunted and killed myself. Still, there is a place above my fireplace waiting for a special trophy: the head of a white hart.
The best hunter must help me fill the empty place!
A skillful hunter might step forward
Please, I need the best hunter alive to help me!
If it is gold you want I'll give you gold!
I will find the white hart someday...
I heard [From.GetTitledFirstName] is looking for a skilled hunter who could help [From.GetHerHim] hunt down a white hart as its head is the last trophy [From.GetSheHe] yearned for.
Somehow, [From.GetSheHe] found me and now demands my help!
[Root.GetTitledFirstName] helps [This.GetTitledFirstName] track and hunt a white hart
