[From.GetTitledFirstName] promised gold to anyone who would help [From.GetHerHim]!

I could never have done it without [From.GetTitledFirstName]'s hunting skills! After several day looking for trails and droppings we finally found a clear track. The white hart seemed to wait for my arrow and merely shivered when it pierced its heart.
The head looks great above the fireplace!
As I oversaw the hunting party's last preparations I realized we were one man short.
[This.GetTitledFirstName] is invited to join the hunt
Maybe one of my children wants to join us?
[This.GetTitledFirstName] is invited to join the hunt
My work as a [Root.GetJobTitle] is never done, so when [From.GetTitledFirstName] asked me if I wanted to join the hunting party I hesitated before I answered [From.GetHerHim]:
If it pleases my [From.GetLordLady], then I'll join you
There is too many things I need to get done, my [From.GetLordLady]
My [GetFromRelation] asked me if I wanted to join [From.GetHerHim] on the hunt. It would be several hours on horseback, not knowing if any game would be found nor if there would be any real hunt.
Ask me another time, I'm busy

[From.GetTitledFirstName] joined us for the hunt and almost immediately we found the tracks of a large herd of deer. Almost everyone managed to kill some game and [From.GetTitledFirstName] killed two.

I was disappointed to hear that [From.GetTitledFirstName] did not want to join the hunt, but it was probably for the best. Some hours after we finally had found some game to hunt, it started to rain and the tracks disappeared completely. We returned empty-handed.

A huge boar keeps me out of the forest, a wild beast whose grunting and squealing is heard throughout the forest whenever anyone dares to set foot in its territory. I cannot hunt and the swineherds cannot let their swine graze within the forest without being attacked.
My marshal [Root.job_marshal.GetTitledFirstName] should be able to deal with this
Marshal [Root.job_marshal.GetTitledFirstName] is given the task of dealing with the boar
My spymaster [Root.job_spymaster.GetTitledFirstName] should be able to deal with this
Spymaster [Root.job_spymaster.GetTitledFirstName] is given the task of dealing with the boar
When I approached the forest the boar started squealing and grunting, but did not show himself. [From.GetTitledFirstName] had sent me out with one order: 'Kill the boar!'
I'd rather hire a professional hunter
Even the dogs I brought with me recoiled when they heard the angry boar snarling and squealing menacingly.
The boar fought bravely but we killed him at the end
No one will think less of me if I hire someone to do this, right?

The boar's death cry could be heard miles away and when [From.GetTitledFirstName] returned from the successful hunt I greeted [From.GetHerHim] warmly. The cook took the boar away to prepare it for the feast.
[From.GetTitledFirstName] had paid a professional hunter to kill the boar
[From.GetTitledFirstName] lost a limb to the beast!
I waited eagerly for [From.GetTitledFirstName]'s return but when [From.GetSheHe] entered without the boar I could not hide my discontent.
Do I have to do everything myself?!
Take that useless [From.GetManWoman] away from my sight!
Now I have to pay a real hunter for this simple task!

I overheard a conversation between two courtiers, they discussed the superstitious minds of my councillors and his or her fear of the Wild Hunt. I decided to look into this and find out who this superstitious mind belonged to. Maybe I can have some fun with his or her fear of the Wild Hunt?.
My [Root.GetChancellorName], [Root.job_chancellor.GetTitledFirstName], is scared of the Wild Hunt!
My Marshal, [Root.job_marshal.GetTitledFirstName], is scared of the Wild Hunt!
My Steward, [Root.job_treasurer.GetTitledFirstName], is scared of the Wild Hunt!
My Spymaster, [Root.job_spymaster.GetTitledFirstName], is scared of the Wild Hunt!
My Lord Spiritual, [Root.job_spiritual.GetTitledFirstName], is scared of the Wild Hunt!

I had visited one of my favorite taverns in [Root.Location.GetName], drinking wine and listening to story tellers and musicians all night. The last story I had listened to was one about the Wild Hunt and as I slowly made my way to the castle I saw a great number of black, huge and hideous huntsmen riding on black horses, with jet-black dogs by their side. When I screamed and started running for my life, I heard the huntsmen broke out into familliar laughter.
Did you really try to scare me, [From.GetTitledFirstName]?

There were no real black horses in the stable, so we took the darkest ones and muddied them down, making sure when they had any white marks that they were covered. Then we all dressed in black and fetched the blackest dogs before we rode out to scare [From.GetTitledFirstName].

My poem went all wrong, the feeling I wanted to express lost among the words and the result was just a piece of spoiled pergament. This failure made me question my passion for writing poetry, even more so as the new poet at court had demonstrated his superior memory and mastery only yesterday.
Poet, make this piece of poetry better, now!
The poet will teach you the art of poetry
Poet, could you please help me? This piece of poetry is rubbish!
The sweet sound of money should make him eager to help me
I don't want him to think less of me as a poet!

Wherever I went, I would find [From.GetTitledFirstName] brooding over yet another of [From.GetHerHis] unfinished poems. I was not surprised when, after seeing [From.GetTitledFirstName] trying to tear up the parchment by hand, [From.GetSheHe] waved me forward when [From.GetSheHe] saw me and handed me the parchment.
It was irritating when [From.GetSheHe] demanded my help
It was flattering when [From.GetSheHe] humbly asked for my help
[Root.GetTitledFirstName] helps [From.GetTitledFirstName] find the poet inside of [From.GetHerHim]
Who can resist the sweet sound of gold?

Roses are red
Violets are blue
The sun shows its beauty
But true beauty is in you...'

Astonished, I noticed the tears in [From.GetTitledFirstName] as [From.GetSheHe] told me there was nothing more left for [From.GetHerHim] to teach me.
I couldn't have done it without you!

A farmer told me how his boar had managed to break into his neighbor's hoggery and the result was seven small piglets. Now his neighbor demanded compensation he can't afford and they need me to tell them what to do.
Give the neighbor four of the piglets
Keep one piglet each, the rest belongs to me
The thief was apprehended not long after he had robbed me and as he was caught in the province of [Root.Host.GetTitledFirstName] he was set to trial at [Root.Host.GetHerHis] court.
The thief will get what he deserves!
Mercy, cried the thief when [From.GetTitledFirstName] confronted and accused him of being the robber.
Throw him into the deepest dungeon and let him rot!
Hang him, that ought to teach him a lesson
I cannot wait until I hear what the thief's punishment is!
His hands was cut off! How horrible!
Without hands he will never steal again!
Poor thing! Thrown into that ghastly prison...
[From.GetTitledFirstName] thinks that I was just and gave the thief a suitable punishment.
[From.GetTitledFirstName] thought the punishment to be too harsh, I should have been more merciful.
Is this the thanks I get?
A group of robbers calling themselves the Band O'Brothers have been brought before me. The long list of all their crimes does not put them in good light.
Why would I care about some petty thieves?
Make them suffer before they die!
Such crimes will not go unpunished!
My spouse [Root.Spouse.GetTitledFirstName] is unfaithful! I'm certain about this!
I should ask [Root.Host.GetTitledFirstName] to help me!
[From.GetTitledFirstName] has dragged [From.GetHerHis] unfaithful spouse [From.Spouse.GetTitledFirstName] before me and insists I should punish [From.Spouse.GetHerHim].
This is a waste of my time
A couple of days in the dungeon will do [From.Spouse.GetHerHim] good
The issue is taken care of
[This.GetTitledFirstName] is not happy about the punishment
[From.Spouse.GetSheHeCap] will be locked in the stock
[From.GetTitledFirstName] decided not to punish [Root.Spouse.GetTitledFirstName] for [Root.Spouse.GetHerHis] infidelity!
I am being punished for being unfaithful to [Root.Spouse.GetTitledFirstName]!

Poachers have been seen in [Root.Location.GetName] so I should probably send my spymaster [Root.job_spymaster.GetTitledFirstName] and my marshal [Root.job_marshal.GetTitledFirstName] to investigate the matter.
They have more important things to do
Spymaster [Root.job_spymaster.GetTitledFirstName] and Marshal [Root.job_marshal.GetTitledFirstName] will search for poachers
I took two poachers in the act! Two young boys, who looked as if they never eaten a decent meal in their lives, had two dead rabbits and a live one in a snare.
[From.GetTitledFirstName] caught two young poachers in my forest with a couple of dead rabbits at their belts and a live one in a snare.
[This.GetTitledFirstName] is informed about the poacher's punishments
The law demands their death by hanging
They must be starving! Release them
Kill them and mount their tarred heads above the gates!
I wonder what kind of punishment the poachers will get...
They are to be hanged? That is too harsh!
I hope I can change [This.GetTitledFirstName]'s mind!
Hope the loss of their ears learnt them a lesson
Cutting their ears off? That's barbaric!
The only good poacher is a dead poacher
[From.GetTitledFirstName] approves of my just treatment of the poachers.
[From.GetTitledFirstName] tried to protest against the poacher's punishment, but it was too late. [From.GetSheHe] thought I should have been more merciful.
Cattle has mysteriously disappeared from herds all throughout my land. Luckily, my bailiff found the rustlers.
The cattle has been returned, no sanction needed
Thievery is punished by cutting off the hands...
Another day, I would have spared their lives. Not today.
The coldest, darkest cell is reserved for scum like this!
I managed to stop the enraged villagers before they did anything hasty to the young, beautiful woman they accused of witchery.
She hasn't done anything wrong, release her!
She should be put to the ordeal by water
She will confess her sins after some time in the torture chamber
Someone so beautiful must be a witch!

The priest accuses a couple of villagers of blasphemy after he heard them take the Lord's name in vain. The blacksmith did it when he hit his thumb with the hammer, the stablemaster when a horse kicked him and the cook when a rat fell into the stew.
A couple of days in the dungeons should be fine
Only the cook should be punished, I could have been poisoned!
This is a disgrace! They should be hanged!
It all happened so quickly I barely registered the events. A noble had been attacked and was dragged away from us by the kidnappers!

The kidnappers overpowered me and made sure I could not call for help by stuffing a filthy rag into my mouth! Luckily, they did not get far away with me, [From.GetTitledFirstName] and the guards managed to free me and capture them.
Make sure they are severely punished!
I owe my thanks to [This.GetTitledFirstName] and my guards
[From.GetTitledFirstName] was subject to an attempted kidnapping today and [From.GetSheHe] is clearly shocked by the experience.
The offenders will be dealt with according to the law.
Put the offenders in the darkest dungeon, never to be released
A rumor about a spy sneaking around in my own castle was confirmed this morning when I caught him red-handed.
Should I throw him into the dungeon?
I will kill him with my bare hands
The peasants told the whole castle about a 'dragon' they saw in the forest and now the eager young men keep nagging me about a true dragon hunt.
Some gold might shut them up
Fearsome dragon, thou doth not scare me
I will kill it and hang its head over the hearth
The falconer is expecting me as a new hunting bird has arrived and awaits my inspection.
Just tell him I am busy
I need to go hunting right now!
Is it bigger than a chicken?
After a futile hunting trip with my guests, my face still burned with shame when the gamekeeper told me about deer parks.
It will probably cost too much
The wolves' territory has crept closer to the castle and more sheep, pigs and chickens vanish each day.
The wolves are not to blame
Every village will fight them together!
Give me my sword, I'll deal with them
Giggles, laughter and wolf-whistles brought my attention to a puppet show. After watching the show for a while, I realized that one of the characters mocked me!
While pondering over the guest list for the banquet, I wondered if I should invite one of my friends.
My friend [From.GetFirstName] has invited me to a grand banquet.
Lots o'people and lots o'food... Good!
It wasn't until several weeks after the banquet I heard about it and wondered why I was not invited. Aren't [From.GetTitledFirstName] and I friends?
[From.GetTitledFirstName] confronted me about me not inviting [From.GetHerHim] to the banquet.
I did not want you there!
Peddlers selling all sorts of food, clothing, exotic spices and luxuries such as glass and jewels filled the town square with their wares and shouts.
There are a couple of things I need...
I don't like the merchants, but their wares are fine
I think fairs should be banned

The coldblooded destrier and the warmblooded charger ambled towards each other, their riders preparing to crush their lances against each other. I watched the destrier crash to the ground with its rider crushed beneath him.
Are they deliberately trying to kill themselves?
Ha! I could have done it better
A horse! A horse! My kingdom for a horse!
Let my doctor take a look at him
The week before the tournament was a stressful one. Stands for the spectators had to be erected, the knights who arrived needed housing and my armor had to be refitted.
Of course, I won't win anything
This is what I have been waiting for!

Jesters, minstrels, acrobats and dancers, all have gathered to perform at the festival. Inviting noises, tempting scents and alluring sights tries to lure people to various stands, performers and tents.
The dancers are actually pretty good
I must invite that minstrel to sing for me!
I saw a vassal with his stunning young wife by his side at the feast. I decided to make a toast to the lovely couple...
I hope you will live long and happy lives together...
I could've sworn the groom would drop dead when you consummated the wedding
Your wedding was nice, but I dare say this feast is better!
The grieving widow walked beside the hearse, tears streaming down her cheeks. The wailing of the mourners was heard all the way up to my chamber.
A travelling poet who calls himself a 'bard' arrived today.
If he does anything wrong I will break every bone in his body
As long as he stays away from me...
He can stay for as long as he likes
[This.GetTitledFirstName] reacts to [Root.GetTitledFirstName]'s feelings towards the bard
Maybe he can help me with my poetry...
I introduced a bard to [From.GetTitledFirstName] today and I do hope [From.GetSheHe] liked his poetry and songs.
[From.GetTitledFirstName] threatened to break the poet's bones!
[From.GetTitledFirstName] asked the bard for help with [From.GetHerHis] poetry!
I will thank [This.GetTitledFirstName] for [This.GetHerHis] great behavior!

[From.GetTitledFirstName], who had introduced the bard to the court, was not pleased with me promising to break the bard's bones. I tried to explain that I would only break the bones if the bard tried to do something unpleasant, but [From.GetTitledFirstName] did not accept that explanation.
I just wanted to protect everybody...
I found out that [From.GetTitledFirstName] had introduced the bard to the court and I told [From.GetHerHim] how much I appreciated that. Finally someone who can sing!
A man claiming to be a lord who disappeared seven years ago has found his way to my castle. He sings of the fair queen of Elfland and some say his songs are prophetic...
Just an old drunk. Throw him out!
I have no reason to believe him
He's finally found his way home then!
I'd love to hear him sing!

A troubadour and his wife the trobairitz has arrived from Occitania. Their performances range from vulgar satires to political sirventes and everything in between, including songs and poems of courtly love.
I hope they do not dare write any satires about me!
I remember those two, they came here last year!
They will be paid well, I assure you

The acrobats performed somersaults, cartwheels and tumbles with great skill. One of them arrived in a chest seemingly too small to hold a person but he showed us how he, by distorting his body, could fit into the chest.
They use snake oil to do that
Keep an eye on them, I do not trust them
Their skills are fascinating but unsettling
Hope he didn't dislocate his shoulder
I thought the food was superb, the wine mediocre and the dancers beautiful. Some of the more inebriated guests joined the dancers in a quadrille.
I think I'll join them too
Dance only leads to... well, you know
I thought I wouldn't have to dance!
[Root.Spouse.GetTitledFirstName] wants to dance, but I think I will keep on drinking
They do look like they are having fun
I think I'll need to pay them better

Its ragged fur and sorrowful eyes made the bear look pitiful, but when its trainer started playing his flute the bear started dancing. A light shone in his eyes and I swear I could almost see him smile.
I wonder how he does that
Keep him on a short leash, if he does anything...
Training a bear can't be too hard
We had a jolly great time dressed up as wild men, dancing chained together and appearing shaggy and hairy from head to foot. Too bad the fun was interrupted when a careless person set us on fire!
The pain... but it was worth it
I was saved from any greater harm by a courtier
Some fool poured spirits over me!
A book without a title was pushed into my hands by a hooded man clad in midnight blue. Something was said, but was lost in the confusion. The book was still there.
It wants me to read it....

The book is gibberish, but also enlightening. But, even if I struggle with some chapters, its mystery still engrosses me. Something is concealed in the book's language and I am determined to find out what.
The secret will soon be mine! Muhahaha... *cough* *cough*
Intense study of the book will follow
The book will be studied thoroughly

The 'secret' within the book still eluded me after several weeks of intense study, wasted time and wasted ink! The man couldn't be anything but a maniac, filling precious parchment with malarkey and incomprehensible symbols.
I learned to love books instead

It took me several weeks before the mystery of the book revealed itself to me. The gibberish parts were encoded and after many hours trying to decipher the code, I managed to break it and construct a key to make the book easier to read.
The mystery is still not solved...
A rather nettlesome neighbor keeps sending me envoys begging for money or demanding tribute. I feel rather confused about his arbitrary ways and I am not sure what I should do.
I will send him these roses
Nail the envoy's hats to their head!
My nettlesome neighbor has been rather quiet since I sent him his envoys back with their hats nailed to their heads.
Wonder what happens if I do like this...
A new punishment has been conceived
A letter arrived from my nettlesome neighbor not many days after the astonished envoys returned home. He was most grateful and deeply touched by the red roses I sent him.
They finally came to good use
Atone for thy sins!'\n\nMy subjects does not really like the new impaling punishment and, led by the priests, show their umbrage by throwing rotten tomatoes at me!
Maybe I should grow more roses?
The respect and prestige I got after nailing the hats to the envoys' heads has whetted my appetite. I have sent for a skilled torturer who will teach me more about torture and impalement.
My garden is the apple of my eye, my pride and joy. I distrust my gardener and would spend every hour of the day in my garden if I could.
If I could, I would spend all my time in the garden
I love my garden, but there are other things in life too
My eager courtship of a certain lady has gotten me nowhere, her icy response can cool even the warmest heart. I will not give up, there must be something I can do to win her affection.
My icy lady does not thaw...
I will perform heroic deeds of valor!
The heroic deeds has finally made the ice lady mine!
The heroic deeds leaves her cold...
My attempts to make her mine have been to no avail. She is as frosty as the lord of winter himself.
I struggled with the poem for several days and with a trembling heart, I sent it to her. Her response was warm and lovely, it seemed the ice princess finally has thawed.

I did not tell my heart's desire about my decision to perform heroic deeds of valor to win her heart but I started seeing her at every tournament, every duel I fought. She started smiling at me and laughed when I defeated my opponents in her name.
Her heart has thawed for me!

The largest, most prestigious tournament will take place in a province not far from here. The small victories I have won to make my special lady fall in love with me seem trivial now and I feel I have to win this so she will love me forever.
My best will not be enough, I must win!

For every poem I write and she receives, a bigger piece of her heart belongs to me. I have selected a couple of my and apparently her favorites and given to the monks to have them illustrated and written down properly.
I hope she will like it
The prestigious tournament just ended, with me as the sole winner. I could hardly believe it as the lady of my heart kissed me chastely on my cheek.
Can I stop doing this now?

I was mortified and then furious as the monk told me that they had liked my poetry so much they had produced several copies and sold them. The lady of my heart did not seem to care though, she just kissed me sweetly and thanked me but said she already got a copy.
I should be furious, but I am just happy
My work tasks bore me, conversations with my courtiers bore me, everything bores me! I need something new and exciting in my life.
Some hunting will cheer me up
Perhaps I should send for a new bird...
The hunt was a huge disappointment, no game in sight and my horse threw me off.
We started early, the sun had barely risen above the horizon. There was plenty of prey, the dogs caught many rabbits and I slayed one great boar before he killed my horse and myself.
The new bird had not been properly trained, it attacked one of the dogs and had to be killed before it released its grip on the poor, wailing hound.
Rabbit after rabbit was caught, killed and brought to me by my new bird.
I feel more relaxed now, I can do my tasks, talk to my courtiers and do other things without feeling too bored. Maybe I should hunt more often?
The new bird is almost too perfect. I enjoy every hunt with her, and the cook has trouble finding new recipes for rabbit.
A new bird has arrived to the mew and a new book on the art of writing poetry is in the library.
I should start reading the book
I should take her out for a hunt
This book about poetry is really boring. It is filled with do's and do not's and I just want to throw it out the window.
There are better things for me to do
The poetry book is really inspiring! I can feel creativity bursting through my body.
The new bird were more aggressive than the ones I'm used to. It killed many rabbits but were unwilling to relinquish its catch, it even attacked me when I tried to pry one away.
Maybe she's the wrong bird for me
My modest attempts to write poetry was never meant to be published in any way, but wherever I go, bards and minstrels are reciting or singing my poems.
My poetry was never meant for others!
The church preaches celibacy and my friends try to lure me into hedonism by showing me the pleasures of life. I can't really decide if I want to enjoy life or wait for heaven...
I hope celibacy doesn't bore me too much
A waste of money, a waste of time but oh so good it felt! The pleasures of life makes everything feel less tiresome and more... delightful!
The first few days felt manageable but then I started notice the other sex and felt envious of those who could indulge in sinful activities.
Just thinking of celibacy makes me shiver but at the same time, something seem amiss in my life. What is this emptiness inside of me?
I need to take a few days contemplating this
The temptations are everywhere! The inviting glances, the luscious bodies and the alluring fragrances...
No! I will not give in!
After a long, long, long time it feels as if I could bear to live in complete celibacy for the rest of my life.
This lifestyle of utmost pleasure and joyous life suits me perfectly. This can be nothing but heaven.
I should contemplate this some more
A strange, reddish-pink rash appeared on my palms and soles not long ago along with a fever and headache. Some parts of the rash has developed abscesses and is both ugly and itchy.
The rash disappeared and took the headache and fever with it.
First I lost my eyebrows and eyelashes, then my nose deformed. People fear me and I must hide my face as to not cause hysteria among others.
A man approached me and I tried to duck away from him, not let him see my disfigurement. He told me he had a cure and sold me a potion for only 25 gold coins.
The voices in my head are telling me to do horrible things!
I was later told that my strange behavior and fear of the moon was caused by the voices in my head. The [Root.Religion.GetPriestTitle] managed to clear my head of voices and now I have total silence.

I am speaking in tongues, screaming obscenities at random times, most often when the [Root.Religion.GetPriestTitle] preaches and am sometimes lying on the ground writhing in apparent pain. I seldom remember these things and people believe me to be possessed.
Vade retro satana!'\n\nThe priest's exorcism worked beautifully, I haven't spoken in tongues or screamed obscenities for several days!
My moodiness and tendency to lash out at people is getting worse. I sleep too little and can't seem to stop worrying.
This is a lot of pressure...
The world will not weigh me down anymore, I have a new spring in my step, joy in my heart and a smile on my face.
After a couple of days just spending some time doing things I love, hunting, reading and visiting friends, life does not seem as grey as it did before.
I don't feel too well, something is wrong with me. I am burning up with fever, my nose is running and my head feels as if someone is banging something hard against it.
The fever is gone and my nose is dry, the headache is long gone and I feel alive once again.
This cough is killing me! It started as chest pain and shortness of breath, then I started coughing up phlegm and now blood!
Something is very wrong with me
The cough disappeared, thank God! I still feel a bit weak but the coughing, the chest pain and the shortness of breath are gone.
When the hot cautery touched the open wound, I couldn't hold the scream back. I cursed the doctor who only laughed, told me to take it easy and not pick on the wound.
The old wound has finally healed, leaving a pretty grotesque scar behind.
My body may be sapless and infirm, but my mind is as healthy as ever!
Who are you? Oh, of course.
Where am I? Who are these people? Oh, pretty colors...
I haven't coughed for days and the pain is gone. Fate has granted me reprieve.
I feel weak as a babe, but the cursed fever has finally broken!
The spots are receding and the fever has broken. Am I really cured?
I am alive... I AM ALIVE!
It takes more to kill me than measly measles!
I think I made it through this cursed disease.
Slaying the king of the forest demands proper celebration with wine, singing and...
A small kitty is demanding your attention.
Narrowly avoiding capture by the forces of [From.GetTitledFirstName], I am now forced to raise the banner of rebellion.
My guards failed to capture [From.GetTitledFirstName], who has now raised [From.GetPossPronoun] flag in rebellion!
My liege has seen fit to throw me in the dungeon. My life might be forfeit.
[From.GetTitledFirstName] is now safely locked away in my dungeon, awaiting [From.GetPossPronoun] fate...
[From.GetTitledFirstName] managed to avoid my guardsmen and has fled to the court of [From.Liege.GetTitledFirstName].
I have been released from the dungeons of [From.GetTitledFirstName]!
My neck rests uneasily on the headsman's block as I await eternity. [From.GetTitledFirstName] has seen fit to end my life.
[From.GetTitledFirstName] has decided to spare my wretched life and banish me from the realm.
I woke up to loud shouts in the hallway outside my chambers. My guards had slain a would-be assassin, but another one got away.
My hired killers failed to slay [From.GetTitledFirstName], but my involvement remains unknown.
Three assassins disguised as pages jumped me on my way to my chambers. The guards saved my life, but not before I was stabbed in the side.
The pain is almost too much to bear. [Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName] curse the assailant who maimed me and managed to escape!
On the bright side, they did maim [From.GetHerHim]!
My trusty cook caught one of the kitchen staff poisoning my wine! Under torture, he admitted that [From.GetTitledFirstName] had paid him.
My assassins failed to kill [From.GetTitledFirstName]. Even worse, they divulged my name!
This will not help my reputation
I woke up to find a shadowy figure climbing in through the window. I yelled for help and the guards burst in, seizing the assassin just as he stabbed me in the shoulder.

My new chambermaid attacked me with a nasty little dagger. She took an eye out before the guards could subdue her. Before her speedy execution, she gave up the name of her employer - [From.GetBestName].
The hooded assassin got me! My vision is fading fast. May my kin avenge me!
Joyous news! [From.GetTitledFirstName] died choking on [From.GetPossPronoun] blood, not knowing the name of [From.GetPossPronoun] killer.
I must make sure the assassins stay silent...
I am dying! The veal was laced with poison! Such excruciating pain... but I die knowing who murdered me.
Good news! [From.GetTitledFirstName] died green and bloated like a toad. Unfortunately, the poisoner was apprehended and tortured until he blabbed my name.
My spymaster is planning retribution against [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName] for having attempted the assassination of [From.GetTitledFirstName].
Ask our Liege to settle this.
It's better to forgive and forget.
Our liege will evaluate our request.
[From.GetTitledFirstName] is asking us to deal with an assassination attempt inside our realm.
I will grant [From.GetObjectPronoun] a claim on the perpetrator's titles.
[From.GetTitledFirstName] has judged that our rival now have a legitimate claim on our title.
[From.GetTitledFirstName] has granted us a claim on our rival for their vile assassinations.
[From.GetTitledFirstName] has ordered the arrest of our rival for their vile assassinations.
[From.GetTitledFirstName] refuse to deal with our problems with a rival inside [From.GetHerHis] realm.
It seems my amorous adventures have resulted in a child - little [From.GetFirstName] is my spitting image.
Lady [This.GetFirstName], the mother, is most pleased
[This.GetTitledFirstName], the mother's husband, is most displeased...
My wife has borne the child of another man! I cannot believe this betrayal!
[Root.Spouse.GetFirstName] has not only cheated on me, but has legitimized his accursed spawn!
My sweet [Root.Spouse.GetFirstName] has acknowledged the bastard child he had with some slut.
[From.GetTitledFirstName] refuses to acknowledge our baby as his.
The baby, [From.GetTitledFirstName], is surely my husband's bastard, though darling [Root.Spouse.GetFirstName] denies it.
I am surely with child... my husband will be pleased.
Unmarried and pregnant... The fates have cursed me!
Oh dear, I must be with child. Will my husband believe it is his?
Fate smiles upon me, my wife [From.GetFirstName] is pregnant!
Tell [Root.FatherOfUnborn.GetFirstName] he will be a father
My [GetFromRelation] is pregnant, but I was away, wasn't I?
I am starting to think [From.GetTitledFirstName] might fancy me...
I awaken to the sound of my door creaking open... It's [Root.Liege.GetTitle] [Root.Liege.GetFirstName]!
Lady [From.GetFirstName] has spurned my subtle advances.
Lady [From.GetFirstName] screamed and made a fuss in front of my own guards!
My liege has a child in need of a guardian and mentor...
Send a letter to my liege

My liege, I hope fate finds you well! A child needs a proper guardian, and nothing would please me more than to offer my services as a mentor and tutor, if it pleases thee.\nYour humble vassal\n[From.GetTitledFirstName]
Send a letter to the vassal gracefully accepting the offer
Send a letter to the vassal gracefully declining the offer
My dear [This.GetTitle], your offer is most reasonable. We trust the child will be safe in your hands and will receive a proper upbringing. May our friendship last forever!\n[From.GetTitledFirstName]
My dear [This.GetTitle], your offer is deeply appreciated. However, we have someone else in mind as a guardian for our child. Peace be with you!\n[From.GetTitledFirstName]
I managed to flee from imprisonment but my escape from 'justice' caused me to become exiled and I cannot return to the country ever again.
After months of fights, arguments and tears, my spouse suggested separate bedchambers.
My new wife disgusts me! I cannot stand it anymore, I should annul our marriage!
I don't ever want to see you again!
No, wait! I changed my mind...
My spouse ended our marriage on grounds of non-consummation! I will not put up with this, I am [Root.GetTitledFirstName]!

I asked my [Root.Religion.GetName] father to annul my marriage but he had already been snared by the lies of my former wife! He told me to take her back or else he would place my lands under an interdict.
It irks me that my own son will not inherit the title! My husband's heir must be removed, but how?
Your husband finds out about the poisoning
A courtier finds out about the poisoning
Your husband accuses you of the death of his heir
[This.GetTitledFirstName] accuses you of the death of heir's death

My son and heir [Root.Heir.GetTitledFirstName]'s sudden illness could be the signs of poisoning! I know my wife [Root.Spouse.GetFirstName] well enough to suspect her, her ambition has always been that her son would inherit my title!
I will forgive her this little mishap

A courtier snuck up behind me and grabbed my arm. He hissed that he had seen me pour something into the heir's glass of milk only hours before he fell ill and wants some sort of bribe to keep quiet about the poisoning!
Whatever it is he wants, he'll get it!
I still have some poison left...
My son died today, poisoned by his own stepmother! I cannot ignore the fact that my beloved [Root.Spouse.GetFirstName] was cold-blooded enough to murder my son in favor of her own son.
Surely she didn't understand what she did?
My husband's son is dead! The only cloud on my otherwise blue sky is the courtier who claims he saw me poisoning the heir repeatedly until he died.
[Root.Spouse.GetTitledFirstName] threw me into the dungeon, accusing me of poisoning [Root.GetHerHis] son!
This is not how it should end!

My dear husband [Root.Spouse.GetTitledFirstName] blames my confused head for the poisoning, he seem to think I believed the poison was a miracle cure for his son's illness. I will let him believe that.
I knew I would get away with it

After both my son and my courtier had fallen ill with the same symptoms and no one else had been affected, one of the serving girls told me in confidence that she had seen my [Root.Spouse.GetFirstName] pour a drop of something suspiciously poisonous into the flagon of mulled wine my son and courtier had shared. Did my spouse deliberately poison my son, and, perhaps accidentally, my courtier?
Then she will spend the rest of her life imprisoned!
I will not show her any mercy!
She clearly did not know what she was doing...

Only one thing can explain my son [Root.Heir.GetFirstName]'s sickness: poison! I talked to several of my courtiers and servants who confirmed my suspicion: they all recalled my wife [Root.Spouse.GetFirstName] giving [Root.Heir.GetFirstName] something to eat or drink just before [Root.Heir.GetSheHe] fell ill.
May she rot in the Dungeon!
May she one day realize what she has done
I have no mercy for poisoners!
[Root.Spouse.GetSheHeCap] would never do such a thing!

I feel that [Root.Spouse.GetFirstName] is too affectionate towards a [Root.Spouse.GetManWoman] in the court and is starting to neglect me in favor of that [Root.Spouse.GetManWoman]! The love [Root.Spouse.GetSheHe] showers [Root.Spouse.GetHerHis] favorite with is beyond measure, I do hope they don't have a illicit and sinful union!
Mayhap I read too much into this, surely [Root.Spouse.GetFirstName] loves me!
I need to talk to someone, see if someone else has noticed this!

The whispers in court about me having favorites and 'showering them in a love that is beyond measure' and that I am having a 'illicit and sinful union' with a [Root.GetManWoman] at the court has grown in strength, with my [Root.Spouse.GetFirstName] as one of the gossipers! I need to stop these rumors before they reach the ears of my religious leader.

It had not escaped [From.GetFirstName] that I have favorites among the people of the court, but the things [From.GetSheHe] accused me of took my breath away. Me, having a 'illicit and sinful union' with a [Root.GetManWoman]? [From.GetFirstName] demands that I shower [From.GetHerHim] with the same love and attention I allegedly show my favorites.
I will show you that no one matters as much to me as you do!
Who I decide to shower with attention is none of your business!

When I had finished talking, [From.GetFirstName] looked at me for a long time. I grew more nervous with each passing minute, wishing I hadn't used the words 'illicit and sinful union' about [From.GetHerHis] relation with that [From.GetManWoman].
[From.GetFirstName] promised to pay me more attention!
[From.GetFirstName] refused to even consider paying me more attention!

The humiliation still burns through my body! I never meant for the gossip to reach [From.GetFirstName]'s ears, I only needed to talk to someone about my loneliness and my fear of [From.GetFirstName] having a love affair with a [From.GetManWoman], but the harsh words and the loathing in [From.GetHerHis] eyes made me wish I never uttered a word about my suspicions.
I don't know if [From.GetHerHim] will ever forgive me...

The thoughts of how I'll never be reunited with my family keeps tormenting me, how someone of my stature could possibly be locked up in a horrid place such as this is beyond me. In the depths of my despair the news reach me, my [Root.Spouse.GetFirstName] is trying to have me released!
I do anything I can to make [Root.Spouse.GetHerHis] work easier
I try to get in contact with [Root.Spouse.GetHerHim], ordering [Root.Spouse.GetHerHim] to speed things up
Who cares? It's not like [Root.Spouse.GetSheHe]'ll succeed

After getting a letter from [From.GetHerHis] spouse [From.Spouse.GetTitledFirstName], [From.GetTitledFirstName] insisted I would meet [From.GetHerHim] in [From.GetHerHis] keep. [From.GetSheHeCap] asked me to show mercy and release [From.GetHerHim] for a hefty sum of money [From.GetSheHe] obviously does not have.
Fine! But I want the gold to be delivered immediately!
Your insolence bores me. Into the dungeon with you!
[This.Spouse.GetTitledFirstName] will be warned about the consequences of freeing [This.GetTitledFirstName]
After my encouraging letter to [Root.Spouse.GetTitledFirstName] [Root.Spouse.GetSheHe] managed to send me a letter in return begging me to try and release [Root.Spouse.GetHerHim] as soon as possible.
I will send a firm but respectful letter to [Root.Spouse.GetHerHis] captor
I'm in the study doing research when the news reach me. [Root.Spouse.GetSheHeCap]'s dead. [Root.Spouse.GetTitledFirstName] died in prison before I was able to have [Root.Spouse.GetHerHim] released.
I'll never be able to stop blaming myself
Stupid [Root.Spouse.GetManWoman]! Here I am trying to save [Root.Spouse.GetHerHim], how dare [Root.Spouse.GetSheHe] die on me?
I blame [Root.Spouse.GetHerHis] family for this! They did nothing!
I was released from the dungeons of [From.GetTitledFirstName]!
I'm so happy I could cry!
I was yet again thrown into the dungeons...

Dear [Root.GetTitledFirstName], I strongly suggest you give up on the idea you might be able to rescue [Root.Spouse.GetTitledFirstName] from [Root.Spouse.GetHerHis] imprisonment and I will not be easily persuaded to release [Root.Spouse.GetHerHim]. You may never see [Root.Spouse.GetHerHim] if you do not stop your ridiculous attempts of freeing [Root.Spouse.GetTitledFirstName].\n\n[From.GetTitledFirstName]

Despite my letter warning [From.GetTitledFirstName] to give up [From.GetHerHis] attempts to rescue [From.GetHerHis] spouse, a letter arrived this morning telling me to release the [From.Spouse.GetManWoman] or else...
I have tired of this. Here, have your [From.Spouse.GetManWoman] back
Guards! Make sure the prisoner won't escape
My husband [Root.Spouse.GetTitledFirstName] has hired an incredibly annoying man to serve us. His rudeness knows no limits, and I have no idea how to handle him. He does not know his place.
I'll do my best to ignore him and trust my husbands decision
If possible I'll have him fired
I ask my [Root.Spouse.GetFirstName] to fire the annoying man
I have the man punished for his insolence
[This.GetTitledFirstName] becomes aware of [Root.GetTitledFirstName]'s distaste for the courtier

My wife [Root.Spouse.GetTitledFirstName] has asked me to get rid of one of my courtiers whom she finds mighty annoying. On one hand, [Root.Spouse.GetFirstName] might not be happy if I refuse her request, but if I fire 'the annoying man' maybe people will feel my wife has too much influence over my actions.
My [Root.Spouse.GetFirstName]'s happiness is more important to me
She should stay out of this!

Apparently, one of the courtiers has been annoying my wife [Root.Spouse.GetFirstName], and instead of asking me for help she took the matter in her own hands and made sure the courtier would never annoy her again or he'd know the consequences.
What on earth was she thinking?!
While walking alongside the river together with several people from the court, one of the courtiers keeps annoying me, so I decide to...
The young man I pushed into the river ended up drowning. Although it was an accident rumors of my deed spread quickly.
I'll send gifts to his family
I shall tell the public what happened
I never meant for this to happen!
Anyone speaking of the event will be punished

Wet, but otherwise unharmed, the courtier blasted me with foul words and angry but empty threats. Seeing him standing before me dripping mud and with algae entwined into his hair, I couldn't stop the laughter pouring out of me.

My wife [Root.Spouse.GetFirstName] has complained about me being absent so often, and so when I found that I had some extra gold to spend, I decided to buy her something nice. Maybe some sort of jewellery?
This bracelet would really bring out the... color in her eyes
Ruby earrings is exactly what she wants!
I think I'll just keep the gold...

I promised my wife [Root.Spouse.GetFirstName] that I would find a suitable ride for her when her mare had to be put down. Now I am in luck, not only one but three different mares have been brought to [Root.Location.GetName]!
The skewbald one looks a bit old but sweet
The white mare is a bit frisky, but she'll be fine
The black one is magnificent, a suitable match for my wife
Sorry honey, all these will be breeders
My wife [Root.Spouse.GetFirstName] was captivated by the grace and strength of the hunting birds and begged me for a bird.
A falcon would serve you well!
Too dangerous my love, I don't want you to overexert yourself

The stubborn baron of [Root.Location.GetName] is really getting on my nerves! My wife, [Root.Spouse.GetFirstName], sensed my irritation and offered to give me advice on the matter. Her diplomatic skill has saved me many times before...
...I hope she can save me now!
I can work this out myself, thank you very much!

Two competent contenders are fighting for a position in [Root.Location.GetName] training the levies there. My gut tells me to choose the younger man who has risen through the ranks fast, whilst my wife [Root.Spouse.GetFirstName] is urging me to choose the older man who have never risen above the rank of sergeant.
I trust my wife more than my gut
This is no business for a woman!

Gold pours from my hands but never finds its way back! The numbers and sums make no sense, twirling numbers mocking me appear every time I close my eyes. My wife [Root.Spouse.GetFirstName] has offered to help me, but I have refused every time she brings it up.
I give up! Honey, please help me!

I have my eyes set on a title, but my Spymaster [Root.job_spymaster.GetFullName] has advised me to forget about the title, saying I would invoke too much wrath if I try to claim it. My wife [Root.Spouse.GetFirstName], however, is doing everything but telling me outright that I should pursue the title.
My Spymaster is right, I should forget the title
I would invoke people's wrath if I follow my wife's advice!

The [Root.Religion.GetName] church's men are not always easy to deal with. I need to make sure I have their approval and I have both my wife [Root.Spouse.GetFirstName] and my Lord Spiritual [Root.job_spiritual.GetFullName] giving me advice on how to earn the approval of the [Root.Religion.GetName] churches men.
[Root.Spouse.GetFirstName] suggests I should offer to rebuild the church
[Root.job_spiritual.GetFullName] suggests I try to scare them into submission

[Root.Spouse.job_chancellor.GetFullName] is doing a somewhat good job as a [Root.GetChancellorName] but there is a contender for the title, one of my special male friends. I am slowly but stubbornly trying to make [Root.Spouse.GetFirstName] realize the potential of my friend, and now I am prepared to use the final and best argument to make him do as I want.
Do as I want or else...

My sweet [Root.Spouse.GetFirstName] is terrifying when she wants something, there is nothing she wouldn't do to make me bend to her will. Now she wants me to make one of her friends [Root.GetChancellorName], but [Root.GetChancellorName] [Root.job_chancellor.GetFullName] is a very competent man...
I will let her have her way just this once
Her 'friend' is not good enough to become [Root.GetChancellorName]

When I presented my ultimatum to my husband [Root.Spouse.GetFirstName], trying to make him choose my friend to be the new [Root.GetChancellorName], he reacted as I had anticipated. [Root.Spouse.GetFirstName] tried to argue with me, plead with me and even tried to scare me into submission, but I saw in his eyes that he had already made his decision.
[Root.Spouse.GetFirstName] refused to make my friend Chancellor!

I have a very special male friend who would be an excellent Marshal! Too bad my husband thinks highly of Marshal [Root.Spouse.job_marshal.GetFullName], making it hard for me to convince him of my friend's superiority.
I will keep arguing until [Root.Spouse.GetFirstName] agrees with me!

No matter how many times I try to point out the virtues of Marshal [Root.job_marshal.GetFullName], my wife [Root.Spouse.GetFirstName] won't listen. She cannot take no for an answer, not when she has decided that her friend should be Marshal.
Enough! Fine, your 'special' friend will be Marshal!
[Root.Spouse.GetFirstName] is more than happy with your decision
No matter what you say I will not make your friend Marshal!
[Root.Spouse.GetFirstName] is not happy, not happy at all

My husband [Root.Spouse.GetFirstName] and I argued about who should be Marshal, my special friend or the current one. As I made my arguments, threatened to shun [Root.Spouse.GetFirstName] from my bed and stressed my friend superiority over [Root.Spouse.job_marshal.GetFullName], my husband finally took a decision.
[Root.Spouse.GetFirstName] told me he would never make my friend Marshal!

I have tried to make my husband [Root.Spouse.GetFirstName] discharge his Steward [Root.Spouse.job_treasurer.GetFullName] in favour of my close friend whom I cannot deny anything. The stubbornness of my husband is convincing me I need to do something drastic in order for him to listen to me.
[Root.Spouse.GetFirstName] is forced to make a decision

[Root.Spouse.GetFirstName] is adamant, she tries to make me appoint one of her male friends, who might mean more to her than I earlier suspected, Steward. No matter how well our current Steward [Root.job_treasurer.GetFullName] does his job I need to decide whether I should make [Root.Spouse.GetFirstName] happy by or if the current Steward will get to keep his job.
I will keep [Root.job_treasurer.GetFullName] as my Steward!

I am getting tired of fighting for my friend, though I still feel he would make a better Steward than [Root.job_treasurer.GetFullName]. One last effort and whatever my husband [Root.Spouse.GetFirstName] decides, I have to accept that.
My friend has been appointed Steward!
My husband decided to keep the current Steward...

I couldn't care less if our current Spymaster [Root.Spouse.job_spymaster.GetFullName] is competent as a Spymaster or not, my very good friend would truly overtrumph [Root.Spouse.job_spymaster.GetHerHim] as Spymaster! I only have to convince my husband [Root.Spouse.GetFirstName] to discharge [Root.Spouse.job_spymaster.GetFullName] and then appoint my friend.
[Root.Spouse.GetFirstName] is pestered into making a decision

I cannot get any rest from [Root.Spouse.GetFirstName] pestering me about making her good friend Spymaster. She does not care that our Spymaster [Root.job_spymaster.GetFullName] is competent, skilled and a great Spymaster.
Stop pestering me and I'll make your friend Spymaster
Nothing you say or do will make me change my mind!
Your decision to keep your spymaster displeases [Root.Spouse.GetFirstName]

My husband [Root.Spouse.GetFirstName] asked me to give him a couple of days to think about this, he promised me a decision if only I stopped pestering him. I could hardly restrain myself and waited impatiently until my husband declared that he had made a decision.
He will make my friend Spymaster!
He decided to keep the old Spymaster

The friendship between me and a male courtier is very special, but I fear I might lose him if I cannot find a way to make my husband [Root.Spouse.GetFirstName] get rid of the old Lord Spiritual [Root.Spouse.job_spiritual.GetFullName] and appoint my friend as Lord Spiritual in his stead.
[Root.Spouse.GetFirstName] must listen to me, if only this once!
The future of [Root.GetFirstName]'s friend lies on [Root.Spouse.GetFirstName]

I have noticed [Root.Spouse.GetFirstName]'s affection for one of the courtiers and heard her praise his piety, so it did not surprise me when she approached me and tried to convince me to appoint him as Lord Spiritual. Trouble is, [Root.job_spiritual.GetFullName] is well respected and many would disapprove if I were to fulfill [Root.Spouse.GetFirstName]'s wish.
I will make [Root.Spouse.GetFirstName]'s friend Lord Spiritual
[Root.Spouse.GetFirstName] accepts your decision but does not approve of it

I know Lord Spiritual [Root.Spouse.job_spiritual.GetFullName] is well respected, many would disapprove and reproach my husband [Root.Spouse.GetFullName] if he chooses to appoint my friend as the Lord Spiritual, but I don't care. I need a friend at court!
Joyous news! My friend is Lord Spiritual!

My husband [Root.Spouse.GetFirstName] and I long for children, but despite our best efforts and the time we spend together in the bedchamber I have failed to conceive. The suspicion of being barren makes me seek consolation in another man's arms.
The consolation came with a price - I'm pregnant!

The pregnancy is starting to show and my husband [Root.Spouse.GetFirstName]'s happiness shows no bounds. I should be happy as well, but in my heart I know my husband [Root.Spouse.GetFirstName] isn't the father of my child.
My husband [Root.Spouse.GetFirstName] will never know the truth!
I should tell my husband [Root.Spouse.GetFirstName] the truth
If my husband suspects anything, I will blame the courtier!
My happiness when my wife [Root.Spouse.GetFirstName] told me I was about to be a father made me almost blind to her feelings, she smiled and seemed happy but something was amiss...

The bigger her belly gets, the thinner and more heavy-hearted my wife [Root.Spouse.GetFirstName] seems. Her appearance made me worry and I finally asked her what was wrong. It was as if [Root.Spouse.GetFirstName] had just waited to tell me about her indiscretion with the courtier and her belief that it is the courtier who is the father of the child she carries.
This child is ours, no matter who fathered it
The child is ours, but the courtier must be punished
[Root.GetFirstName] decides what to do with the courtier
How could you do this to me?
[Root.GetFirstName] decides what to do with the courtier and [Root.Spouse.GetFirstName]

The look on my pregnant wife's face whenever she sees one of the male courtiers has made me suspicious. It is a weird mixture of guilt, gratefulness and a warning of some sorts. I confronted my wife and, after awhile, she confessed to having had an affair with the courtier but blamed him of seducing her and impregnating her.
I need to set an example with the courtier who impregnated my wife. I could throw him into prison, execute him or banish him, making sure no one will ever dare touch my wife again!
The taste of vengeance is foul, I will do nothing

The child my wife [Root.Spouse.GetFirstName] carry is not mine. The pain of her betrayal is still fresh in my mind, I will punish her in the same way I will punish the courtier who impregnated her and made her an adulteress.
Imprison the adulterer and the adulteress!
Execute the adulterer and the adulteress!
Banish the adulterer and the adulteress!
I have changed my mind, I will only punish the courtier

My lovely young wife [Root.Spouse.GetFirstName] has expressed her boredom several times, in several ingenious ways. The court is boring, hunting is boring, embroidery is boring, her ladies-in-waiting are boring and she wants me to 'make the boredom go away'.
Honey, I have obligations I must take care of
My boring old husband [Root.Spouse.GetFirstName] told me his obligations is more important than my well-being! He might be right though, I should probably try to find a friend among the courtiers.
[From.GetBestName] and I agreed to do something together the next morning, so I am currently planning what we should do.
A trip to the lake is always nice
A quiet dinner together would be perfect!
I will never be bored again with [From.GetFirstName] by my side!
Despite the threatening clouds in the sky we started walking to the lake.
But the skies opened up and drenched us!
A failed trip to the lake
The clouds departed and the sun shone down on us
A perfect trip to the lake
I did not like the company
The cook had packed a perfect picnic, with some roast lamb, bread, cheese and wine.
The food was nice but the company better!
The dogs were excited, the horses willing and the day had barely begun. My friend and I set out to hunt some serious game.
There were plenty of game in the forest, and now a lot less
The hunter became the hunted, and did not enjoy it
We became the game, a family of bears hunted us!
I was just making the last arrangements to the dinner table when my guest arrived. We would not go starving from this table!
Dinner was pleasant and with great company!
The food, the drink, the company... all was perfect tonight
Dinner was quiet, we had nothing to say to each other
The conversation at dinner lacked substance
[From.GetBestName] has avoided me for some time now, probably because we do not have anything in common.
I think I'll find someone else to befriend
We fit together, [From.GetBestName] and me. No matter what we do together, we always have a good time and we can talk for hours without getting bored with each other.
I think I have found a new friend

The attraction between me and my husband [Root.Spouse.GetFirstName] has slowly started to fade. I realized this had been happening for some time when we week after week used the bedchamber to sleep in instead of having all the fun we used to have there.
I want to take [Root.Spouse.GetFirstName] on a 'wild ride'
The wild ride takes [This.GetFirstName] with surprise
Make sure [Root.Spouse.GetFirstName] knows who is the boss in the bedchamber
[Root.Spouse.GetFirstName] is sure to beg for mercy when [Root.GetFirstName] is done with him
I will be gentle to him
Gentle lovemaking will make [Root.Spouse.GetFirstName] relive your honeymoon
We will make sweet, sweet love...

The passion between me and [Root.Spouse.GetFirstName] were still there, only slumbering beneath our skin and easily woken to life with lover's touch. It was hot, fierce, wonderful lovemaking such as we used to have.
The [Root.GetTitle]'s heart could not take the excitement
[Root.Spouse.GetFirstName] showed who is the boss in the bedchamber!
Sweetly, gently we molded our bodies together and re-created the familiar feel of us embracing, touching, loving...
Love, how I have missed thee!
Gently, we woke the passion between us once again
Sweet love unfroze this old heart
This is a night I will remember, forever
The wild ride which showed [Root.Spouse.GetFirstName] who was the boss in the bedchamber killed him. He died with a smile on his lips, so maybe this was the perfect way of leaving this world.
I hope [Root.Spouse.GetFirstName] is in Heaven now...
I wanted to show [Root.Spouse.GetFirstName] the passion between us had never died out, but even the sweetest, gentlest lovemaking was too passionate for his heart.
May he be happy in Heaven
I suspect that my husband [Root.Spouse.GetFirstName] is unable to sire children. If my husband is infertile, then maybe I need to find someone who is!
I do have someone in mind...
I will not have an affair!
A Loving Marriage ends with my death.
I keep thinking about [From.GetTitledFirstName]. She was the best of wives, and without her, I do so struggle to be a [From.GetTitle]. Oh, how I miss her....
Wenching might make me forget her!
Who will my father trust in now?
[Root.Father.GetTitledFirstName] will have to deal with it.
The rest of my sons are nowhere near the abilities of [From.GetTitledFirstName]. He knew how to handle a sword, and would be a great [From.GetTitle] after I am dead.
Maybe my wife can give me another son?
I have other sons, maybe one of them can be worthy
My wife is pregnant, but she better give birth to a decent son this time. Else she may 'accidentally' fall down from a tower.
I know it was nothing wrong with ME
I hope the circumstances of my untimely death makes someone suspicious. I did NOT die a natural death...
A friend reacts to the strange circumstances of [Root.GetTitledFirstName]'s death
[From.GetTitledFirstName] did not die a natural death, of that I am certain! I suspect one of the courtiers to be behind [From.GetTitledFirstName]'s unfortunate demise.
There's no doubt in my mind, the murderer will be imprisoned!
[From.GetTitledFirstName] is certain someone murdered one of [From.GetHerHis] dear friends, and wants me to imprison the courtier who [From.GetSheHe] thinks is the murderer.
[From.GetTitledFirstName], your friend's murderer will be imprisoned!
I submit to your wise counsel and will convert to the [This.Religion.GetName] faith forthwith.
I refuse to convert to your false religion, the [From.Religion.GetName] faith is the true faith.
I humbly accept your decision to revoke the [Root.GetFullName], though it grieves me deeply.
I will not allow you to steal my titles without a fight! You are no longer my liege lord.
I accept your offer of peace.
I reject your offer of peace.
Please accept this humble gift of §Y[GetDiploGiftSize]§W¤.
I accept to swear fealty to you and to serve as your vassal lord.
I reject your offer of vassalization. I do not need your 'protection'.
I have decided to accept your suggestion of a betrothal between [Root.GetTitledFirstName] and [New.GetTitledFirstName].
I reject your insulting suggestion. [New.GetTitledFirstName] will never marry [Root.GetTitledFirstName].
I have decided to accept your suggestion that [Root.GetTitledFirstName] and [New.GetTitledFirstName] get married. All children of the union will be of her Dynasty.
Regrettably, I feel it would not be in my best interests for [Root.GetTitledFirstName] to marry [New.GetTitledFirstName] under those terms.
I accept your suggestion that [Root.GetTitledFirstName] and [New.GetTitledFirstName] get married.
Regrettably, I feel it would not be in my best interests for [Root.GetTitledFirstName] to marry [New.GetTitledFirstName].
I accept paying your ransom for the safe return of [Root.GetTitledFirstName].
I refuse to pay your extortionate ransom demand for [Root.GetTitledFirstName].
I gladly accept [Root.GetTitledFirstName] as my ward, to foster and protect.
I fear that I cannot accept [Root.GetTitledFirstName] as my ward at this time.
Your demand is just. My scheming was obviously misdirected. I hope you will find it in you to forgive me.
I will eventually [From.GetPlot]! You cannot stop me.
I accept your demand. I will no longer back [Root.GetTitledFirstName]'s dubious plot to [Root.GetPlot].
I will not withdraw my support for [Root.GetTitledFirstName]'s plan to [Root.GetPlot].
An intriguing scheme! I believe I will indeed back your plot to [This.GetPlot].
I refuse to back your foolish plot to [This.GetPlot].
I have decided to grant you the [Root.GetFullName] in recognition of your service and your nobility of spirit.
I would be honored to serve on your Council!
Regrettably, I must decline your gracious offer to serve on your Council.
Your request has merit. In the name of [From.Religion.GetRandomGodName], I grant you the right to invade the [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetFullName]!
I fear I must refuse your request to invade [Root.GetTitledFirstName]'s lands.
After much prayer and meditation, I have decided to grant your request to divorce your spouse on the grounds of consanguinity.
Matrimony is a holy bond. Under the laws of the Church, I cannot grant you divorce.
The Church can no longer tolerate the vile excesses of [Root.GetTitledFirstName]. We agree that [Root.GetSubjectPronoun] should be denied communion and be excommunicated!
We refuse to excommunicate the gentle and pious [Root.GetTitledFirstName].
Of course I will honor my obligation and answer your call to war!
We can unfortunately not join your wars at this time.
This is a formal declaration of WAR. Our armies shall meet on the field of battle!
You have not fulfilled your obligations as a liege lord, thus leaving me little choice but to declare WAR.
Alas! [Root.GetBestName] has died bravely on the field of battle.
[Root.GetBestName] was wounded in the thick of battle.
[Root.GetBestName] was maimed in battle by a valiant foeman.
[Root.GetBestName] received a crushing blow to the head in battle and will not stir from [Root.GetPossPronoun] repose.
Combat is the best teacher! [Root.GetBestName] has become a more proficient commander.
[Root.GetBestName] has improved [Root.GetPossPronoun] martial skill while leading troops in battle.
[From.GetBestName] was captured in battle and is now my prisoner!

A dear friend of mine has been imprisoned by [Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName]! If I appeal to [Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName], maybe I can get [Root.Liege.GetHerHim] to release my friend from the prison.
Maybe [Root.Liege.GetSheHe] has a good reason for the imprisonment of my friend?

[From.GetTitledFirstName] had the audacity to ask me to release one of my prisoners today! The only reason for me to consider complying [From.GetHerHis] request is the support [From.GetSheHe] has from my other vassals.
Your audacity is your downfall, I will not release your friend!
Our enemy has died, the war has ended.
I accept your gracious invitation and will join your court forthwith!
I cannot in good conscience abandon my current liege to join your court.
I accept you as my vassal. Henceforth, you will enjoy my protection as your liege lord.
Your offer is tempting, but I have to decline your offer to become my vassal.
I will gladly lift the excommunication of [Root.GetTitledFirstName] and allow [Root.GetObjectPronoun] back into the Church!
I am afraid that the depravity of [Root.GetTitledFirstName] precludes a return to the embrace of Holy Mother Church.
But of course I accept such a generous ransom. [Root.GetTitledFirstName] has been released!
I am afraid I cannot accept your offer. [Root.GetTitledFirstName] had better remain in my custody.
I am out in the woods, and I see a mighty stag while my party is hunting.
It would really good above my fireplace
I know people are out to kill me, and they are after me while I hunt.
Do nothing, I can't let them know that I know
I got him while he hunts.
I let the arrow fly and no one knows any better
I managed to injure him on the latest hunt.
The arrow struck but not quite where I wanted
I was killed by my Liege?
I thought I was finally able to kill him.
What?? My Liege has killed me
He thought I wanted to kill him
A white hart has been seen in the north of [Root.Location.GetName]. I am told it is a hart of ten and the biggest deer ever seen.
I find no joy in killing such a proud animal
I will send out our best hunter.
The dogs have caught scent of a boar in the forest. This is the chance of getting a mighty boar slain.
I will face it alone with my spear.
Our hunting party has cornered a large bear. A small argument amongst the hunters regarding who should get to kill the bear has nearly turned into a brawl.
Anyone but me, don't give it to me
The hounds were more alert this morning than I've ever seen before. Something stupendous must be awaiting us.
What are we waiting for? Let's go!
I think my horse has a limp
I don't care what it is, we'll hunt it.
The hounds brings down the child of a peasant..
The hounds have torn a small child of a peasant to pieces. This may tarnish our reputation slightly.
While chasing an agile deer my horse stumbled and broke his leg. Luckily, I was thrown off, but now my horse is in pain...
I will end his suffering myself
The sighthounds thirsted for blood this gentle afternoon and they brought us many hares.
Another one? Isn't it enough now?
My lack of hunting skill is becoming quite obvious. My court is talking about my failure in not so quite quiet voices.
Claim someone else's success as mine.
I have given the order for a Grand Hunt to be organized in [Root.Location.GetName].
I will find the White Stag
War disrupts our Grand Hunt. We are forced to cancel our activities.
The Grand Hunt is over for now. This was a truly noble endeavour and a true challenge for our martial abilities.
I am proud of my hunting abilities.
I am such a good hunter that I do not always need my retinue when I hunt. There is a large pack of wolves ahead, and they look hungry.
I need more warm pelts for the winter.
I've taken down a large deer on my own. My skill is legendary in [Root.Location.GetName], but my liege is not always as skillful as I am.
[From.GetTitledFirstName] is boasting about how much better a hunter [From.GetSheHe] is, compared to you, just because [From.GetSheHe] killed a large deer on [From.GetHerHis] own.
[From.GetSheHeCap] can not hunt from the dungeon.
Today, my [GetFromRelation] [From.GetFirstName] asked me for a fief of [From.GetPossPronoun] own to govern...
My [GetFromRelation] [From.GetFirstName] is reminding me of my promise to grant [From.GetObjectPronoun] a fiefdom again...
My beloved [GetFromRelation] [From.GetFirstName] is concerned that [From.GetSubjectPronoun] is still not married.
And here I was hoping [From.GetSubjectPronoun]'d take the vows...
My [GetFromRelation] has promised to arrange a marriage for me!
[From.GetFirstName], my dear [GetFromRelation], clearly upset, is reminding me of my promise to get [From.GetObjectPronoun] married.
I have just the person in mind!
That's it, you're off to the monastery!
I still have not found someone good...
My hopeless [GetFromRelation] has betrayed me and secretly gotten married to a lady-in-waiting.
Ah well, I wish them luck!
The insolence! I will not forget this...
Long life to them... in the oubliette!
My coffers are empty and I've already borrowed money from my friends. Perhaps it is time to approach the moneylenders...
They will make me such a deal!
Take a five-year loan at 25% interest
Take a five-year loan at 50% interest
I am informed by the moneylenders that the loan is due...
The moneylenders are here, reminding me of that loan I took...
I don't have the 300. Come back later
Cut off their hands and have them castrated!
My coffers are empty, but the coffers of my vassals are full. They have an obligation to their liege.
Will get back with a reply to your request soon.
Will get back with a reply to your humble request soon.
Will get back with a reply to your tough request soon.
[From.GetTitledFirstName] is requesting help with [From.GetHerHis] mismanagement of the economy. We are asked to provide a certain amount of gold.
[From.GetTitledFirstName] has refused to pay us the gold we need. Perhaps we should have [From.GetHerHim] arrested?
[From.GetTitledFirstName] has paid us the money we asked [From.GetHerHim] for. This is definitely what we needed.
My coffers are empty, but the Church is rich! Maybe I should seize church properties to repay my debts.
There are fat bishop, seize them !
Time are harsh, force the church to share the costs!
Compromise with them to find money!
Never ! I will save my Christian soul!
will not sit silent when Church law is violated.
There is a place in hell for sinners such as [From.GetTitledFirstName]. Never in the history of Christendom has such a vile ruler existed, one who robs the Holy Church itself of its belongings!
[From.GetSheHeCap] is cursed in the eyes of God!
Jesus said to forgive the sinner!
[This.GetTitledFirstName] will get excommunicated from the holy church, when the Holy Father hears of what [From.GetSheHe] has done.
An emissary from the Holy Father has come to our court, to announce that we are anathema to everything that is holy. We have been excommunicated!
We have been judged in the eyes of God...

To [Root.GetTitledFirstName] from [From.GetTitledFirstName]. The [From.PrimaryTitle.GetFullName] is faithful as long as it gets paid. But we are, after all, mercenaries. We owe [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetFOA] no oath of fealty, and so we have decided to reclaim a little of what is owed us. Forcefully.

To [Root.GetTitledFirstName] from [From.GetTitledFirstName]. The irregularity of pay recently has made the men restless. Regrettably, I share their sentiments. The [From.PrimaryTitle.GetFullName] must cease its service to you immediately, due to [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetFOA]'s inability to fulfill the contractual obligations.

To [Root.GetTitledFirstName] from [From.GetTitledFirstName]. Due to [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetFOA]'s lack of regular payment, the [From.PrimaryTitle.GetFullName] has decided to seek more gainful employment elsewhere, perhaps among the other participants in this war...
That blackguard will get his just deserts!

To the great [Root.GetTitledFirstName] from [From.GetTitledFirstName] of the [From.PrimaryTitle.GetFullName]. The inability of our previous employer to provide our contractual pay has caused us to look for employment elsewhere. We would serve [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetFOA] if you would have us.
I woke up last night in a cold sweat, heart pounding with fear at the realization I must someday die...
[From.GetFirstName], my young [GetFromRelation], wants to know what it is all about. Why are we here on this Earth?
Let [From.GetObjectPronoun] sort it out on [From.GetPossPronoun] own...
My [GetFromRelation] has answered all my existential questions.
The [From.Religion.GetName] Faith gives me peace of mind
I find myself speaking and acting more and more like my guardian.
I suppose I am getting cultured.
I have taught my young [GetFromRelation] well. [From.GetFirstName] is starting to act properly [Root.Culture.GetName]!
This ugly weed must be rooted out!
The charismatic preacher has convinced me. The [Root.Location.Religion.GetName] creed is the true faith!
My faith is strong and I am itching to spread the good word to my friends...
My [GetFromRelation], [From.GetTitledFirstName], is attempting to convert me to [From.GetPossPronoun] heresy.
My [GetFromRelation] [From.GetFirstName] would have me reconsider and embrace the [From.Religion.GetName] faith.
Betrayal! The guards are coming for me.
[From.GetFirstName], my [GetFromRelation], remains true to [From.GetPossPronoun] errant beliefs.
[From.GetFirstName] has seen sense and abandoned [From.GetPossPronoun] dangerous heresy.
[New.GetTitledFirstName] and [From.GetTitledFirstName] have gotten married. We can collect a Royal Aid Duty to pay for the ceremonies.

[ThePope.GetTitledFirstName] has issued a bull confirming the formation of a new religious military order - the Knights of St. John. The Knights, who have already protected and cared for sick pilgrims in Jerusalem for some time, now have the full weight of the Catholic church behind them. Pious Christian rulers may call on their support in wars against heretics and heathens, but they will not fight fellow Catholics.
I have a bad feeling about this...

A new Christian military order has been founded by a small group of wealthy knights. The Poor Fellow-Soldiers of Christ and of the Temple of Solomon - or the Knights Templar for short - have sworn to protect pilgrims travelling through the Holy Land. [ThePope.GetTitledFirstName] fully endorses the Order, and will allow pious Catholic rulers to call on their aid, though they will not fight other Catholics.

The Order of Brothers of the German House of Saint Mary in Jerusalem has been formed, sponsored by [ThePope.GetTitledFirstName] and the Holy Roman Emperor. The Teutonic Order, much like the Knights of St. John and the Knights Templar, primarily protect and care for pilgrims to the Holy Land, but will serve any good Catholic ruler willing to pay for their upkeep. Being a religious order, they will not fight other Catholics.
The infidels come in many flavors
The coffers of Holy Mother Church are full and the faithful are struggling against infidels and heathens. Perhaps we should provide some assistance.
Send a Papal emissary with funds
Our coffers are not that full
Your righteous struggle against the heathens has not gone unnoticed. I have dispatched a Papal emissary with sufficient funds to assist you.
One of the God's favored children seems to have been accused of kinslaying. This is clearly unfortunate.  The Church will allow him to do penance for absolution.
The Church will allow him to do penance for absolution.
will get a visit from one of our emissaries.
An emissary from [From.GetTitledFirstName] has reached us with a proposal. [From.GetTitle] will grant us absolution for our sins of kinslaying.
I'm on my knees saying Ave Maria's.
[From.GetTitle] will be pleased with my devotion.
[From.GetTitle] will be upset with my lack of devotion.
[From.GetTitledFirstName] has repented [From.GetHerHis] grave sin of kinslaying. Absolution has been granted and the all the angels of Heaven are crying with joy.
[From.GetTitledFirstName] refuses to repent [From.GetHerHis] grave sin of kinslaying. [From.GetSheHeCap] will spend a long time in Purgatory...
May God have mercy on [From.GetHerHis] soul...
I am forced to languish in this dungeon, where the evil fiends of [Root.Host.GetTitledFirstName] is torturing my soul.
Write a letter to the Pope
The Holy Father will read my desperate plea...
We have received a letter from [From.GetTitledFirstName] asking us to intervene on his behalf and ask [From.Host.GetTitledFirstName] to release him from his prison.
The Throne of St. Peter must be obeyed!
His captor will listen to our demand.
We have caught [From.GetTitledFirstName] attempting to smuggle out a letter to the Pope, where he wishes the Holy Father to intervene on his behalf.
The prayers of [From.GetTitledFirstName] has not gone unnoticed. Is there such a thing as a limit to my power?
I can't keep a man of God imprisoned.
[From.GetTitledFirstName] has come to our intervention and written a stern letter to [Root.Host.GetTitledFirstName] demanding our release.
I am sure [Root.Host.GetTitledFirstName] will release us now.
A secret messenger from [From.GetTitledFirstName] has arrived, telling me that the Holy Father can do nothing to help me..
My God, My God, why have you forsaken me?
A letter has arrived from the Holy Father. He demands that we release [From.GetTitledFirstName] from our prison and submit to the will of God.
I bend my knee for the Throne of St. Peter
A young artist is working on what is clearly a divinely inspired icon, depicting Mary, Mother of God. He needs sponsorship to finish it, so we can place it in our own chapel!
I pray to Our Lady for guidance
A young artist is working on what is clearly a divinely inspired icon, depicting Christ Pantocrator. He needs sponsorship to finish it, so we can place it in our own chapel!
A young artist is working on what is clearly a divinely inspired icon, depicting St. Peter. He needs sponsorship to finish it, so we can place it in our own chapel!
He is one apostle to admire!
A young artist is working on what is clearly a divinely inspired icon, depicting John the Baptist. He needs sponsorship to finish it, so we can place it in our own chapel!
If John guided Jesus, he can guide me.
A young artist is working on what is clearly a divinely inspired icon, depicting St. George. He needs sponsorship to finish it, so we can place it in our own chapel!
Veneration of a dragonslayer is never bad.
I devote myself to the service of the Church, and eradicating her enemies. I have not yet fallen to any of the mortal sins, nor do I shy away from danger.
I am a fallen man. What was once a noble knight, is now just a mere sinner. I am not a true knight.
May God have mercy on my soul.
My friends have managed to smuggle in a rope in a flagon of wine. Wine for the guards and rope for the window! Soon, the bird shall fly its cage!
I did it! Now to find my way home without being captured...
[From.GetBestName] has managed to effect [From.GetPossPronoun] escape from my dungeon!
Using a smuggled in rope, [From.GetBestName] almost managed to escape from custody, but the guards caught [From.GetPossPronoun] in time!
Despite their drunken state, the guards managed to catch me, tie me up and bring me to [From.GetTitledFirstName] when I tried to escape.
[From.GetTitledFirstName] sent me back to the dungeon
I deserve better than to rot in this dank dungeon. I should ask [Root.Host.GetTitledFirstName] for accommodations suitable to my rank.
My prisoner, [From.GetBestName], is complaining about [From.GetHerHis] dark cell in the dungeon, asking for more suitable accommodations...
Very well, I shall be merciful
[From.GetTitledFirstName] graciously acceded to my request! I am being moved to a decent tower suite.
Cruel [Root.Host.GetTitledFirstName] decided I should be forgotten in the Oubliette! This is the end of me...
