I can't stop thinking of all those prisoners in my dungeon. They are at my complete mercy... what a thrill it would be to hurt them... to hear the sweet screams, to see the panic in their eyes...
[From.GetTitledFirstName], eyes alight with an ugly glow, has come into my cell with a bag full of tongs and knives!
[From.GetTitledFirstName] and [From.GetPossPronoun] freakish chief jailor have come to put me on the rack!
[From.GetTitledFirstName] is a depraved lunatic! [From.GetSubjectPronounCap] sawed my hand off with small knife. It took hours...
I can feel my life fading... but at least, so is the pain of [From.GetTitledFirstName]'s torture implements.
I was, perhaps a bit too... enthusiastic torturing [From.GetTitledFirstName]. [From.GetSubjectPronounCap] did not survive the session.
Ah well, who will ever know?
Sounds like a job for real men

For as long as have ruled here we Normans have entrusted the raising of our children to Saxon nursemaids. Our first words would not be Norman French but Saxon. As we grew up we learned to speak a tongue that was neither one nor the other. Now is this time to make this tongue our own so we may all communicate.
Yes let us be one with our serfs

Around our lands more people are using this English language and I find this is a perfect means for a Norman overlord to get his Saxon serfs to work properly. We continue to use our own influence to promote this means of communication in the interests of more efficient realm.

Although every civilised man in Christendom knows that French is the true language of communication, this new English language does have a certain functionality. I have therefore prevailed upon a member of my court to adopt this for everyday administrative use.

I was considering important business when I had an amazing insight. To strengthen my realm I must bring my vassals round to my way of thinking. This involves communication. If I can get them to communicate like me then I will have a much smoother running realm.

My liege, vague rumors of an all-conquering menace have reached us from the far East. It seems that a Great Khan has united all the tribes of the vast steppes, leading millions of fierce horse warriors against the great cities of Cathay. In time, this new Khagan could pose a threat to the civilized world...

My liege, the great Khagan has dispatched a numberless horde of barbarian horsemen against the lands of Central Asia and Eastern Persia. Appearing in Balkh, the heathen armies seem intent on conquering the Muslim world!
My liege, another horde has been sent west by the terrible Khagan of the Mongols. This one - the 'Golden Horde' - has allegedly been ordered to conquer Europe all the way to the Atlantic Ocean!
Time for the Infidel to suffer!
I have decided to institute the [From.GetProposedLaw] Law. All that is needed is the support of yourself and my other loyal vassals.\n\nYour [From.Holder.GetTitle]
I have decided to institute the [From.GetProposedLaw] Law in the [From.GetFullName]. Your status as my de jure vassal entitles you to vote on the matter.\n\n[From.Holder.GetBestName]

I have decided to institute the [From.GetProposedLaw] Law in the [From.GetFullName]. Since this is a Crown Law and you are a formal elector of [From.GetName], you may vote, even though you are not my vassal... yet.\n\n[From.Holder.GetBestName]
A revolt has broken out in [Root.GetName]! Angered by my 'oppressive' rule, the peasants have taken to arms.

A revolt has broken out in [From.GetName]! Angered by the oppressive rule of [From.County.Holder.GetTitledName], the peasants have taken to arms. Their indiscriminate destruction will unfortunately hit my holdings as well...
If the count doesn't act, I better...
Peasant rebels have taken control of one of our holdings in [From.GetName] and looted it!
The peasant rebels in [From.GetName] have been dispersed and our holding taken back!
An old wound is aggravating and painful
May God have mercy on us!
We have gained a better understanding of military matters during this battle.
I have shown great heroism in this glorious victory! My prestige has greatly increased!
This battle has shown my true mettle. I am Brave!
Swords are sharp and dangerous. I can lead better from inside my own castle.
My careful maneuvers in this battle have shown our patient nature to everyone.
A noble has distinguished himself in this battle. Perhaps I can make use of him...
My position as regent to [This.Liege.GetTitledFirstName] means that I have access to the treasury. I think I deserve a raise...
My liege has proof of my corruption
The Steward has proof of my corruption
Money has been disappearing from the treasury. I suspect my regent, [From.GetTitledFirstName]...
Money has been disappearing from the coffers of my liege, [This.Liege.GetTitledFirstName]. I suspect the regent, [From.GetTitledFirstName]...
I have indisputable proof that my regent, [From.GetTitledFirstName] is embezzling money from the treasury!
My investigations have unearthed proof that the regent of [This.Liege.PrimaryTitle.GetName], [From.GetTitledFirstName], has been embezzling money!

This voice calling to me, telling me I was a bad person, telling me how evil I was. I realized that this was no ordinary voice, this was Jesus Christ himself our Lord and saviour himself. I knew that I would have to live a better life.
Jesus Christ our Lord has commanded me to give more to the poor. I cannot ignore his calling.
My sin is too great so I must show repentance. I care not what others think Heaven is only for the truly repentant. I will don the cilice to show the depth of my repentance.
I saw a hairy star in the sky, I swear it to be true. 'Twas the color of blood I tell thee. It was if the Lord God himself was bleeding.
I seem to be slow to talk
So where does children come from?
Maybe my father will tell me?
The darkness must definitely contain goblins and demon!
Other children just get into fights with me.
I just do not have enough things to play with.
Maybe father will give me more toys.
Other children talk about their mothers, but I never see my mother.
I am rather lonely, the other children does not seem to want to be with me.
It is probably no big deal.
Why must I go to school today instead of playing 'Who's afraid of the Black Knight' with my friends?
My will should count for more...
I really wonder what heathens are. Maybe [Root.Guardian.GetFullName] knows?
Climbing high walls, and practising sword fighting with my friends are great fun.
I truly wonder if God does exists. Maybe [Root.Guardian.GetFullName] knows?
Why do people die? Maybe [Root.Guardian.GetFullName] knows?
Will I rule one day? Maybe [Root.Guardian.GetFullName] knows?
Life is good, and great parties makes them even better.
Maybe I should invite [Root.Guardian.GetFullName] to one of them?
I do not understand why we are fighting fellow Catholics?
I wonder why the Church is so rich, and the peasants so poor?
I wonder why [Root.Guardian.GetFullName] let that peasant get away?
Peasants are only good for following my commands!
Deep thoughts interest me, but I would love to hear the answers to some questions.
Since we all are going to die, why not enjoy life?
Serving God should be our goal in life. How can I do it the best way?

I snuck out again, found my slim sword Pin and began practising. I'd rather practise sword fighting with Pin than doing embroidery, but I have to watch out so none finds out and takes my sword from me...
I was not careful enough, [Root.Guardian.GetFullName] saw me!
I am afraid of so many things, and every time I show my weaknesses others ridicule me for cowardness.

I sneaked through the dungeons, hearing the prisoners pleading for their life and the coarse laughter from the guards. A knife lay forgotten on the floor and I brought it with me, only to realize in the daylight why it had felt so sticky...

I curled up in my favorite chair with the biggest book I could find. When I heard [Root.Guardian.GetFullName] coming up the stairs I sprung from the chair but the book dragged me down and so [Root.Guardian.GetFullName] caught me.
Let me go! I wanna read!
[Root.Guardian.GetFullName] caught [Root.GetFirstName] reading instead of doing [Root.GetHerHis] chores
I know I am ugly, I can never be as beautiful as some of the people in the court of [Root.Guardian.GetTitledFirstName]!
I always get compliments for my fair skin, my silken hair and my big eyes. They tell me I am beautiful and I should be proud of my looks.
I am the fairest of them all!

It was market day and I had persuaded [Root.Guardian.GetFullName] to let me have some money for sweetmeats. I found what I wanted but haggled all I could until the merchant gave up, laughed and handed me the sweetmeats for a lot less than what he wanted for them.

Visitors arrived today and despite their peculiar clothes, strange language and strangely colored skin they were warmly greeted by [Root.Guardian.GetFullName]. I wanted to talk to them and find out where they came from and who they were, but I was not sure if [Root.Guardian.GetTitledFirstName] would approve.
[Root.Guardian.GetFullName], may I talk to the visitors?

Every chance I get I practice swordfighting, often with the older men who finds it amusing to see me charging at them with all my might. They are too seasoned for me to defeat them, but practise makes perfect and one day I will be the best.
I got my first kiss today! It was not quite what I had expected but rather nice anyway. Too bad [Root.Guardian.GetFullName] blundered in on us, spoiling the moment.
The kitchen is warm and filled with delicious smells and even more delicious foodstuff. If I could, I would spend all my days here.

The biggest tower in [Root.Location.GetName] is staggering high, but I had decided to climb all the way up, on the outside. I saw [Root.Guardian.GetFullName] in the room at the top and shouted a greeting.
I don't feel too good, I am feverish and my head hurts! Can't [Root.Guardian.GetFullName] do something to rid me of this illness?
I have feelings for a [Root.GetManWoman] at court, I feel happy and almost in love everytime I see [Root.GetHerHim]. I try to accept this but will others accept me?
Do you accept me for who I am, [Root.Guardian.GetFullName]?
I have never had any problems making friends, to get someone to like me I can twist and turn the truth until it fits.
It's a great skill, isn't it, [Root.Guardian.GetFullName]?
[Root.Guardian.GetFullName] has something to say about [Root.GetFirstName]'s way of getting friends
[From.GetFirstName] is slow to learn to talk.
[From.GetFirstName] asks, 'Daddy, Where does children come from?'
Daddy will tell you when you get older
You know there are bees and flowers...
Be silent or I'll slap you!
Try to address the causes of the fear
[From.GetFirstName] is often involved in fights with other toddlers
[From.GetFirstName] is not satisfied, and keeps asking for more toys to play with.
Off to the nannies with you, leech!
Mom has gone on a long journey
Don't ask me things like that!
Friends are an overvalued commodity anyway
Give [From.GetHerHim] toys to attract friends with
[From.GetFirstName] wants to play with friends instead of studying.
You can play only after school.
You can play with a birch if you like, go to school!
Heathens are people just like us
They are men like us, but unbeliever enemies
[From.GetFirstName] is often playing very daring games with other children
Let [From.GetHerHim] play, what harm could there be?
Try to limit [From.GetHerHis] games a bit
Of course my child, go to play now
Certainly [From.GetFirstName], let me tell you about matters of Faith...
My child, let me explain how things really are...
It's all part of God's plan
If you deserve it, you shall.
[From.GetFirstName] has developed a habit for wild parties.
There is nothing I can do
[From.GetFirstName] asks 'If we're Catholic and our enemies are Catholic, why are we fighting?'
Fighting heathens is just silly church thing
Sometimes, even your brother can be an enemy
[From.GetFirstName] asks 'Why is the church so rich when the peasants are starving and poor?'
Because for the poor is the kingdom of heaven
How about sharing of your own then?
[From.GetFirstName] asks 'Why did you let off that peasant accused from poaching?'
Because he needed the deer more than me
A good deed in a day keeps man happy
[From.GetFirstName] says 'These peasants we have are all mine to command like little slaves, right?'
[From.GetFirstName] asks 'If a tree falls in the woods and there's nobody there to hear it, does it make a noise?'
Good question, you should ponder it on your own
You should concentrate on something useful instead
[From.GetFirstName] asks 'Since we all die anyway, why to be so hassled about life?'
Be just to all His children
[From.GetFullName] was supposed to work on her embroidery but she clearly fancied another kind of Pin. Her swordsmanship was not too bad, for a girl.
There's no harm letting her learn how to use a sword
This is not seemly for a woman

The ones who ridicule [From.GetFirstName] for [From.GetHerHis] weaknesses are getting more and more scornful. Their escalating ridicule has made [From.GetFirstName] unable to ignore it anymore, [From.GetSheHe] begged me to help [From.GetHerHim].
I shall show [From.GetFirstName] how to fight myself
I will speak up for the child and stop the ridicule
[From.GetFirstName], don't you worry about it. It'll be better soon
My heart missed a beat when I saw [From.GetFirstName] emerge from the dungeons, covered in grime and with a bloody knife in [From.GetHerHis] hand.
It is time to teach [From.GetFirstName] the right way

I knew exactly where I would find [From.GetFirstName] when [From.GetSheHe] did not show up for practice, in the library in [From.GetHerHis] favorite chair and with the biggest book [From.GetSheHe] could find.
You should take pride in your learning
Aren't you a real bookworm? Soon you'll eat the books as well!
You know, other people can be as interesting as books
If you would compare the fairest courtier and [From.GetFirstName], then the courtier would a beautiful swan and [From.GetFirstName] a ugly toad.
[From.GetFirstName], you can never be as good looking
[From.GetFirstName]'s hair, fair skin and beautiful big eyes will make life easier for [From.GetHerHim] than if [From.GetSheHe] had been ugly.
I should encourage [From.GetFirstName] to flaunt [From.GetHerHis] beauty
You should try to not overwhelm people

[From.GetFirstName] is always counting money and makes sure [From.GetSheHe] get the most out of it. [From.GetSheHeCap] haggled with a merchant over some sweetmeats until the merchant laughed with frustration and handed over the sweetmeats for a lot less than he had asked for.
I'll teach [From.GetFirstName] about the joys of money
I'll tell [From.GetFirstName] about the joys of giving money

[From.GetFirstName] was curious about the visitors but was polite enough to wait until the chamberlain had escorted them to their rooms before [From.GetSheHe] started asking thousands of questions about them, where they came from, why they looked so different and who they were.
Wait until the banquet, then I will introduce you to them
Stop asking questions! Children should be seen and not heard
If [From.GetFirstName] is nowhere to be seen, you can always find [From.GetHerHim] in the courtyard, playing with [From.GetHerHis] swords and practising [From.GetHerHis] swordfighting with older men.
This will turn [From.GetFirstName] into a great knight!
I opened the stable door a bit quick and accidently stumbled in on [From.GetFirstName] getting [From.GetHerHis] first kiss! I suddenly realized [From.GetFirstName] is becoming a [From.GetManWoman].
Before anything happens, I should teach [From.GetHerHim] about courtly love

The kitchen is truly a wonderful place, filled with delicious things and smells, but it worries me that [From.GetFirstName] spends all [From.GetHerHis] time here, when [From.GetSheHe] should be practicing swordfighting and learning how to rule.
Force [From.GetFirstName] to learn how to fight

I was... inspecting the damage to the highest tower in [From.Location.GetName] when the head of [From.GetFirstName] appeared outside the window, fifty metres above ground. What should I do with this curious child?
Strictly forbid [From.GetHerHim] to climb the tower
[From.GetFirstName]'s fever has risen and [From.GetSheHe] complains about a headache. I worry about [From.GetHerHim] but there's not much I can do.
This is a sign of sin, make the child fast to atone for its sins!
A doctor might be able to cure [From.GetFirstName]
Only God decides over life and death
Every time [From.GetFirstName] looks at that [From.GetManWoman], I get a sinking feeling in my stomach. [From.GetSheHeCap] might be attracted to persons of the same sex as [From.GetSheHe]!
Make [From.GetFirstName] fast to atone for its sins
Try to beat it out of [From.GetHerHim]
The twists and turns of [From.GetFirstName]'s tongue and the white lies [From.GetSheHe] uses to make friends is making my head spin. How can such a young [From.GetLadLass] be able to lie so well?
No matter, the goal justifies the means
[From.GetFirstName], your tongue will cause you problems!
[FromFrom.GetFirstName] has become Trusting. This may not be the most beneficial for [FromFrom.GetHerHim] in the long run.
It is clear that all other people are friendly and want my best. I've gained the Trusting trait.
It seems that [FromFrom.GetFirstName] has become Slothful.
Everything seems so hard to do, not really worth the effort. I've gained the Slothful trait.
Sadly, [FromFrom.GetFirstName] has become Greedy. I guess I have to keep checking my purse everyday now.
I want it all, and I want it now! I've gained the Greedy trait.
[FromFrom.GetFirstName] has started to stutter. This may turn out slightly embarrassing for [FromFrom.GetHerHim] in the future.
I can't speak properly, I've gained the Stutter trait.
[FromFrom.GetFirstName] is exhibiting a severe anger constantly. [FromFrom.GetSheHeCap] has gained the Wroth trait.
Everything frustrates me! I've gained the Wroth trait.
I do not seem to be able to trust [FromFrom.GetFirstName] anymore. [FromFrom.GetSheHeCap] has gained the Deceitful trait.
People are such gullible fools! I've gained the Deceitful trait.
[FromFrom.GetFirstName] seems to work so hard when [FromFrom.GetSheHe] needs something done. [FromFrom.GetSheHeCap] has gained the Diligent trait.
Hard work is always needed to achieve something in life. I've gained the Diligent trait.
[FromFrom.GetFirstName] seems almost afraid of [FromFrom.GetHerHis] shadow. [FromFrom.GetSheHeCap] has gained the Craven trait.
The world is such a scary place. I've gained the Craven trait.
[FromFrom.GetFirstName] seems to not believe anything anyone says. [FromFrom.GetSheHeCap] has gained the Cynical trait.
The world is such a big lie. I've gained the Cynical trait.
[FromFrom.GetFirstName] seems to enjoy watching others in pain. [FromFrom.GetSheHeCap] has gained the Cruel trait.
I like seeing other people cry. I've gained the Cruel trait.
[FromFrom.GetFirstName] seems so modest and polite. [FromFrom.GetSheHeCap] has gained the Humble trait.
Everyone deserves respect, and I will give it to them. I've gained the Humble trait.
[FromFrom.GetFirstName] is definitely sure of [FromFrom.GetHerselfHimself]. [FromFrom.GetSheHeCap] has gained the Proud trait.
I know that I am great and deserve respect. I've gained the Proud trait.
[FromFrom.GetFirstName] speaks the truth whenever possible, and never seems to lie. [FromFrom.GetSheHeCap] has gained the Honest trait.
Telling lies just seems so wrong. I have gained the Honest trait.
[FromFrom.GetFirstName] seems to be quiet and not asserting [FromFrom.GetHerselfHimself]. [FromFrom.GetSheHeCap] has gained the Shy trait.
I'm always awkward talking to the people.. I have gained the Shy trait.
[FromFrom.GetFirstName] seems to be taking [FromFrom.GetHerHis] time when taking decisions. [FromFrom.GetSheHeCap] has gained the Patient trait.
Rushing into action seems foolish. I have gained the Patient trait.
[FromFrom.GetFirstName] seems to be getting along with everyone. [FromFrom.GetSheHeCap] has gained the Gregarious trait.
Talking to people, and getting to know them is something I really like. I have gained the Gregarious trait.
[FromFrom.GetFirstName] doesn't really understand the concept of rules and laws. [FromFrom.GetSheHeCap] has gained the Arbitrary trait.
Do I have to abide by laws and rules? My whim sounds more interesting. I have gained the Arbitrary trait.
[FromFrom.GetFirstName] seems to take a great interest in fair rules and true justice. [FromFrom.GetSheHeCap] has gained the Just trait.
Treating people fairly and providing justice is my duty. I have gained the Just trait.
[FromFrom.GetFirstName] seems to treat everyone nicely. [FromFrom.GetSheHeCap] has gained the Kind trait.
Treating people nicely feels good. I have gained the Kind trait.
[FromFrom.GetFirstName] has become a true believer and want to follow the faith. [FromFrom.GetSheHeCap] has gained the Zealous trait.
Following God's will is more important than anything else. I have gained the Zealous trait.
[FromFrom.GetFirstName] seems to have no fears at all. [FromFrom.GetSheHeCap] has gained the Brave trait.
There is nothing to fear, but fear itself. I've gained the Brave trait.
[FromFrom.GetFirstName] always seems to covet what others have. [FromFrom.GetSheHeCap] has gained the Envious trait.
Others have things that I should have been given. I've gained the Envious trait.
[FromFrom.GetFirstName] seems to constantly spend time with the opposite sex. [FromFrom.GetSheHeCap] has gained the Lustful trait.
Life spent in the arms of another, is a life spent well. I've gained the Lustful trait.
[FromFrom.GetFirstName] always gives freely to everyone that has a need or want.. [FromFrom.GetSheHeCap] has gained the Charitable trait.
I have lots of things, and giving my surplus to others is a good deed. I've gained the Charitable trait.
[FromFrom.GetFirstName] does not seem to like physical contact with other people. [FromFrom.GetSheHeCap] has gained the Chaste trait.
I don't feel comfortable touching other human beings. I've gained the Chaste trait.
[FromFrom.GetFirstName] does not seem to trust ANYONE! [FromFrom.GetSheHeCap] has gained the Paranoid trait.
They are out to get me! I've gained the Paranoid trait.
[FromFrom.GetFirstName] seems to always be moderate, and never does anything to excess. [FromFrom.GetSheHeCap] has gained the Temperate trait.
Moderation is the key! I've gained the Temperate trait.
[FromFrom.GetFirstName] seems to never be satisfied, and just gouges [FromFrom.GetHerselfHimself] on food and drink. [FromFrom.GetSheHeCap] has gained the Gluttonous trait.
There is nothing better than just eating and drinking! I've gained the Gluttonous trait.
[FromFrom.GetFirstName] sets great goal for [FromFrom.GetHerselfHimself], and works hard at reaching them. [FromFrom.GetSheHeCap] has gained the Ambitious trait.
I deserve good things, and I will work to get them! I've gained the Ambitious trait.
[FromFrom.GetFirstName] seems satisfied with what [FromFrom.GetSheHe] has. [FromFrom.GetSheHeCap] has gained the Content trait.
I am perfectly happy with the way things are. I've gained the Content trait.
[FromFrom.GetFirstName] has been severely injured. [FromFrom.GetSheHeCap] has gained the Wounded trait.
I have been injured badly. I've gained the Wounded trait.
[FromFrom.GetFirstName] has been crippled for life. [FromFrom.GetSheHeCap] has gained the Maimed trait.
I have been crippled for life. I've gained the Maimed trait.
[FromFrom.GetFirstName] worries too much over things [FromFrom.GetSheHe] cannot influence. [FromFrom.GetSheHeCap] has gained the Stressed trait.
There are too many things to do, too many things that worries me. I have gained the Stressed trait.
[FromFrom.GetFirstName] has been cured from [FromFrom.GetHerHis] illness! [FromFrom.GetSheHeCap] has lost the Ill trait.
I have been cured from my illness! I have lost the Ill trait.
My body is sapless and feeble. I have gained the Infirm trait.
The temptations and desires of the body no longer holds me down. I have gained the Celibate trait.
For too long I have pandered to my lustful yearning, Jesus tells me it is a mortal sin, I must stop it now.
The life of virtuous is not easy, but Jesus commands me to resist the carnal urges.
I hear him admonish me, I should not be eating for the sole motive of sensual gratification. I must stop.
The road to heaven is hard and demanding. Jesus tells me I must be self controlled and disciplined.
I try to justify it to him, but I know I lie not just to him, but to myself. I condemned things eternal for the sake of temporal things.
I feel the love of God infuse my soul. Jesus tells me it is only way to truly glorify God.
There was a Lion without, I though I would be slain in the Streets, but then the Lion said unto me let go your slothful ways and I realized who the Lion was.
I will do as I was commanded
I hear him whispering to me, that it is for me to glory God, not to leave it unto others. I shall do thus and be more diligent in my tasks.
Our armies now stand poised to take part in the [Root.Religion.GetCrusadeName] for the [Root.Location.Kingdom.GetFullBaseName].
May this crusade bring us glory!
I finally stand before the destination of the crusade. With sword in hand I am ready to storm the walls of [Root.Location.GetName]!
May the enemies of God tremble!
Fighting the infidels has brought out the warrior in me!
How can God let the infidels defeat us...?
The target of our crusade, the [From.County.GetFullName], has finally fallen to our mighty arms and the wrath of God!

Good news! My brave knights have captured the target of the crusade, [From.Location.GetName]!

Signed,
[From.GetTitledName]
Pillaging through the ruins of a temple in Jerusalem I stumbled across the pieces of a very old lance...
I must have found the Holy Lance!
Prying open a tomb in Caesarea that had been sealed for centuries, I found a very old wooden chalice...
Could it be... the Holy Grail!
Jerusalem is finally ours after a horrific siege. Entering the city we rode in the blood of the infidels up to the knees of our horses.
I have lost the siege of [From.GetName] and let the infidels take back the very target of our crusade.
How will I live with the shame...

I regret to inform you that we have lost the target of the crusade, [From.Location.GetName]...

Signed,
[From.GetTitledName]

The defenders of [From.Siege.GetName] sallied forth from the postern gate at dawn. They cut through the siege lines inflicting many casualties on the besiegers. Then they returned back to the fortress to cheers from the defenders.

The defenders of [From.Siege.GetName] sallied forth from the postern gate at dawn. They cut through the siege lines inflicting many casualties on the besiegers. Then they returned back to the fortress to cheers from the defenders.

The defenders of [From.Siege.GetName] sallied forth but were caught unawares by some of the attackers. They lost many before limping back through the postern gate. There were great cheers from the attacking encampment.

The defenders of [From.Siege.GetName] sallied forth but were caught unawares by some of the attackers. They lost many before limping back through the postern gate. There were great cheers from the attacking encampment.

Treachery is the greatest enemy of the defenders of any city. To solidify their resolve the defenders must fear the retribution of the attackers. Today the commander of [From.Siege.GetName] publicly executed captives on the wall. Calculating that the act would anger the attacker so much that the defenders would expect no mercy.

TREACHERY, ever the bane of a defending garrison. The word is out someone has made contact with the attackers. Only a few know for sure the rest it is a matter of speculation. The defenders of [From.Siege.GetName] are sure that this move means their days are numbered.

Large numbers of people in a confined area is never healthy. The risk of disease is ever present. Unsanitary conditions have led to just such an outbreak. Already the commander of the siege of [From.Siege.GetName] is working to mitigate the problem but the damage is done.

The spectre of hunger is an ever present fear for the defenders. The cruel arithmetic of a siege means that as defenders of [From.Siege.GetName] starve to death there is more food for those that remain.

The walls are long and constant vigilance is impossible, and enterprising traders know that a city under siege is a ripe market for food. One such trader managed to succeed in smuggling through some food. Although nowhere near sufficient to sustain the garrison  of [From.Siege.GetName], it brings fresh heart to the defenders.

Paradoxically a siege camp is a ripe target for bandits - although there may be lots of soldiers there, they are all looking the wrong way. A series of raids have lead to some loss of life amongst the attackers of [From.Siege.GetName] as they attempted to repel them.
Tuscan raiders struck our camp at [From.Siege.GetName], we managed to drive them off when they were startled by a surprise counter attack.
They will be back in greater numbers.

It looked as though all was lost - the pagan forces were just too numerous for the Christian defenders of [From.Siege.GetName]. Throughout the night the Christians prayed and then in the light of the early dawn a flag was seen falling from the heavens, grasped by the defending commander just before it could hit the ground. This heaven sent omen raised the defenders to a new fervour and they swept the attacking forces away.

The Muslim forces had the fortress under close siege and it looked as though the Christian defenders of [From.Siege.GetName] were doomed, when the Apostle Saint Andrew appeared to a poor hermit and told him of a holy relic within the city. When the relic was found the defenders fasted for five days before launching forth against the besiegers. They called out God Help Me as they charged impetuously.

The infidel surrounded the fortress of the faithful and those who had submitted to the will of God prayed to the friends of God for help. Then a Sufi mystic claimed to have a vision where all the rightly guided Caliphs appeared to him and told him that the will of God was that they must attack and with them would be thousands of angels, ranks on ranks. So the faithful sallied forth from [From.Siege.GetName] and drove the unbelievers off.
The fortress of the infidel has not fallen. It's up to me to lead the charge for God, Jesus and the Holy Ghost!
The enemy is near and I know what is ahead. Today would be a good day to die!
Lead the assault from the first line
Order the assault to commence, while staying behind
It rankles me that my liege, [This.Liege.GetTitledFirstName], has vassals who should rightfully be mine.
My vassal, [From.GetTitledName], has requested that a lower rank vassal should serve [From.GetObjectPronoun] rather than me directly...
I like my other vassal better
My Liege, [From.GetTitledName], has decreed that henceforth I am a vassal of [FromFrom.GetTitledName]'s.
My Liege, [From.GetTitledName], has denied my request to make my rightful vassal mine.
[From.GetTitledName] has not answered my request to transfer a vassal. This bodes ill.

My dear friend and vassal! You are a bedrock of loyalty, the cornerstone of the realm! Truly, there is support for your claim in [From.Religion.GetScriptureName]. I know that [From.Religion.GetRandomGodName] will reward you in time!\n\n [From.GetTitledFirstName]
My Liege, [Root.Liege.GetTitledName], has justly agreed to my request. [From.GetTitledName] is now my vassal!
It seems [FromFrom.GetTitledName] wanted to become my new liege, but [Root.Liege.GetTitledName] has chosen to give me a claim on [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName] instead!

The late nights, the way [Root.Spouse.GetFirstName] has stopped touching me or even looking at me, the rumors about [Root.Spouse.GetFirstName] and a courtier being lovers... There is no doubt in my mind, [Root.Spouse.GetFirstName] has an affair with that courtier!
[Root.Spouse.GetFirstName] is confronted by [Root.GetFirstName] about the affair

Discretion is key to a successful love affair, but we had apparently not been as discreet as we should've been. [From.GetFirstName] somehow found out about me and my lover and confronted me about it, demanding I would break it up.
You don't understand our relationship, we are in love...
I will break it up, but always remember: you forced me to do it
I was confronted about my love affair with [From.GetFirstName]'s [From.Spouse.GetManWoman] [From.Spouse.GetFirstName] by [From.GetFirstName] [From.GetHerselfHimself].
Fine, I'll stop my love affair with [From.Spouse.GetFirstName]!
I will claw your eyes out!
Your interference will cost you dearly!
[From.GetFirstName] attacked me when I confronted [From.GetHerHim] about [From.GetHerHis] love affair with my [Root.Spouse.GetFirstName]!

Several days after my confrontation with [From.GetFirstName] I was attacked by someone who managed to injure me and disappear before I even started to feel the pain. I collapsed to the floor and that was where [Root.Spouse.GetFirstName] found me, with blood gushing from the wound.
The wound forced me to bed for several days
My lover is ill and I feel that there is something I should do to ease my lover's pain.
I will stay at my lover's bed and take good care of him myself
I will pay the best physician to cure my lover
I will stay at my lover's bed and take good care of her myself
The cruel wound on my lover's beautiful body had already started to fester.
I will take care of you until the wound has healed
I will pay the best physician to cure you, my lover
This is not worth my time
There are members of our dynasty that hold land, but have no children that can continue their legacy. I'm more than fit enough to get part of that inheritance.
I deserve a claim on a title!
Will look at your demands for a claim.
Will evaluate your need for a title.
[From.GetBestName] is asking for a claim on one of our titles, as [From.GetSheHe] believes that [From.GetSheHe] is entitled to part of our inheritance early.
[From.GetBestName] believes that [From.GetSheHe] should be granted a title from us, due to [From.GetHerHis] competence, and the worry that we are childless.
Our dynasty rules multiple kingdoms. I am competent enough that I should rule one of them.
Will evaluate your need for a title.
[From.GetBestName] seems to have the outlandish notion that [From.GetSheHe] should be the ruler of one of our Kingdoms!
Perhaps it would be for the best...
I have a claim on a title, and it should rightfully be mine.
Ask our liege to fight for our land!
[From.GetBestName] is asking us to fight a war on [From.GetHerHis] behalf.
There are rulers in the world who are sadly neglecting the laws that Jesus himself gave to the Holy Church.
Invite them to follow the true doctrines
The Pope is upset with our law of Free Investiture. The Holy Father is asking us to change it to comply with Church Doctrine.
We always follow the divine will.
Some gold to the church will silence them.
[From.GetTitledFirstName] has accepted God's will, and is now allowing Papal appointments of Bishops.
The Devil is acting through [From.GetTitledFirstName]. That can be the only reason for [From.GetHerHis] stubborn refusal of God's will.
[From.GetTitledFirstName] has sent donations to the Church. This will be needed for the holy work.
We can wait for [From.GetHerHim] to change the laws.
[From.GetTitledFirstName] has argued convincingly, on theological grounds, why [From.GetHerHis] realm should be exempt from Papal Law.
The Kings and Emperors refuse to follow the Law of God. It is up to the servants of Christ to rectify this.
Demand allegiance to the Throne of St. Peter
will listen to the demands of The Holy Father
Our mortal liege will hear of this.
An emissary is visiting us from the Papacy, giving us gifts and demanding our allegiance to the Throne of St. Peter
[From.GetTitledFirstName] has been approached by the Pope, and is clearly disregarding our lawful rights.
Will someone rid me of this troublesome priest?
The Kings and Emperors refuse to follow the Law of God. However, any nobleman anointed by God's servants can become a rightful King.
Grant the vassal a legal claim to the title.
The Holy Father is asking us to replace our liege, and is giving us the divine right to do so.
I am loyal to my liege!
Our Liege will hear of this.
[From.GetTitledFirstName] is a rebel and a traitor. The false sweet words of the false pope has swayed [From.GetHerHim].
My magistrates are struggling to administrate my oversized demesne. The peasants of [Root.GetName] are now completely disregarding my divine right to rule!
And we can't do anything about it...
The peasants of [Root.GetName] are slowly starting to respect my rule again. I should keep my demesne small enough to manage.
Due to my somewhat lacking Stewardship skill, a Thieves' Guild has been established in [Root.GetName].
They have not stolen any of my property yet
Thanks to my wise Stewardship of [Root.GetName], the local Thieves' Guild has been eradicated.
It is good to be the [Root.County.Holder.PrimaryTitle.GetRulerTitle]!
My less than perfect Diplomacy has allowed a Smugglers' Ring to appear in [Root.GetName].
I don't see how this matters to me?
Thanks to my great diplomatic skill, the Smugglers' Ring in [Root.GetName] has been destroyed. The head of the last smuggler is now rotting on a pike outside the city gates.
Due to my mediocre understanding of Martial matters, bands of robbers are roaming the countryside in [Root.GetName]. They are too craven to attack my castles though.
I am safe inside my walls..
With my great Martial ability, I have rounded up and executed the robber bands that were plaguing [Root.GetName]!
A group of Hedge Knights have come to visit [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetName]. [Root.job_chancellor.GetTitledFirstName] has met with them, and ask for my reply.
Welcome them with a lavish feast!
The Hedge Knights have participated in a minor tournament together with in our knights in [Root.Location.GetName]. Sadly, one of those landless vagabonds have been severly injured.
Pay for some medication, and send them on their way
Allow them to stay at the castle while he recovers.
A young hedge knight has distinguished himself quite nicely in the time he has been at our castle.
A member of our court has taken great offense at the behavior of the rough uncut hedge knights visiting our castle. He almost demands that we should execute the vagrants.
Throw the hedge knights out of the castle!
A young woman has been seduced by one of the hedge knights. This seems to have some unforeseen consequences.
Let them both stay at court.
The dungeon is a nice place for that 'knight'.
The hedge knights are ready to depart our castle and ride forth to another lord's domain.

[Root.job_marshal.GetTitledFirstName] has arrested an armed man with ragged armor and a spotty horse. [Root.job_marshal.GetSheHeCap] says that the man claims to be a hedge knight, but clearly does not believe that statement.
A famous writer proposes to compose your family chronicles.
Your young wife takes a passion for romantic poetry. She keeps reading any sort of romantic poetry she can get hold of.
Help her, by getting her more to read.
That is her interests, not mine.
These are books created by Satan!
The church wants to organize a Miracle play for a local saint in our demesne. They seem to feel that it should fall on our shoulders to pay for it.
It is for the glory of God!
If the Church wants it, the Church pays for it..
Peasants from the local countryside have sent a representative to petition for our support for one of their traditional carnivals.
A young talented artist from [Root.Location.GetName] proposes to paint an iconic portrait of [Root.Father.GetBestName].
This will be grand in the main hall.
This is a waste of money.
Luxury clothes are trendy at the moment. What about keeping your courtiers busy by changing the fashion at court?
Introduce a new fashion at the court
There are better ways of spending the taxes
My trusted and devoted chamberlain just brought to my attention that one of the serving maids have given birth to a child. According to him, my son is the father.
Force him to adopt the child to prevent scandal
Give him a beating for messing with inferiors
Send him to confess his sins!
My beloved wife [Root.Spouse.GetFirstName] is constantly bored and keeps talking about the new fashion she has heard about. Now she wants me to introduce it at court...
My money is your money, darling
Vanity is a sin, let's go to the church instead
This is my money you're talking about
I will consider introducing new fashion at the court.
A famous herald, well versed in the diplomatic protocol, has arrived at our court. He is proposing his services to us, and our chamberlain is saying that we can make good use of this man.
I can always use more men.
Another mouth to feed is not what I need.
A destitute noble from a former enemy court asks for permanent hospitality.
Tell him he can only stay for the night.
I have been reading 'Ars Moriendi', and it claims that death is not something a true Christian should be afraid of.
Forgive me father, for I have sinned.
I am just a poor sinner...

To help defend the Holy Land from the infidels, our order should establish castles there. The province of Archa seems like a good candidate for this. I should ask the ruling Count there for permission.
I will write a letter at once.

To the Great [Root.GetTitledFirstName],\nYour wisdom and mercy are legendary. The Knights of St. John ask for your help in the Holy War against the infidels. To assist us in our struggle we humbly ask permission to establish a new castle in the County of Archa.
An intriguing idea, but not at this location...
No religious orders in my territory!
The Knights of St. John have erected the castle of Krak des Chevaliers in [Root.GetName].
Let it be known to the world!

The Knights of St. John have established a new holding in the [From.County.GetFullName]. Permission to settle there was granted to them by the noble [FromFrom.GetTitledName]. Their mighty castle will henceforth be known as Krak des Chevaliers.
I really am a good Christian

To help defend the Holy Land from the infidels, our order should establish castles there. The province of Tortosa seems like a good candidate for this. I should ask the ruling Count there for permission.

To the Great [Root.GetTitledFirstName],\nYour wisdom and mercy are legendary. The Knights of St. John ask for your help in the Holy War against the infidels. To assist us in our struggle we humbly ask permission to establish a new castle in the County of Tortosa.
The Knights of St. John have erected the castle of Margat in [Root.GetName].

The Knights of St. John have established a new holding in the [From.County.GetFullName]. Permission to settle there was granted to them by the noble [FromFrom.GetTitledName]. Their mighty castle will henceforth be known as Margat.

To help defend the Holy Land from the infidels, our order should establish castles there. The province of Safed seems like a good candidate for this. I should ask the ruling Count there for permission.

To the Great [Root.GetTitledFirstName],\nYour wisdom and mercy are legendary. The Knights of St. John ask for your help in the Holy War against the infidels. To assist us in our struggle we humbly ask permission to establish a new castle in the County of Safed.
The Knights of St. John have erected the castle of Belvoir in [Root.GetName].

The Knights of St. John have established a new holding in the [From.County.GetFullName]. Permission to settle there was granted to them by the noble [FromFrom.GetTitledName]. Their mighty castle will henceforth be known as Belvoir.

To help defend the Holy Land from the infidels, our order should establish castles there. The province of Hebron seems like a good candidate for this. I should ask the ruling Count there for permission.

To the Great [Root.GetTitledFirstName],\nYour wisdom and mercy are legendary. The Knights of St. John ask for your help in the Holy War against the infidels. To assist us in our struggle we humbly ask permission to establish a new castle in the County of Hebron.
The Knights of St. John have erected the castle of Beth Gibelin in [Root.GetName].

The Knights of St. John have established a new holding in the [From.County.GetFullName]. Permission to settle there was granted to them by the noble [FromFrom.GetTitledName]. Their mighty castle will henceforth be known as Beth Gibelin.

To help defend the Holy Land from the infidels, our order should establish castles there. The province of Jaffa seems like a good candidate for this. I should ask the ruling Count there for permission.

To the Great [Root.GetTitledFirstName],\nYour wisdom and mercy are legendary. The Knights Templar ask for your help in the Holy War against the infidels. To assist us in our struggle we humbly ask permission to establish a new castle in the County of Jaffa.
The Knights Templar have erected the castle of Beit Dejan in [Root.GetName].

The Knights Templar have established a new holding in the [From.County.GetFullName]. Permission to settle there was granted to them by the noble [FromFrom.GetTitledName]. Their mighty castle will henceforth be known as Beit Dejan.

To help defend the Holy Land from the infidels, our order should establish castles there. The province of Tyrus seems like a good candidate for this. I should ask the ruling Count there for permission.

To the Great [Root.GetTitledFirstName],\nYour wisdom and mercy are legendary. The Knights Templar ask for your help in the Holy War against the infidels. To assist us in our struggle we humbly ask permission to establish a new castle in the County of Tyrus.
The Knights Templar have erected the castle of Belfort in [Root.GetName].

The Knights Templar have established a new holding in the [From.County.GetFullName]. Permission to settle there was granted to them by the noble [FromFrom.GetTitledName]. Their mighty castle will henceforth be known as Belfort.

To help defend the Holy Land from the infidels, our order should establish castles there. The province of Acre seems like a good candidate for this. I should ask the ruling Count there for permission.

To the Great [Root.GetTitledFirstName],\nYour wisdom and mercy are legendary. The Knights Templar ask for your help in the Holy War against the infidels. To assist us in our struggle we humbly ask permission to establish a new castle in the County of Acre.
The Knights Templar have erected the castle of Athlith in [Root.GetName].

The Knights Templar have established a new holding in the [From.County.GetFullName]. Permission to settle there was granted to them by the noble [FromFrom.GetTitledName]. Their mighty castle will henceforth be known as Athlith.

To help defend the Holy Land from the infidels, our order should establish castles there. The province of Tiberias seems like a good candidate for this. I should ask the ruling Count there for permission.

To the Great [Root.GetTitledFirstName],\nYour wisdom and mercy are legendary. The Knights Templar ask for your help in the Holy War against the infidels. To assist us in our struggle we humbly ask permission to establish a new castle in the County of Tiberias.
The Knights Templar have erected the castle of La Feve in [Root.GetName].

The Knights Templar have established a new holding in the [From.County.GetFullName]. Permission to settle there was granted to them by the noble [FromFrom.GetTitledName]. Their mighty castle will henceforth be known as La Feve.
Several Kingdoms in Europe are fighting to keep the pagans back and try to spread Christianity eastwards. The Teutonic Order should assist them by offering to settle on their borders.

To the Great [Root.GetTitledFirstName],\nYour wisdom and mercy are legendary. The Teutonic Order wishes to assist you in your valiant struggle against the pagans. By transfering a pagan County to the order, we will be able to establish a local presence and fight these heathens.
[From.GetTitledName] has graciously seceded the [Root.County.GetFullName] to us. The Teutonic Order will now be able to effectively fight the heathens in this region.

In an effort to defend [FromFrom.PrimaryTitle.GetName] against pagan attacks, [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName] has granted the Teutonic Order the [From.County.GetFullName]. This province has never been fully settled and many of the population are still heathens. This noble gesture could help protect the endangered frontier of [FromFrom.PrimaryTitle.GetName] as well as further the Holy War against pagans.

Holy Order or not, I will not let any foreign power establish a hold in my realm.

Signed,
[From.GetTitledName]

The pressure of commanding a whole unit is killing me. The ones I have to command are lazy good-for-nothing soldiers but I had endured their incompetence until one of them managed to lose my horse's bridle and saddle. That was the last drop, then I...
I have always been bad at diplomacy and I fear I will insult the ambassador when he arrives to talk about a possible alliance between me and his liege.
I should let my [Root.GetChancellorName] [Root.job_chancellor.GetTitledFirstName] take care of it
No! I am the [Root.GetTitle], I should be able to handle this!

When [From.GetTitledFirstName] took me aside a couple of days before the ambassador was supposed to arrive and asked me to handle the negotiations, I was not exactly surprised. [From.GetTitledFirstName] has many virtues, but diplomacy is not one of them.
I am glad [From.GetTitledFirstName] feels [From.GetSheHe] can entrust me with this!
As I have difficulty distinguishing the handle from the blade of a sword, I would rather delegate the troublesome task of handling the troops to my Marshal [Root.job_marshal.GetTitledFirstName].
I should definitely delegate that task to [Root.job_marshal.GetHerHim]
I should work harder on this
It feels good that [From.GetTitledFirstName] trusts me enough to delegate the handling of [From.GetHerHis] troops to me.

I have never been one to lurk in the shadows to plot and scheme, to plan assassinations or plant devious rumors about my rivals. I would gladly hand over those tasks to my Spymaster [Root.job_spymaster.GetTitledFirstName].
[Root.job_spymaster.GetTitledFirstName] will make sure all plots will run smooth
I shouldn't rely too much on [Root.job_spymaster.GetTitledFirstName]

I have always felt a calling for plots and schemes, assassinations and devious rumors, all those shady activities that almost all participate in but never mentions. When I was entrusted with all this by [From.GetTitledFirstName] it was the happiest moment in my life.
I will plot, I will scheme, and no one will know what hit them
Numbers eludes me, math frustrate me and taxes... don't even talk about taxes. Every time I try to understand and organize the expenses and revenues I get frustrated and feel inadequate.
I will fight the numbers and defeat them!

I hadn't realized how much [From.GetTitledFirstName] had struggled with understanding and organizing the expenses and revenues so when [From.GetTitledFirstName] asked me to take over this task I was more than happy to relieve [From.GetHerHim] of [From.GetHerHis] burden.
I will gladly help [From.GetTitledFirstName] with this

The [Root.Religion.GetName] priests can be a bit irritable and after my latest blunder I feel the need to be extra careful around them. Too bad I cannot really rely on myself when I am stressed to be anything else but blunt.
[Root.job_spiritual.GetTitledFirstName] should be able to handle this better than I would
I will take care of them myself

The more stressed [From.GetTitledFirstName] gets, the more blunt and outspoken [From.GetSheHe] becomes. There have been rumors about what happened the last time the [From.Religion.GetName] priests visited us, and none of us who experienced the awkwardness and rage of [From.GetTitledFirstName] are keen to watch that happen again.
[From.GetTitledFirstName] asked me to take care of them

The stress and the frustration inside of me reached boiling point today when something important went fatally wrong. I lashed out in anger to hide my frustration and the anger went straight for the closest person,

The anger in [From.GetFirstName]'s eyes frightened me and as [From.GetSheHe] poured [From.GetHerHis] anger and frustration on me, instead of addressing what really troubled [From.GetHerHim], I stood quietly and let [From.GetFirstName] get it out of [From.GetHerHis] system.
[From.GetFirstName]'s outburst of anger was uncalled for!
My fosterling is a weakling without any backbone! I would truly feel ashamed of myself if I couldn't do something to make the child less of a coward.
I'll try to beat some sense in the child
I'll put the child out with the wolves

I was bored until I remembered the prisoner in my dungeons. I had so many deliciously cruel ideas as what to do to the prisoner, but I finally narrowed the ideas down to two: slowly reduce the food rationings or release rats in the prisoner's cell.
Release some rats in the prisoner's cell!

We were high above the courtyard with courtiers scurrying around looking like ants. I ordered my bow and bow to be brought to me and started shooting at them, laughing at the panic and the looks they threw up at me.
The next shot will be aimed low
I will aim high this time

I do not tolerate any cravenness in my court, I despise the scared eyes of one of the courtiers and the way the courtier shy away from me and everything scary. There must be a way to cure the courtier of this cowardness, but how?
Maybe if I pretend to push them off the walls?
I will scare the courtier in the middle of the night!

Nothing feels good, nothing feels fun nor interesting. I am in the deepest, blackest pit of sorrow and worthlessness, feeling as I will never be able to escape from it and wondering why God makes us feel like this...
I doubt myself and my faith
The sickness is slowly eating away at me, making me look like a shadow of my former self. No matter what I do, no matter how many physicians I pay to cure me, nothing seems to help.
I should spend a fortnight fasting for my sins
I will continue praying for a cure, or a miracle

My God, why have you forsaken me? I have been cursed with a fever, a headache from Hell and now I am coughing blood. I think [Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName] must have decided to punish me for my sins!
I should give to the poor for my sins
Jesus healed people like me, if I just was more devout and truly repented my sins He might heal me too.
Forgive me Father, for I have sinned...
The guilt is burning through me, every second is pure agony mixed with shame. I have never felt so guilty, so sinful...
I ease my guilt with prayer and fasting
Pay church to ease some of my guilt

I have written a religious tract which I named Tractatus de Purgatorio Sancti [Root.GetFirstName], about a knight and how he journeyed through Purgatory and the Earthly Paradise. It is a masterpiece and I must share the tract with the world!
The [Root.Religion.GetName] Church will help spread it!
I will give it to [Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName] so [Root.Liege.GetSheHe] can help spread it
I will give it to [Root.Host.GetTitledFirstName] so [Root.Host.GetSheHe] can help spread it
I am not lustful, gluttonous, slothful, greedy, envious, proud or wroth. I am and will always be free from sin.
I proclaim my lack of sin publicly
I thank the Lord in private

I secretly admire a person who has been celibate for many years now. I am a faithful [Root.Religion.GetName] and I have contemplated becoming celibate, but there has always been something that has hindered me from following that path.
I should ask the courtier for advice...
I should ask the vassal for advice...
My servants have provided such a fine meal today. There is an enormous amount of fine wine, and the cooking is absolutely great. I will enjoy this feast!
Commanding troops is a demanding task, especially for someone as stressed as I am. There are ways though to relieve this stress, but how will I find solace?
Find solace in a bottle of wine
Find solace in the camp followers
I attended a great party down at the village last night. I do not remember all the details, but I surely must have had a great time at it.
I know I drank some wine..
I woke up with a terrible hangover this morning. Now the priest is talking with his boring voice again, and I keep falling asleep here in Church.
This is not proper for a [This.GetTitle]
It seems that I have embarrassed myself severely in front of my children. This is entirely due to by habit of drinking until I pass out, but I simply can not stop it.
My beloved spouse [Root.Spouse.GetFirstName] has noticed my constant drinking and is deeply concerned. [Root.Spouse.GetSheHeCap] is asking me to stop drinking and become responsible again.
Force her to drink with you.
I will stop being a drunkard.
My beloved spoused has saved me from the fate of drunkards. God bless [Root.Spouse.GetHerHim]!
I am so lucky that I have [Root.Spouse.GetFirstName]..
My husband has dragged me down to his levels, and got me addicted to wine. I wish I had never married him.
The wine makes me such a good speaker. I can truly motivate people, and they become inspired from hearing me talk.
I have wasted enough days in my life as a drunkard. I need to get my life in to better shape.
Devoting myself to the sword will do it.
Embroidery will take my mind off it.
I seem to drink myself into an early grave. There must be some way to stop drinking.
But the wine tastes so good...
I'll ask a priest for some advice.
There is nothing but whine, or wine.. I've lost my mine, my mined mind..
The troops I am commanding thinks I am craven, I haven't shown myself to them for several days because of my illness.
I am soon dead, if not of old age then of this illness. I worry about my sins, will God truly forgive me?
Please give me more time God, I need to reform myself
God is punishing me rightly for my sins
God answered my prayers! I am cured of my illness and can atone for my sins before it is too late.
Why am I sick, [GetFromRelation], is God punishing me? I haven't done anything wrong, have I?
My [GetFromRelation] [From.GetFirstName] is very sick. [From.GetSheHe] is delirious and have started asking if God is punishing [From.GetHerHim].
Yes, you are a sinner that deserves it
Don't worry, I'll take care of you
The cold nights of January are strainful for my health...
If I need to be cured, God will cure me
Stay in a warm bed near the fire during the cold nights
My call for a crusade against the infidels has apparently fallen on deaf ears, and a number of prominent Christian rulers have still not put on the cross.

To the Noble [Root.GetTitledFirstName],
I am concerned that you have not yet heeded my call to arms against the infidels. I hope that this is a mere oversight on your behalf and expect that you will put on the cross in the near future.

[From.GetTitledName]
I promise that I shall be on my way within a month
My reminder about their absence from the ongoing crusade has apparently fallen on deaf ears. I am very disappointed.
Let it be know to them
I am bitterly disappointed to see that you still choose to ignore my call for a crusade.
I am shocked to see that my liege, [Root.Liege.GetTitledName] has not yet answered the Pope's call for a crusade.
There is nothing I can do about it

My liege,
I am concerned that you have not yet heeded the Pope's call to arms against the infidels. I pray that you plan to put on the cross in the near future.

Your loyal subject, 
[From.GetTitledName]
I will not be told what to do by a vassal!
I promise that I shall be on my way within a month
It seems my liege, [Root.Liege.GetTitledName] has decided not to join the crusade despite his promise to do so. I am very disappointed.

My liege,
I am most disappointed to see that you have decided not to participate in the ongoing crusade.

Signed,
[From.GetTitledName]
The Pope has finally called a crusade against the infidels and many of us are eager to fight. But my liege, [Root.Liege.GetTitledName] has not put on the cross yet.

My liege,
Many of us are eager to join the crusade and fight for the glory of God. So it is with concern I notice that you have yet to answer the Pope's call to arms. I assume that you plan to put on the cross in the near future.

Your loyal subject, 
[From.GetTitledName]
I will not be told what to do by a vassal!
I promise that I shall be on my way within a month
It seems my liege, [Root.Liege.GetTitledName] has decided not to join the crusade despite his promise to do so. I am very disappointed.

My liege,
I am most disappointed to see that you have decided not to participate in the ongoing crusade.

Signed,
[From.GetTitledName]
Pagans have crossed the border and raided the province of [Root.GetName]!
Encouraged by their successful border raiding, pagans have pushed further on and ravaged the province of [Root.GetName]!
I have hatched a brilliant scheme to get rid of my hated rival!
On second thought, it's a bad idea...

My liege! It pains me to say, but there is a traitor in the realm. This rotten egg is plotting your downfall. I enclose the damning evidence with this letter.\n\nYour loyal servant, [From.GetTitledFirstName]
I think [From.GetTitledFirstName] is the real traitor
Throw [This.GetTitledFirstName] in the dungeon for falsifying evidence
At the false charges of the accursed [FromFrom.GetTitledName], my liege has seen fit to imprison me!
Dear [Root.GetFirstName]! I'm afraid your allegations do not hold up. I can take no action against your so called traitor.\n\n[From.GetTitledFirstName]
Bah, it was a good scheme!

My loyal vassal! I recently received some disturbing allegations against you from [FromFrom.GetTitledName]. I do not believe them, but you should know that [From.GetSubjectPronoun] is no friend of yours.\n\n[From.GetTitledFirstName]
Let [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName] know what I think of this
To the dishonorable [Root.GetTitledFirstName]! Know that I am aware of your schemes, and so is [This.Liege.GetTitledFirstName]. [From.Religion.GetRandomGodName] be my witness, you will not succeed.
Disaster! [From.GetTitledFirstName] has thrown me in the dungeon for my 'false' allegations.
I will get out of here...
A loyal friend at the household of [From.GetTitledName] told me that [From.GetSubjectPronoun] is about to present [Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName] with false evidence of my treason!
A fast courier is dispatched to my liege

My liege! Very soon, the scheming [FromFrom.GetTitledName] will make accusations against me. Do not believe a word of it! [FromFrom.GetSubjectPronounCap] hates me and lacks all honor and decency.\n\nYour faithful vassal, [From.GetTitledFirstName]
My loyal vassal! You were right. [FromFrom.GetTitledName] did accuse you of treason, but I dismissed [FromFrom.GetPossPronoun] so called evidence. Rest easy my friend.\n\n[From.GetTitledFirstName]
The maintenance cost of the levies I sent my liege are ruinous! Perhaps I should ask for some gold in return for my dutiful service...

My liege, I am deeply hesitant to ask, but my coffers are running dry from the upkeep of the levies you have raised from my demesne. Any recompense for the costs of my liege's wars would be a great comfort.\n\nYour loyal [From.GetTitledFirstName]
My most valued vassal, your request is reasonable. This gift of 30¤ should help tide you over.\n\n[From.GetTitledFirstName]
[Root.GetTitledFirstName], I am under no obligation to give you recompense, but since you are my friend, here is a gift of 15¤.\n\n[From.GetTitledFirstName]
To the honorable [Root.GetTitledFirstName]. As my bannerman, it is your sworn duty to pay for the upkeep of your levies. Do not trouble me with this again.\n\n[From.GetTitledFirstName]
I shall be reduced to begging!

honorable [Root.GetTitledFirstName]! Unfortunately, my own coffers yawn empty, but rest assured I will never forget the services you have rendered in these times of strife.\n\n[From.GetTitledFirstName]
It bothers me that my liege, [This.Liege.GetTitledFirstName], holds a title that should rightfully be mine.

My liege! It is most unfortunate that you happen to hold a title that all agree should rightfully be mine. In order to lift this dark cloud from our relations, may I suggest adjustment?\n\nYour vassal, [From.GetTitledFirstName]
[This.GetTitledFirstName] is diplomatically informed of my decision
My loyal vassal. Your words ring true. The title is yours my friend.\n\nYour liege, [From.GetTitledFirstName]
Dear vassal! I fear that you have failed to convince me of the justice of your request. Regretfully, I cannot oblige you.\n\nYour liege, [From.GetTitledFirstName]
One of the guards is sympathetic enough to smuggle a letter out. Perhaps one of my friends can mediate my release...
My letter is smuggled out to [This.GetBestName]

My dearest friend! I fear that my plight is terrible, I do not know for how long I can survive in this miserable dungeon. I beg of you, please intercede with [This.Liege.GetTitledFirstName] on my behalf.\n\nYour [GetFromRelation], [From.GetTitledFirstName]
My liege! I wish to intercede on the behalf of one of your prisoners, [FromFrom.GetBestName]. Surely a show of mercy would please all your vassals.\n\nYour faithful [From.GetTitledName]
is arrested and thrown in jail
I have been released! Thank [This.Religion.GetRandomGodName] for the intercession of [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName]!
A letter of gratitude is sent to [This.GetBestName]
Dear [Root.GetTitledFirstName], criminals belong in prison. I'm afraid there is nothing I can do to help your friend.\n\n[From.GetTitledFirstName]
Soldiers took me from my bed at night! [From.GetTitledFirstName] is accusing me of conspiring against [From.GetSubjectPronoun] with known traitors!
So much for a show of compassion

My most valued friend and vassal! Your concern for your friend is touching, but the laws of the realm must be upheld or all would surely descend into anarchy.\n\nYour faithful liege, [From.GetTitledFirstName]

My friend! Our liege, [This.Liege.GetTitledFirstName], has released me from my lonely cell, all thanks to you! [From.Religion.GetRandomGodName] bless you!\n\nYour ever grateful [GetFromRelation], [From.GetFirstName]
All is well that ends well!
I should offer to lift excommunication for anyone who joins the crusade.
I will send out a proclamation.
I am willing to lift the excommunication of you and accept your repentance, should you put on the cross and join the ongoing crusade.
Several excommunicated men have chosen to take up the sword against the infidels and joined the crusade.
I have accepted your decision to join the crusade as repentance and will hereby lift the excommunication.
My liege has persuaded me to embrace this notion of Englishness that is sweeping the realm.
Oh I say, game of cricket anyone?
The peasant army ravaging the province of [Root.GetName] is burning down buildings!
Is there anything they won't destroy?
Bad news, but I am glad it didn't happen to my holdings...
The peasant army ravaging the province of [From.GetName] is burning down my buildings!
I have been attacked by the peasants rebels in [Root.Location.GetName]!
I am lucky to be alive...
[From.GetTitledName] has been captured and killed by peasant rebels!
How dare they execute a subject of mine!

My liege,
I was ambushed by a mob of peasant rebels and barely got away with my life. The attack has left me maimed and I fear for the life of me and those around me in [From.Location.GetName]. These rebels must be stopped.

Signed,
[From.GetTitledName]

My liege,
Although I escaped with my life, the mob of peasant rebels that attacked me managed to wound me. I fear these attacks will only increase until the revolt in [From.Location.GetName] is put down.
Signed,
[From.GetTitledName]
This peasant rabble must be stopped!
The lifestyle of a childless courtier has made me suspect that he fancies other men!
Ask him if he really desire men rather than women
I should tell others about my suspicion!
I will accept money in exchange for my silence
[From.GetTitledFirstName] asked me today if I really fancied men over women!
What nerve! I love women, not men!
You are right. I desire men, not women

A note left on my table by an unseen visitor told me that if I did not deliver fifty gold within one hour to [From.GetTitledFirstName], my secret would be a secret no more. A small post scriptum wrote: 'the secret is that you are a sodomite'.
I cannot let anyone believe that!
A childless courtier with a strange choice of lifestyle has shown men a bit more attention than the women at court. Might it be that he is a sodomite?
I will accuse him of sodomy!
It is my duty to inform everyone about this suspected sodomite!

[From.GetTitledFirstName] started questioning my lifestyle, asked why I didn't have any children and made me feel incredibly awkward. My answers did not seem to satisfy [From.GetHerHim] and finally [From.GetSheHe] blurted out [From.GetHerHis] question: was I or was I not a sodomite?
What!? No! No, I am not a sodomite!
I need to prove to everyone who thinks I prefer men over women that I am not a sodomite!
A [Root.Religion.GetName] priest denounced me in front of the whole church today because of the silly rumors about me being a sodomite!
Be he a [Root.Religion.GetName] priest or not, nobody denounces me!
Just keep quiet, people will forget this soon
I have started to doubt myself, might it be that the rumors are true? Am I a sodomite, attracted to men rather than women?
I don't know what to know anymore!
The affection a courtier shows his sister is unnatural. I have begun to suspect they might be having a incestuous affair!
I should warn him about his incestuous affair
I have to tell everyone about their incestuous affair!
I wonder how much my silence is worth to him...
[This.GetTitledFirstName] is forced to pay for [Root.GetTitledFirstName] silence

When [From.GetTitledFirstName] started implying that I and my sister had an incestuous affair I could do nothing but deny, deny and deny. No matter what 'evidence' [From.GetFirstName] think [From.GetSheHe] has, [From.GetSheHe] cannot prove anything!
I love my sister, but not in that way!
I will prove I am not having an affair with my sister!

[From.GetTitledFirstName] asked me what [From.GetHerHis] silence was worth to me, and when I asked [From.GetHerHim] what in the world [From.GetSheHe] was talking about, [From.GetTitledFirstName] told me [From.GetSheHe] knows about my incestuous affair with my sister. If I did not pay [From.GetHerHim], there would be nothing stopping [From.GetHerHim] from telling everybody about our forbidden love.
Your silence is very valuable to me
I did not know [From.GetTitledFirstName] could be so charming, and I had never really noticed how handsome [From.GetSheHe] is...
Well, I wouldn't kick [From.GetHerHim] out of my bed...
Charming and handsome won't buy your way to my bed!
The rumors about my supposed incestuous love affair with my sister has reached the ears of my confessor.
I have sinned, if not in flesh then in mind...
I have nothing to confess, nothing to be forgiven for...
My sister and I enjoyed a few hours together in the high, abandoned tower of [Root.Location.GetName] when a child's face appeared in one of the windows...
The things I do for love...
The child has a too big mouth for its own safety...
I should have killed the child when I had the chance! The child told everyone about me and my sister in the tower, describing in detail what it had seen...
I fear the Holy Father will not look kindly upon us...

Everyone knows how deep and passionate the love between one of the courtiers and his wife are, but sadly it has not resulted in any children. I have heard the wife asking the other wives about cures and ways to get with child but to no avail.
Might he be impotent? I have to know!
It surprises me no one else knows this, I should tell them...
This is perhaps a secret he would pay to keep secret...
If the secret will remain secret, then [This.GetTitledFirstName] have to pay...
The biggest grief in our lives is the absence of children so when [From.GetTitledFirstName] stuck [From.GetHerHis] long nose in our private life the longing and sorrow returned with full force.
We have a little trouble conceiving, that is all!

I would never have thought anyone would try to profit off our grief, our sorrow that we have failed to conceive a child. The demand for gold or the secret about our trouble conceiving would be out in the open made me furious.
[Root.Spouse.GetFirstName] would be devastated, I have to pay...
I will never give in to your demands!
It seems as if the rumor about me being impotent has spread throughout the court. People are laughing behind my back, or so my so-called 'friends' tell me.
The lingering looks, the small, almost inappropriate touches, the secret smiles given to someone other than his wife... A courtier is having an affair!
It is my duty to confront him!
[This.GetTitledFirstName] is confronted about his adultery by [Root.GetTitledFirstName]
I need a bit of persuasion if he wants me to stay silent...
[This.GetTitledFirstName] is forced to pay [Root.GetTitledFirstName] for [Root.GetHerHis] silence
We hadn't been as discreet as we had hoped, [Root.GetTitledFirstName] confronted me about the adultery I had committed with the beautiful lady at the court.
I did not commit adultery with that woman
[This.GetTitledFirstName] might decide to tell your wife [Root.Spouse.GetTitledFirstName]

When [From.GetTitledFirstName] denied that [From.GetSheHe] had committed adultery I was stunned, I had been so sure of what I had seen that it had never occurred to me that I might be wrong. I apologised and [From.GetTitledFirstName] accepted the apology with a frown.
I should tell his wife [From.Spouse.GetTitledFirstName] about his affair

When [From.GetTitledFirstName] told me about my husband [From.GetFirstName]'s little affair with some unknown women I was furious! My rage had subsided a bit when I finally found my cheating husband, but as I saw him admiring the bosom of yet another clueless little strumpet the rage grew once again.
I should forgive and forget. I still love him
The fury in [From.GetTitledFirstName]'s eyes scared me nearly to death and when [From.GetSheHe] started screaming and cursing at me I wished I was dead.
I will never cheat on you again, I promise!
[From.GetTitledFirstName] forgave me for my little indiscretion but I could see how much it had hurt her. I promised and swore that I would never commit adultery again, ever again.

[From.GetTitledFirstName] was direct: if I did not pay [From.GetHerHim] to keep quiet, [From.GetTitledFirstName] would make sure everyone in the court would know about my little affair with one of the court ladies.
Take this, I don't want to see you ever again!
As if someone would believe you!
I came home one evening and found that my wife [Root.Spouse.GetTitledFirstName] had told our children about my affair and now they all refuse to speak to me!
Why did you have to involve them?!

The voices could be heard through the walls and I recognized them as belonging to my wife and my mistress. My wife [Root.Spouse.GetTitledFirstName] tried to make my mistress break up with me, but she refused so I decided to step in...
I reassure my mistress of my deep love for her
[Root.Spouse.GetTitledFirstName], you are the one I love!

I knocked on the door and heard him swear when something was knocked to the floor and broke, by the sound of it. When he finally called 'Come in!' I opened the door and saw the messy room, filled with weird looking glasses, stuffed exotic animals and the man I was visiting in the middle of the mess with singed eyebrows.
Have you tampered with the occult?
I got to get out of here and tell everyone!
He might pay for my silence...

My latest experiment went a bit badly and I was trying to clean up the mess when someone knocked on the door. [From.GetTitledFirstName] entered and saw the mess I was standing in, with my singed eyebrows and the remains of my experiment spread all over the room. It didn't take long before [From.GetSheHe] accused me of dealing with the occult!
Are you mad? I would never!
I could hardly believe my ears when [From.GetTitledFirstName] tried to pressure me into giving [From.GetHerHim] money to keep quiet about my dealings with the occult!
This is all I have got...
I don't care if everyone knows about this!

A child has gone missing and it seems as if everyone suspects me to have something to do with that. Apparently being a suspected occultist everyone believes I might use the entrails of children to read the future. Pah!
I attempt to clear my name
The voice woke me up, whispering about spells to awaken the dead, curses to make your enemy go blind and potions to make anyone fall in love with you...
I hope I can remember all of this!
I ignore the voice and go back to sleep

My confessor talked sternly to me, clearly avoiding to bring up the occultist rumor but as I just nodded and accepted all he told me without admitting to anything, he lost his patience with me. He scolded me and told me to repent, to stop fiddling with the occult or else...
I repent, I will never fiddle with the occult again!
Or what? You haven't got anything but rumors!

I had only managed to remember one of the many spells and invocations the voice had whispered to me in the dark. It was long and complicated with many different ingredients, not all easy to acquire...
The Church is after me, save me!

The diplomatic skill of [Root.GetChancellorName] [Root.job_chancellor.GetTitledFirstName] is deplorable! No matter what task I give [Root.job_chancellor.GetHerHim] [Root.job_chancellor.GetSheHe] always manage to disappoint.
You are not good enough, you have to shape up!
[Root.job_chancellor.GetTitledFirstName] is chastised about [Root.job_chancellor.GetHerHis] lack of diplomatic skill
I don't trust [Root.job_chancellor.GetTitledFirstName] to do a good job
[Root.job_chancellor.GetTitledFirstName] lack of diplomatic skill has cost me dearly!
[From.GetTitledFirstName] claims my diplomatic skill is deplorable! No matter how hard I work, [From.GetTitledFirstName] is never satisfied and [From.GetHerHis] demands are preposterous!

I have to trust Marshal [Root.job_marshal.GetTitledFirstName] to train my troops and to be able to suppress revolts but [Root.job_marshal.GetSheHe] has not proved to be adept in those manners. [Root.job_marshal.GetTitledFirstName] have to shape up or I need to find another Marshal.
Shape up or you're out of a job!
[Root.job_marshal.GetTitledFirstName] is chastised about [Root.job_marshal.GetHerHis] lack of martial skill
I don't think [Root.job_marshal.GetTitledFirstName] is the right [Root.job_marshal.GetManWoman] for this job
I might be persuaded to let you keep your job...

I know I have failed [From.GetTitledFirstName]'s expectations for what a Marshal should be able to do, but if only [From.GetSheHe] could give me a chance I would show [From.GetHerHim] that I do not lack in martial skill!
I will make you appreciate me, [From.GetTitledFirstName]!

I sent Steward [Root.job_treasurer.GetTitledFirstName] to oversee construction in a province - and the building fell apart almost instantly. Then I sent him to collect taxes in one of the richest provinces and [Root.job_treasurer.GetSheHe] returned with much less than I had anticipated. [Root.job_treasurer.GetTitledFirstName] clearly lack the stewardship skill needed to perform even the simplest of task!
